rdf:Description.rdfs:label: controlled environment
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The access to the communication event undergoes the agreement to elicit a linguistic behaviour.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: контролирана среда
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Достъпът до комуникационното събитие е свързан със съгласието да се извлече лингвистично поведение.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: entorn controlat
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'accés a un esdeveniment comunicatiu requereix acordar elicitar un comportament lingüístic.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kontrolirano okruženje
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Pristup komunikacijskom događaju podliježe suglasnosti za izazivanje jezičnog ponašanja.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kontrollerede omgivelser
kontrollitud keskkond
kontrolloitu ympäristö
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Vuorovaikutustilanteen havainnointi edellyttää sopimusta kielellisen käyttäytymisen hyödyntämisestä.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: environnement contrôlé
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Die Kontrolle eines kommunikativen Interkation, um gezielt ein bestimmtes linguistisches Verhalten zu generieren.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ελεγχόμενο περιβάλλον
kontrollált környezet
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A kommunikációhoz való hozzáférés feltételezi a beleegyezést a nyelvi viselkedés kiváltott jellegéhez.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ambiente controllato
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'accesso all'evento di comunicazione subisce l'accordo per ottenere un comportamento linguistico.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kontrolēta vide
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Piekļuve saziņas notikumam ir saistīta ar norunu izvilināt kādu valodisku darbību.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Ambjent kontrollat
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L-aċċess għall-avveniment ta' komunikazzjoni li jkun leħaq ftehim biex tinkiseb mġiba lingwistika.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kontrolowane warunki
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Dostęp do zdarzenia komunikacyjnego podlega uzgodnieniu, aby uzyskać zachowanie lingwistyczne.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: entorno controlado
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El acceso a un evento de comunicación requiere acordar elicitar un comportamiento lingüístico.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kontrollerad omgivning
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Åtkomsten till kommunikationen förutsätter att språkliga beteenden godkänns.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: controlled language
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A ubset of a language with restricted grammar, domain-specific vocabulary, and constrained style designed to allow domain specialists to formulate unambiguous texts pertaining to their subject field.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: controlled vocabulary
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A list of terms that have been enumerated explicitly.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: conversation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Communication event with more than two participants.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: разговор
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Комуникационно събитие с повече от двама участници.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: conversa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Esdeveniment comunicatiu amb més de dos participants.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: razgovor
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Komunikacijski događaj s više od dva sudionika.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: samtale
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kommunikationsbegivenhed med to eller flere deltagere.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: vestlus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Rohkem kui kahe osalejaga suhtlus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: keskustelu
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Vuorovaikutustilanne, jossa on enemmän kuin kaksi osapuolta.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: conversation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Type de communication impliquant au moins deux partipicants.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Konversation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kommunikations-Ereignis mit mindestens zwei Teilnehmern.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: συνομιλία
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Συνομιλία με περισσότερους από δύο συμμετέχοντες
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: beszélgetés
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kommunikációs esemény több, mint két résztvevővel.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: conversazione
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Evento di comunicazione con più di due partecipanti.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: saruna
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Saziņas notikums ar vairāk nekā diviem dalībniekiem.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Konverzazzjoni
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Avveniment ta' komunikazzjoni b'aktar minn żewġ parteċipanti.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: rozmowa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Zdarzenie ,komunikacyjne, w którym uczestniczy przynajmniej dwóch uczestników.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: conversa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Evento comunicativo entre mais do que dois participantes.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: conversación
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Evento de comunicación con más de dos participantes.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: konversation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kommunikation med fler än två deltagare.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: cooperation partner
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Naming of the cooperation partner of a research project.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Kooperationspartner
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Benennung des Kooperationspartners von einem Forschungsprojekt.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: corpus type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Classification of the type of a corpus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Korpustyp
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Klassifikation des Typs eines Korpus.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: corrector
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of a person/organisation/institution correcting a resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: country name
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the name of a country.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Ländername
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe des Namens eines Landes.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: creation date
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date when the resource or tool/service was created.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: дата на създаване
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Датата, на която е създаден ресурсът или средството/услугата.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: data de creació
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La data de creació d'un recurs o eina/servei.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: datum izrade
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Datum kada je izrađen resurs ili alat/usluga.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: skabelsesdato
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Datoen da ressourcen eller værkøjet/servicen blev skabt.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: loomiskuupäev
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kuupäev, millal ressurss või rakendus loodi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: luontipäivä
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Päivämäärä, jolloin resurssi tai työkalu/palvelu on luotu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: date de création
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Date à laquelle la ressource, l'outil ou le service a été crée.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Erzeugungs-Datum
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Das Datum an dem die Ressource oder das Werkzeug/der Service fertiggestellt wurde.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ημερομηνία δημιουργίας
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Η ημερομηνία δημιουργίας ενός γλωσσικού πόρου, εργαλείου ή υπηρεσίας
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: a létrehozás dátuma
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az a dátum, amikor az erőforrást vagy eszközt/szolgáltatást létrehozták.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: data di creazione
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La data della creazione della risorsa o del tool/servizio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: izveides datums
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Datums, kurā resurss vai rīks/pakalpojums ir izveidots.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Data meta nħoloq
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data meta nħoloq/inħolqot ir-riżors jew għodda/servizz.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: data utworzenia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data utworzenie zasobu lub narzędzia/usługi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fecha de creación
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La fecha en que se creó un recurso o herramienta/servicio,
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: skapelsedatum
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Det datum resursen eller verktyget/servicen skapades.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: creation tool
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates the tool with help of which the resource or the annotations in the resource were created.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: средство за създаване
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Показва средството, с помощта на което ресурсът или анотациите в ресурса са били направени.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: eina de creació
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fa referència a l'eina amb què s'ha creat un recurs o les anotacions que un recurs conté.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: alat za izradu
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Označava alat s pomoću kojega je izrađen resurs ili oznake u resursu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: skabelsesværktøj
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Det værktøj der blev brugt til, at skabe ressourcen eller annoteringen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: loomisrakendus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Rakendus, mille abil ressurss või selle märgendus loodi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: luontityökalu
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ilmoittaa resurssin tai sen annotaatioiden luomiseen käytetyn työkalun.
Outil à l'aide duquel la ressource ou l'annotation de la ressource a été réalisée.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Herstellungs-Werkzeug
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Spezifiziert das Werkzeug mit dessen Hilfe die Ressource oder die Annotationen in der Ressource hergestellt worden sind.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: εργαλείο δημιουργίας
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Προσδιορίζει το εργαλείο με τη βοήθεια του οποίου δημιουργήθηκε ένας πόρος ή/και τα επίπεδα επισημείωσης
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: a létrehozás eszköze
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Azt az eszközt adja meg, amellyel az erőforrást vagy az erőforrásban található annotációt létrehozták.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: creazione del tool
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica lo strumento utilizzato per realizzare la risorsa o l'annotazione della risorsa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: izveides rīks
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda rīku, ar kura palīdzību tika veidots vai marķēts resurss.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Għodda tal-ħolqien
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Jindika l-għodda li bl-għajnuna tagħha nħoloq ir-riżors jew l-annotazzjonijiet fir-riżors.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: narzędzie do tworzenia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa narzędzie, za pomocą którego zasób lub anotacja zasobu zostały utworzone.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ferramenta de criação
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica a ferramenta com a ajuda da qual o recurso ou a anotação no recurso foram criados.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: herramienta de creación
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hace referencia a la herramienta con que se ha creado un recurso o las anotaciones que este contiene.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: skapelseverktyg
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Verktyget med vilket resurserna eller annotationerna skapades.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: creator full name
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The name of the person who was participating in the creation project.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: пълното име на създателя.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Името на лицето, което е участвало в проекта на създаване.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nom complet del creador
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El nom de la persona que ha participat en el projecte de creació.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: puno ime tvorca
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ime osobe koja je sudjelovala u projektu izrade.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: skabers fulde navn
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Navnet på en person der var med i skabelsesprojektet(!?)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: looja täisnimi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ressursi loomises osalenud inimese nimi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: luojan koko nimi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Luontihankkeeseen osallistuneen henkilön nimi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nom du créateur
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nom d'une personne impliquée dans la création d'une ressource, d'un outil ou d'un service.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Hersteller-Name
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Der vollständige Name der Person die an der Herstellung beteiligt war.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ονοματεπώνυμο δημιουργού
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Το όνομα του προσώπου που συμμετείχε στη δημιουργία του πόρου
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: a létrehozó teljes neve
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Annak a személynek a neve, aki részt vett a létrehozásban.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nome del creatore
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Il nome della persona coinvolta nella creazione del progetto.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: veidotāja pilns vārds
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Resursa vai rīka/pakalpojuma izveides projekta dalībnieka vārds.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Isem sħiħ ta' min ħoloq
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L-isem tal-persuna li ħadet sehem fil-ħolqien tal-proġett.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dane twórcy
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nazwisko osoby, która uczestniczyła w procesie tworzenia.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nome completo do criador
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nome da pessoa que participou no projecto de criação.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nombre completo del creador
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El nombre de la persona que participó en el proyecto de creación.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: skaparens fullständiga namn
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Namnet på den person som deltagit i skapelseprojektet.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: creator role
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The role that a person had in the creation process.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ролята на създателя.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ролята, която лицето играе в процеса на създаване.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: paper del creador
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El paper que una persona ha tingut durant el procés de creació.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: uloga tvorca
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Uloga koju je osoba imala u postupku izrade.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: skaberrolle
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Rollen en person havde i skabelsesprocessen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: looja roll
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Roll, mis inimesel ressursi loomisel oli.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: luojan rooli
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Rooli, joka henkilöllä oli luontitapahtumassa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: rôle dans la création
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Rôle d'une personne impliquée dans la création d'une ressource, d'un outil ou d'un service.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Erzeuger-Rolle
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Die Rolle, die die Person im Herstellunsgprozess spielt.
Ο ρόλος ενός φυσικού προσώπου στη δημιουργία του πόρου
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: a létrehozásban betöltött szerep
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az a szerep, amelyet a személy betöltött a létrehozási folyamatban.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ruolo del creatore
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Il ruolo che una persoa ha ricoperto nel processo di creazione.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: veidotāja loma
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Loma, kāda šai personai bija izveides procesā.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Rwol ta' ħallieq
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ir-rwol li persuna kellha fil-proċess tal-ħolqien.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: rola twórcy
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Rola jaką pełniła dana osoba w procesie tworzenia.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: função do criador
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Função desempenhada pelo criador no processo de criação.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: papel del creador
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El papel que desempeñó una persona durante el proceso de creación.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: skaparens roll
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Den roll skaparen hade i skapelseprocessen.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: cross-sectional study
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of a cross-sectional study as research design for the elicitation within, for instance, a psychological study.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Querschnittstudie
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe einer Querschnittstudie als Forschungsdesign für die Datenerhebung von, z.B., einer psychologischen Studie.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: data rejection
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Description of the status of data that has been collected within a research project but needs to be rejected.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Datenausmusterung
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Beschreibung des Status von Daten, die innerhalb eines Forschungsprojektes erhoben wurden, aber ausgemustert werden müssen.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: date
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Shoebox bookkeeping field to help keep track of the last time an entry was edited. One per record (usually the last field) is adequate. Usually inserted automatically by Shoebox. The datestamp field is set up under the Shoebox menu option: Database-Properties-Options tab.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: delivery format
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifies the format used for the delivery of the resource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: формат на разпространение.
format de distribució
format isporuke
overdragelsesformat
väljastusformaat
jakeluformaatti
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Määrittää jaettavan resurssin tiedostomuodon.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: format de distribution
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Format sous lequel une ressource ou un outil est distribuée. Exemple: archive compressée.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Abliefer-Format
μορφότυπο παράδοσης
továbbítási formátum
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az a formátum, amelyben az erőforrás vagy eszköz megosztásra kerül. Pédául: tömörített archívum.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: formato di distribuzione
piegādes formāts
Format tat-twassil
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tispeċifika l-format użat għat-twassil tar-riżors.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: format dostarczenia
formato de entrega
formato de distribución
överföringsformat
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specificerar det format som används vid överföringen av resursen.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: department
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Naming of a department that is part of a larger higher-level institution or organisation (e.g. part of a university).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Institut
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Benennung eines Instituts (oder eine Abteilung/einen (Fach-) Bereich), das zu einer größeren übergeordneten Institution/Organisation gehört (z.B. zu einer Universität).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: deployment tool
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates a specific tool that may be used for the deployment of the resource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: средство за разпространение
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Показва конкретно средство, което може да се използва за разпространяването на ресурса.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: eina d'explotació
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fa referència a l'eina específica que es pot utilitzar per a l'explotació del recurs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: alat za razmještaj
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Označava poseban alat koji se može koristiti za razmještaj resursa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: indsættelsesværktøj
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Et specifikt værktøj der er brugt til, at indsætte ressourcen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kasutusrakendus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Näitab konkreetset rakendust, mille abil saab ressursi kasutada.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: käyttöönottotyökalu
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ilmoittaa erityisen työkalun, jota voi käyttää resurssin käyttöönotossa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: outil de déploiement
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Outil qui peut être utilisé pour rendre la ressource , l'outil ou le service accessible.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Dislozierungs-Werkzeug
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Spezifiziert ein bestimmtes Werkzeug, das in Zusammenhang mit der Betrachtung der Ressource installiert werden muss.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: εργαλείο ανάπτυξης
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Προσδιορίζει το εργαλείο το οποίο χρησιμοποιήθηκε για την ανάπτυξη του πόρου
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: elhelyezés eszköz
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Egy olyan eszközt ad meg, amely az erőforrás elhelyezésére és elérhetővé tételére használható.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: strumento di distribuzione
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica uno specifico strumento che può essere usato per la distribuzione della risorsa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: izstrādes rīks
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda konkrētu rīku, ko var izmantot resursa izstrādē.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: narzędzie wdrożeniowe
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa konkretne narzędzie, które można użyć do wdrożenia zasobu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ferramenta de instalação
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica uma ferramenta específica que pode ser usada para instalar o recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: herramienta de explotación
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hace referencia a la herramienta específica que puede emplearse para la explotación de un recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: utsättningsverktyg
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ett verktyg som kan användas för att sätta ut resurser.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: derivation date
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates the date of derivation in case that a resource was derived from another one.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: дата на произход
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Показва датата на произхода в случаите, когато ресурсът произхожда от друг ресурс.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: data de creació d'un derivat
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fa referència a la data de creació d'un producte derivat, en cas que un recurs derivi d'un altre. Per exemple, una traducció.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: datum derivacije
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Označava datum derivacije u slučaju da je resurs deriviran iz nekog drugog resursa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: datum izvođenja
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Označava datum izvođenja u slučaju da je neki resurs izveden iz drugoga.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: afledt dato
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Den afledte dato, hvis ressourcen er afledt af en anden.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tuletuskuupäev
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Näitab ressursi tekitamise kuupäeva, juhul kui see pärineb mõnest teisest ressursist (näiteks siis, kui on tegu tõlkega).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: johtamispäivä
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ilmoittaa johtamispäivämäärän, jos rerurssi on johdettu toisesta resurssista.
Date de création d'une ressource dérivée d'une autre. (Exemple, date de traduction)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Ableitungs-Datum
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Gibt das Datum an, an dem eine Ressource von einer anderen abgeleitet worden ist.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ημερομηνία παραγωγής
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Προσδιορίζει την ημερομηνία παραγωγής στην περίπτωση που ένας πόρος έχει προκύψει από άλλον
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: deriváció dátuma
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A deriváció dátumát adja meg, abban az esetben, ha egy erőforrást egy másik erőforrásból hoztak létre.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: data di creazione di una derivazione
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica la data di derivazione nel caso in cui una risorsa è stata derivata da un'altra risorsa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: atvasināšanas datums
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda atvasināšanas datumu, ja resurss ir atvasināts no cita resursa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: data rozszerzenia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa datę rozszerzenia zasobu w przypadku, gdy zasób został zbudowany na podstawie innego.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: data de derivação
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica a data de derivação nos casos em que um recurso derivou de outro.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fecha de creación de un derivado
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hace referencia a la fecha de creación de un producto derivado en caso de que un recurso derive de otro. Por ejemplo, una traducción.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: avlett datum
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Visar avledningsdatumet för det fall en resurs är avledd från en annan.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: derivation mode
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether the derivation was created manually or automatic.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: начин на произход
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Показва дали произходът е ръчен, или автоматичен.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: mode de creació d'un derivat
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fa referència a si el producte derivat ha estat creat de forma manual o automàtica.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: način derivacije
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Označava je li derivacija obavljena ručno ili automatski.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: afledningsmåde
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Afgør om der er afledt automatisk eller manuelt
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tuletusviis
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Näitab, kas ressurss tuletati teisest automaatselt või käsitsi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: johtamistapa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ilmoittaa tehtiinkö johtaminen käsin vai automaattisesti.
Indique si la ressource dérivée d'une autre a été crée à la main ou a été obtenue automatiquement. (Ex: traduction automatique)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Ableitungs-Modus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Gibt an ob die Ableitung der Ressource manuell oder automatisch erfolgte.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: τρόπος παραγωγής
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Προσδιορίζεται εάν η παραγωγή ενός πόρου έγινε χειρωνακτικά ή με αυτόματο τρόπο
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: derivációs mód
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Azt mutatja, hogy a derivációt kézzel vagy automatikusan hozták-e létre.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: modo di derivazione
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica se la derivazione di una risorsa è stata creata manualmente o automaticamente.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: atvasināšanas režīms
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda, vai atvasinājums ir iegūts manuāli vai automātiski.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Mod tad-derivazzjoni
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tindika jekk id-derivazzjoni nħolqitx manwalment jew awtomatikament.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tryb rozszerzenia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa czy rozszerzony zasób został zbudowany na podstawie pierwotnego w sposób ręczny czy też automatyczny.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: modo de derivação
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica se a derivação foi criada manualmente ou de forma automática.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: modo de creación de un derivado
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hace referencia a si el producto derivado fue creado de forma manual o automática.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: avledningssätt
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anger om avledningen skapades manuellt eller automatiskt.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: derivation tool
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates the tool that was used during the derivation process.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: средството на произход
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Показва средството, което е използвано при произхода.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: eina de creació d'un derivat
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fa referència a l'eina emprada durant el procés de derivació.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: alat za derivaciju
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Označava alat koji je rabljen tijekom postupka derivacije.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: værktøj til afledning
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Det værktøj der blev anvendt til afledning.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tuletusrakendus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Näitab tööriista, mida ressursi tuletusel kasutati.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: johtamistyökalu
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ilmoittaa johtamistyökalun, jota käytettiin johtamistapahtumassa.
Outil utilisé au cours du processus de dérivation d'une ressource à partir d'une autre. Exemple nom d'un analyseur morphosyntaxique pour extraire le vocabulaire employé dans une oeuvre.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Ableitungs-Werkzeug
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Gibt an mittels welchen Werkzeuges die Ableitung vorgenommen wurde.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: εργαλείο παραγωγής
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Προσδιορίζεται το εργαλείο το οποίο χρησιμοποιήθηκε κατά τη διαδικασία παραγωγής ενός πόρου
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: derivációs eszköz
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Megadja, hogy melyik eszközt használták a deriváció során.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: strumento per la creazione di una derivazione
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica lo strumento utilizzato durante il processo di derivazione.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: atvasināšanas rīks
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda rīku, kas ir izmantots atvasināšanas procesa laikā.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Għodda tad-derivazzjoni
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tindika l-għodda li ntużat waqt il-proċess tad-derivazzjoni.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: narzędzie rozszerzenia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa narzędzie, które zostało zastosowane w trakcie procesu rozszerzania.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ferramenta de derivação
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica a ferramenta utilizada durante o processo de derivação.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: herramienta de creación de un derivado
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hace referencia a la herramienta empleada durante el proceso de derivación.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: avledningsverktyg
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anger det verktyg som användes under avledningsprocessen.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: derivation type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the type of derivation.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: тип на произхода
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Показва типа на произхода.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tipus de derivat
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicació del tipus de producte derivat.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: vrsta derivacije
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Oznaka vrste derivacije.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: afledningstype
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Afledningens type.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tuletusliik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Näitab tuletuse liiki.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: johtamistyyppi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ilmoittaa johtamisen tyypin.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: type de dérivation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Type de dérivation pour une ressource dérivée d'une autre. Exemple : traduction.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Ableitungs-Typ
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Gibt die Art der Ableitung an.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: τύπος παραγωγής
a deriváció típusa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A deriváció típusának megjelölése.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tipo di derivazione
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicazione del tipo di derivazione.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: atvasinājuma tips
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda atvasinājuma tipu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Tip tad-derivazzjoni
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tindika t-tip ta' derivazzjoni.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: typ rozszerzenia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa typ rozszerzenia.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tipo de derivação
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicação do tipo de derivação.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tipo de derivado
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicación del tipo de producto derivado
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: avledningstyp
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anger typen av avledning.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: derivation workflow
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates of the workflow process in which the derivation process was embedded.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: път на произхода
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Показва процеса, в който се съдържа пътят на произхода.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: workflow de creació del derivat
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fa referència al procés de workflow en el qual va tenir lloc la creació del producte derivat.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: radni tijek derivacije
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Označava postupak radnog tijeka u koji je uklopljen postupak derivacije.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: afledningsforløb
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Forløbet hvori afledningen er sket.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tuletusprotsess
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kirjeldab tuletusprotsessi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: johtamisen työnkulku
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ilmoittaa työnkulun, johon johtaminen sisältyy.
Organisation du processus de dérivation.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Ableitungs-Prozess
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Gibt den Prozess an in welchem die Ableitung eingebettet war.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: μεθοδολογία παραγωγής
derivációs munkafolyam
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Azt a munkafolyamatot adja meg, amelybe a derivációs folyamat be van ágyazva.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: workflow della derivazione
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica il processo di workflow in cui è stato incluso il processo di derivazione.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: atvasināšanas darbplūsma
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda, kāda darbplūsmas procesa sastāvā iekļauts atvasināšanas process.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: proċess ta' derivazzjoni
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tindika il-proċess tal-workflow li fih seħħ il-ħolqien tal-prodott derivat.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: proces rozszerzania
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Wskazuje na przebieg procesu, który obejmuje proces rozszerzania.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fluxo de derivação
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Dá indicação sobre o processo de fluxo no qual o processo de derivação está integrado.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: workflow de creación del derivado
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hace referencia al proceso de workflow en que se produjo la creación del producto derivado.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: avledningsförlopp
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anger förloppet i vilket avledningsprocessen är inbäddad.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: description
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A description in general prose text of the issues that are indicated by the context. The description field can occur at many different places in a component and profile.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: описание
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Описание в свободен текст на нещата, които показва контекстът. Полето за описание може да се появи на различни места в даден компонент и профил.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: descripció
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Una descripció en llenguatge general de les qüestions indicades pel context. El camp "descripció" pot aparèixer en diversos llocs, tant en els components com en els perfils.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: opis
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Opis pitanja na koja ukazuje kontekst u općem tekstu. Opisno polje može se pojaviti na različitim mjestima u sastavnici i profilu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: beskrivelse
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: En tekstuel beskrivelse af indholdet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kirjeldus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kontekstist tulenevate asjaolude üldine kirjeldus vabas vormis. Kirjelduse väli võib esineda komponentide ja profiilide mitmetes erinevates osades.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kuvaus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sanallinen kuvaus kysymyksistä, jotka sisältyvät kontekstiin. Kuvauskenttä voi esiintyä monissa eri paikoissa komponentissa ja profiilissa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: description
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Description sous forme de texte et liée au contexte. Le champ description peut apparaître à de nombreux endroits dans les composants et dans les profils personalisés de composants.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Beschreibung
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Eine Beschreibung der Dinge in Prosa Text die durch den Kontext angedeutet werden. Das Beschreibungsfeld kann an sehr vielen verschiedenen Stellen in einer Metadaten-Beschreibung auftauchen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: περιγραφή
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Περιγραφή σε ελεύθερο κείμενο πληροφοριών που προσδιορίζονται από το περικείμενο. Το πεδίο/χαρακτηριστικό της περιγραφής μπορεί να πραγματώνεται σε διαφορεικά σημεία ενός component ή profile
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: leírás
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A tartalomhoz kapcsolódó szöveges leírás. Ez a mező számos helyen megjelenhet a komponensekben és az ezekhez tartozó személyes profilban.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: descrizione
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Una descrizione sotto forma di testo delle uscite che sono indicate dal contesto. Il campo descrizione può occorrere in differenti posti, in un componente e nel profilo.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: apraksts
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kontekstā norādīto jautājumu apraksts vispārīgā prozas tekstā. Kompomentā un profilā apraksta laiks var parādīties daudzās dažādās vietās.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Deskrizzjoni
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Deskrizzjoni b'test ta' proża ġenerali tal-kwistjonijiet indikati mill-kuntest. Il-kaxxa tad-deskrizzjoni tista' iseħħ f'diversi postijiet differenti f'komponent u profil.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: opis
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Opis zagadnień, których dotyczy zawartość zasobu wyrażony w postaci prostego tekstu o funkcji informatywnej. Pole opisu może występować w różnych miejscach komponentu i profilu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: descrição
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Uma descrição breve, em prosa, dos assuntos indicados pelo contexto. O campo Descrição pode surgir em vários locais diferentes num componente ou perfil.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: descripción
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Una descripción en lenguaje general de las cuestiones indicadas por el contexto. El campo "descripción" puede aparecer en diversos sitios tanto en los componentes como en los perfiles.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: beskrivning
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: En textbeskrivning av frågor som anges i kontexten. Beskrivningsfältet kan förekomma på många olika platser i en komponent och profil.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dialect
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Names of the dialects that occur in the resource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: диалект
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Имената на диалектите, които се срещат в ресурса.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dialecte
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Noms dels dialectes que apareixen en un recurs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dijalekt
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nazivi dijalekata koji se javljaju u resursu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dialekt
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Dialekt der benyttes i ressourcen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: murre
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ressursis esinevate murrete nimetused.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: murre
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Resurssissa esiintyvien murteiden nimet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dialecte
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nom des dialectes qui apparaissent dans une ressource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Dialekt
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Name des Dialektes der in der Ressource verwendet wird.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: διάλεκτος
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ονόματα διαλέκτων που περιλαμβάνονται σε έναν πόρο
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dialektus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az erőforrásban előforduló dialektusok nevei.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dialetto
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nome del dialetto che occorre nella risorsa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dialekts
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Resursā sastopamā dialekta nosaukums.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Djalett
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ismijiet tad-djaletti preżenti fir-riżors.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dialekt
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nazwy dialektów, które występują w zasobie.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dialecto
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nome dos dialectos que surgem no recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dialecto
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nombres de los dialectos que aparecen dentro de un recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dialekt
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Namn på de dialekter som förekommer i resursen.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dialogue
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Communication event between two participants.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: диалог
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Събитие на комуникация между двама участници.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: diàleg
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Esdeveniment comunicatiu entre dos participants.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dijalog
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Komunikacijski događaj između dvaju sudionika.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dialog
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kommunikationsbegivenhed mellem to deltagere.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dialoog
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kahe osalejaga suhtlus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dialogi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kahden osanottajan välinen viestintätapahtuma.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dialogue
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Communication entre deux participants.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Dialog
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kommunikations-Ereignis zwischen zwei Teilnehmern.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: διάλογος
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Επικοινωνία μεταξύ δύο συμμετεχόντων
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: párbeszéd
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Két résztvevő közötti kommunikációs esemény.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dialogo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Evento di comunicazione tra due partecipanti.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dialogs
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Saziņas notikums ar diviem dalībniekiem.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: djalogu
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Avveniment ta' komunikazzjoni bejn żewġ parteċipanti.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dialog
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Zdarzenie komunikacyjne zachodzące pomiędzy dwoma uczestnikami.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: diálogo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Situação comunicativa entre dois participantes.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: diálogo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Evento de comunicación entre dos participantes.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dialog
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kommunikation mellan två deltagare.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: discourse
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The content consists of the spoken/signed utterances of one or more actors. They are produced with the purpose of communicating some thought or intent to the interlocutors present to the event.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: дискурс
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Съдържанието представлява устните/писмените изказвания на един или повече участници. Тези изказвания се правят с цел да се изрази някаква мисъл или намерение към участниците, които присъстват на събитието.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: discurs
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El contingut consisteix en les paraules pronunciades o expressades en llengua de signes per un o més actors. L'objectiu és comunicar un pensament o intenció als interlocutors presents en l'esdeveniment.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: diskurs
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sadržaj se sastoji od izgovorenih iskaza/iskaza izrečenih znakovnim jezikom, od strane jednoga ili više aktanata. Ti su iskazi proizvedeni u cilju priopćavanja neke misli ili namjere sugovornicima koji su nazočni događaju.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: diskurs
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indholdet består af skrevne/talte udtalelser af en eller flere medvirkende. Det er lavet for, at formidle tanker eller hensigter til deltagere af hændelsen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: diskursus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sisu koosneb ühe või enama osaleja kas kõneldud või viibeldud lausungitest. Selle kõne eesmärgiks on mingi mõtte või soovi edastamine.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: diskurssi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sisältö koostuu yhden tai useamman keskustelijan puhutuista tai viitotuista lauseista. Lauseiden tuottamisen tarkoituksena on vaihtaa ajatuksia tai aikeita keskustelukumppaneiden kanssa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: discours
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Intervention orale (ou en langue des signes) d'un (éventuellement plusieursà) acteurs et qui vise à communiquer ses pensées ou intentions à un auditoire.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Diskurs
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Der Inhalt besteht aus gesprochenen Aussagen bzw. Zeichensprachen-Aussagen von einer oder mehreren Aktoren. Sie wurden mit der Absicht erzeugt, einem anwesenden Zuhörer Gedanken oder Intentionen zu vermitteln.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: συνεχής λόγος
diskurzus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A tartalom egy vagy több aktor beszélt vagy jelelt megnyilatkozásaiból áll. A megnyialtkozások célja, hogy gondolatokat vagy szándékokat közöljenek az eseményben részt vevő interlokutorokkal.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: discorso
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Il contenuto consiste nelle parole pronunciate/espresse da uno o più attori. Esse sono prodotte con l'obiettivo di comunicare qualche pensiero o intenzione agli interlocutori presenti all'evento.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: diskurss
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Saturs sastāv no viena vai vairāku subjektu runātiem/rakstītiem izteikumiem. To mērķis ir notikumā klātesošajiem nodot kādu domu vai nodomu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: diskors
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: il-kontenut jikkonsisti minn kliem li jingħad jew sinjali li jsiru minn attur wieħed jew aktar. Dawn isiru bl-iskop li jiġi kkomunikat xi ħsieb jew intenzjoni lill-interlokuturi preżenti fl-avveniment. Storja tradizzjonali, konverzazzjoni, diskors pubbliku.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dyskurs
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Treść składająca się z mówionych/symbolicznych wypowiedzi jednego lub więcej aktorów (mówców), wypowiedzianych w celu przekazania interlokutorom obecnym w czasie zdarzenia pewnych myśli lub intencji.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: discurso
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: O conteúdo consiste nos enunciados orais ou gestuais de um ou mais intervenientes. São produzidos com o objectivo de comunicar um pensamento ou intenção aos interlocutores presentes no evento.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: discurso
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El contenido consiste en las palabras pronunciadas/expresadas en lengua de signos por uno o más actores. Su objetivo es comunicar algún tipo de pensamiento o intención a los interlocutores presentes en el evento.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: diskurs
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Innehållet består av de talade/tecknade yttrandena från en eller flera aktörer. De produceras i avsikt att kommunicera en tanke eller intention till samtalsparterna.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: discourse analysis
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The study of the patterns and meanings behind connected speech.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: дискурсен анализ
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Изследването на моделите и значенията на свързаната реч.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: anàlisi del discurs
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'estudi dels patrons i significats que hi ha darrere d'una intervenció oral.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: analiza diskursa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Izučavanje obrazaca i značenja koja su u pozadini povezanog govora.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: diskursanalyse
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Studiet af sprogbrugen i samtaler.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: vestlusanalüüs
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Seotud kõne taga olevaid mustreid ja tähendusi uuriv teadus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: diskurssianalyysi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Yhtenäisen tai johdonmukaisen puheen tutkimus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: analyse du discours
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Etude des motifs (récurrents ou non) et des sens dans des interventions orales (discours, conversation, etc.)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Diskurs-Analyse
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Das Studium von Mustern und Bedeutungen, das sich hinter der Interaktion von Sprechern verbirgt.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: diskurzus analízis
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az összefüggő szövegben megjelenő mintákat és jelentéseket vizsgáló tudomány.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: analisi del discorso
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Lo studio di modelli e di significati che si trovano dietro un discorso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: diskursa analīze
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Saistītas runas pamatā esošo modeļu un nozīmju pētīšana.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: analiżi tad-diskors
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L-istudju tal-mudell u t-tifsiriet ta' diskors konness.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: analiza dyskursu
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Badanie wzorców i kryjących się za nimi znaczeń w ramach powiązanej mowy.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: análise do discurso
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Estudo dos padrões e significados latentes no discurso encadeado.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: análisis del discurso
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El estudio de los patrones y significados que se esconden tras una intervención oral.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: diskursanalys
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Studier av mönster och betydelser bakom sammanhängande tal.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: display type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specification a tool’s output type that is only displayed to the user but not meant to be stored.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Anzeigetyp
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Spezifikation des Ausgabetyps eines Tools, der dem Nutzer nur am Computerbildschirm angezeigt wird, aber nicht zur Speicherung gedacht ist.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: distribution type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the distribution type of a resource (e.g. of a tool).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Distributionstyp
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe des Distributionstyps einer Ressource (z.B. eines Tools).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: document
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: any electronic media content (other than computer programs or system files) that are intended to be used in either an electronic form or as printed output

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: домейн
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Показва областта на приложение на ресурса или средството/услугата.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: domini
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fa referència al domini d'aplicació del recurs o l'eina/servei.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: domena
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Označava domenu primjene resursa ili alata/usluge.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: domæne
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anvendelsesdomænet for ressourcen eller værtøjet/servicen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: valdkond
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Näitab ressursi või tööriista rakendusvaldkonda.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: alue
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Osoittaa resurssin tai työkalun/palvelun sovellusalueen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: domaine
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Domaine d'application de la ressource, de l'outil ou du service.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Domäne
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Spezifiziert die Anwendungs-Domäne der Ressource oder des Werkzeuges/Services.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: τομέας εφαρμογής
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Προσδιορίζεται ο τομέας στον οποίο αξιοποιείται ο πόρος ή το εργαλείο/υπηρεσία
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: terület
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az erőforrás vagy eszköz/szolgáltatás alkalmazási területét adja meg.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dominio
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica il dominio di applicazione della risorsa o del tool/servizio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: domēns
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda resursa vai rīka/pakalpojuma izmantojamības jomu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dominju
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tindika d-dominju tal-applikazzjoni tar-riżors jew tal-għodda/servizz.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dziedzina
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa dziedzinę zastosowań dla zasobu lub narzędzia/usługi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: domínio
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica o domínio da aplicação do recurso ou ferramenta/serviço.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dominio
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hace referencia al dominio de aplicación del recurso o la herramienta/servicio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: domän
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anger applikationsdomänen för resursen eller verktyget/servicen.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dominant language
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifies the most frequently used language in a resource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: доминиращ език
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Специфицира най-често използвания език в даден ресурс.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: idioma predominant
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fa referència a l'idioma usat amb més freqüència en un recurs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: prevladavajući jezik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Označava najčešće korišteni jezik u nekom resursu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dominerende sprog
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Det mest dominerende sprog i en ressource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: peamine keel
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Näitab ressursis kõige sagedamini kasutatud keelt.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: vallitseva kieli
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Määrittelee resurssissa taajimmin käytetyn kielen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: langage dominant
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La langue la plus utilisée dans une ressource (au point d'être parfois la seule).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Dominante Sprache
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Spezifiziert die Sprache in einer Ressource, die am häufigsten verwendet wird.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: domináns nyelv
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Egy erőforrásban a leggyakrabban használt nyelvet adja meg.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: linguaggio dominante
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifica il linguaggio usato più frequentemente nella risorsa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: galvenā valoda
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda resursā visvairāk lietoto valodu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Lingwa dominanti
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tispeċifika l-aktar lingwa użata b'mod frekwenti f'riżors.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: język dominujący
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa najczęściej używany język w ramach danego zasobu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: língua dominante
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Especifica a língua usada com maior frequência no recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: idioma predominante
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hace referencia al idioma empleado con mayor frecuencia en un recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dominerande språk
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anger det oftast använda språket i en resurs.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: drama
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The content is a fictional play that is acted on stage or for broadcasting.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: драма
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Съдържанието е фикционална пиеса, която се играе на сцена или е за излъчване.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: teatre
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El contingut és una obra de ficció que s'interpreta sobre un escenari o per a la seva emissió a través dels mitjans de comunicació.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: drama
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sadržaj je fiktivni komad koji se izvodi na pozornici ili se emitira.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: drama
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indholdet er et fiktionelt stykke, der er udført på en scene eller transmitteret.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: draama
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sisuks on ilukirjanduslik teos, mis on mõeldud laval või massimeedias ettekandmiseks.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: draama
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sisältö on kuvitteellinen näytelmä, joka näytellään näyttämöllä tai lähetetään tv:n/radion kautta.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: théâtre
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Pièce à contenu fictionnel destinée à être jouée sur une scène.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Drama
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Bei dem Inhalt handelt es sich um einen Text der auf einer Bühne oder im Fernsehen aufgeführt wird.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dráma
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kitalált történet tartalma, amelyet színpadon vagy közvetítés céljából játszanak el.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: arte teatrale
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Il contenuto è un'opera di finzione che si interpreta su un palco o attraverso teletrasmissione.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: drāma
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Lugas saturs, kas tiek spēlēts uz skatuves vai pārraidei.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dramm
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Il-kontenut huwa storja fittizja irreċtata fuq palk jew għax-xandir.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dramat
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Zawartość stanowi sztuka (fikcja literacka), która jest wystawiana na scenie lub nadawana poprzez media.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: drama
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: O conteúdo consiste numa peça ficcional que é encenada em palco ou para transmissão televisiva.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: teatro
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El contenido es una obra de ficción que se interpreta sobre un escenario o para su emisión por los medios de comunicación.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: drama
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Innehållet är en fiktiv pjäs som spelas på scen eller sänds på tv.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: drawing
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A picture, likeness, diagram or representation
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: рисунка
dibuix
crtež
tegning
joonistus
piirros

Zeichnung
rajz
disegno
zīmējums
tpinġija/disinn
rysunek
desenho
dibujo
teckning
dubbing
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The post-production process of recording and replacing voices on a motion picture or television soundtrack subsequent to the original shooting, most commonly involving the substitution of the voices of the actors shown on the screen by those of different performers, who may be speaking a different language.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: duration
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specification of the duration of a recording.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: времетраене
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Специфициране на времетраенето на записа.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: durada
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Especificació de la durada d'un enregistrament.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: trajanje
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Oznaka trajanja nekog zapisa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: varighed
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Varigheden af en optagelse.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kestus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Näitab salvestuse kestust.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kesto
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tallenteen keston määritys
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: durée
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Durée d'un enregistrement.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Dauer
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Spezifiziert die Dauer einer Aufnahme.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: διάρκεια
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Προσδιορίζεται η διάρκεια καταγραφής
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: időtartam
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Egy fevétel időtartamának megadása.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: durata
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specificazione della durata di una registrazione.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ilgums
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda ierakstes ilgumu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tul
czas trwania
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Definiuje czas trwania nagrania.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: duração
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Especificação da duração de uma gravação.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: duración
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Especificación de la duración de una grabación.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: varaktighet
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specificering av en inspelnings längd.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: duration of effective speech
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: duration of effective speech in corpus
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: времетраене на ефективна реч
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Времетраенетео на ефективната реч в даден корпус.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: durada de la parla efectiva
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Durada de la parla efectiva en un corpus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: trajanje efektivnog govora
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: trajanje efektivnog govora u korpusu
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: varighed af effektiv tale
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Varighed af effektiv tale i et korpus
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tegeliku kõne kestus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Korpuses oleva tegeliku kõne kogukestus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: varsinaisen puheen kesto
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: varsinaisen puheen kesto korpuksessa
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: durée effective de parole
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: durée effective de parole dans le corpus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Wirkliche Sprachdauer
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Wirkliche Dauer der Sprachaufnahme in einem Korpus
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: a beszéd effektív hossza
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: a korpuszban elhangzott tényleges beszéd hossza
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: durata del discorso effettivo

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tul effettiv ta' diskors
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: it-tul effettiv ta' diskors f'korpus
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: czas trwania rzeczywistej mowy
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: czas trwania rzeczywistej mowy w korpusie
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: duración del habla efectiva
