rdf:Description.rdfs:label: varaktighet för effektivt tal
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Längd på effektivt tal i en korpus.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: duration of full database
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: the duration of all recordings in the corpus
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: времетраене на цялата база данни
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Времетраенето на всички записи в корпуса
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: durada de la base de dades completa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La durada de tots els enregistraments inclosos en el corpus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: trajanje pune baze podataka
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: trajanje svih zapisa u korpusu
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: varighed af fuld database
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Varigheden af alle optagelserne i et korpus
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: täisandmebaasi kestus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kõigi korpuses olevate salvestuste kogukestus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: täyden tietokannan kesto
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: kaikkien nauhoitusten kesto korpuksessa
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: durée de la totalité de la base de donnée
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: la durée cumulée des enregistrements présents dans le corpus (la base de donnée)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Totale Aufnahme-Dauer
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Dauer aller Aufnahmen in einem Korpus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: a teljes adatbázis időtartama
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A korpuszban található összes felvétel együttes időtartama
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: durata dell'intero database
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Durata di tutte le registrazioni nel corpus
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pilns datubāzes ilgums
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Korpusā esošo ierakstu kopējais garums
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: łączny czas trwania bazy danych
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: łączny czas trwania wszystkich nagrań w korpusie
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: duración de toda la base de datos
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La duración de todas las grabaciones incluidas en el corpus
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: varaktighet för full databas
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Längden på alla inspelningarna i korpusen.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: edited translation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Product of the translation editing process.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: edition
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the edition of a resource (e.g. of a book).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: editor
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of a person or organisation collecting and editing resources (e.g. book articles) that are to be published as one resource (e.g. one book) by a publishing house.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: education interpreting
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Type of interpreting in which the interprete performs a variety of different tasks in an education setting, for instance, tin a classroom in which the interpreter may need to interpret the teacher's lecture for a student, or vice-versa.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: elicitation instrument
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specification of the instrument used for the elicitation of an experimental study, for example.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Erhebungsinstrument
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Spezifikation des Instruments, das für die Datenerhebung z.B. einer Experimentalstudie verwendet wurde.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: elicitation method
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A characterisation of specific prompts used for eliciting language production

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: elicitation model
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the elicitation model used for a research study, especially in the context of psychology.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Erhebungsmodell
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Benennung des Erhebungsmodells, das für eine Studie verwendet wurde, insbesondere im Bereich der Psychologie.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: elicitation software
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indiciation of the name of a software used for the elicitation within a research study, especially in the context of psychology.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Software zur Datenerhebung
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe des Namens der Software, die für die Datenerhebung einer Forschungsstudie verwendet wurde, insbesondere im Bereich der Psychologie.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: elicitation timeframe
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specification of the elicitation timeframe of a research study, especially psychological experiments.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Zeitdimension der Datenerhebung
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Spezifikation der zeitlichen Dimension der Datenerhebung einer Forschungsstudie, insbesondere von psychologischen Experimenten.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: elicitation type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the type of elicitation applied to a research study, especially in the context of psychology.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Datenerhebungstyp
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Benennung des Typs einer Datenerhebung, der bei einer Forschungsstudie angewendet wurde, insbesondere im Bereich der Psychologie.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: elicited
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Investigator asks speaker(s) to produce isolated phonemes/ words/ utterances / grammatical structures.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: предизвикан отговор
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Изследователят моли говорещия/говорещите да произнесе/произнесат изолирани фонеми/думи/изказвания/граматически структури.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: elicitat
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'investigador demana als parlants que pronunciïn fonemes/paraules/frases/estructures gramaticals aïllades.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: potaknut
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Istraživač traži od jednoga ili više govornika da izgovori pojedinačne foneme/riječi/iskaze/gramatičke strukture.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frembragt
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Undersøgeren beder den talende om at frembringe (poducere) isolerede fonemer/ord/ytringer/grammatiske strukturer
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: esile kutsutud
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kõnelejal lastakse esitada isoleeritud foneeme/ sõnu/ lausungeid/ grammatilisi struktuure.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: elisitoitu
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tutkija pyytää puhujaa/puhujia sanomaan erillisiä foneemeja/sanoja/ilmauksia/kieliopillisia rakenteita.
Un investigateur demande à un locuteur de produire des phonèmes ou des mots ou des structures syntaxiques ou des énoncés isolés.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Elizitiert
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Der Wissenschftler fragt Sprecher bestimmte Phoneme/ Wörter, Sätze, grammatikalische Strukturen etc. zu produzieren.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kiváltott
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A kísérletet végző személy megkéri a kísérleti személyt izolált fonémák / szavak / megnyilatkozások / grammatikai szerkezetek produkciójára.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: suscitato
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'investigatore chiede all'interlocutore di produrre fonemi isolati/ parole/ enunciati/ strutture grammaticali.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: izvilināts
wyodrębniony
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Prowadzący badanie prosi mówcę (lub mówców) o wytworzenie izolowanych fonemów / słów / wypowiedzi / fragmentów wypowiedzi odpowiadających określonym strukturom gramatycznym.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: elicitado
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: O investigador solicita ao(s) falante(s) que produzam fonemas/palavras/enunciados/estruturas gramaticais isolados.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: elicitado
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El investigador pide al/a los hablantes que pronuncien fonemas/palabras/frases/estructuras gramaticales aisladas.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: framkallad
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Undersökaren ber talaren/-na producera isolerade fonem/ord/yttranden/grammatiska strukturer.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: email
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The email address of a person or an organization that is involved in creating, managing or accessing resources or tools/services.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: имейл
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Имейл адресът на лице или организация, които участват в създаването, поддържането или достъпа до ресурси или средства/услуги.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: correu electrònic
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'adreça de correu electrònic d'una persona o organització involucrada en la creació, manteniment o accés a recursos o eines/serveis.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: elektronska pošta
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Adresa elektronske pošte osobe ili organizacije koja je uključena u izradu, upravljanje ili pristup resursima ili alatima/uslugama.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: email
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Email adressen til en person eller en organisation der er involveret i skabelsen, vedligeholdelsen eller tilgangen til en ressource eller værktøj/service.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: e-post
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ressursi või rakenduse loomise, haldamise või juurdepääsuga seotud inimese või asutuse e-posti aadress.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sähköposti
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sellaisen henkilön tai organisaation sähköpostiosoite, joka on mukana resurssin luomisessa, johtamisessa tai jolla on pääsy resurssiin tai työkaluun/ palveluun.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: courriel
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Adresse de courriel d'une personne (ou d'une organisation) impliquée dans la création, la gestion ou la distribution d'une ressource, outil ou service.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Email
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Die Email Adresse einer Person oder einer Organisation die in der Erzeugung, dem Management oder der Verarbeitung von Ressourcen oder Werkzeugen/Services involviert ist.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ηλ. δ/νση
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Η ηλεκτρονική διεύθυνση ατόμου ή οργανισμού που ασχολείται με τη δημιουργία, τη διαχείριση ή την πρόσβαση σε γλωσσικούς πόρους ή σε εργαλεία / υπηρεσίες.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: email
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Egy olyan személy vagy szervezet email címe, amely részt vesz valamilyen erőforrás, eszköz/szolgáltatás létrehozásában, fenntartásában vagy elérhetővé tételében.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: email
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'indirizzo di posta elettronica di una persona o di un'organizzazione coinvolta nella creazione, gestione o accesso di una risorsa o strumenti/servizi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: e-pasts
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Resursa vai rīka/pakalpojuma izveidē, uzturēšanā vai piekļuves nodrošināšanā iesaistītās personas vai organizācijas e-pasta adrese.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: adres elektroniczny
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Adres elektroniczny (adres e-mail) osoby lub organizacji, która była zaangażowana w tworzenie zasobu lub narzędzia/usługi, zarządzanie nim lub jego udostępnianie.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: correio electrónico
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: O endereço de email da pessoa ou da organização envolvida na criação, gestão e acesso aos recursos ou ferramentas/serviços.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: correo electrónico
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La dirección de correo electrónico de una persona u organización involucrada en la creación, mantenimiento o acceso a recursos o herramientas/servicios.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: e-post
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: E-postadressen till en person eller organisation som är involverad i att skapa, hantera eller komma åt resurser eller verktyg/service.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: end position
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The end position of the resource such as a time unit for an audio resource (seconds, minutes, etc.) or a chapter, for instance, for a text resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: environment
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Description of the environmental conditions under which the recording was created.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: среда
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Описание на условията на средата, при които е създаден записът.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: entorn
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Descripció de les condicions ambientals en les quals s'ha dut a terme un enregistrament.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: okruženje
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Opis uvjeta u okruženju pod kojima je napravljen zapis.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: omgivelse
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Beskrivelse af omgivelserne, dvs. under hvilke forhold optagelsen fandt sted.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: keskkond
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Salvestuse keskkonnatingimuste kirjeldus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ympäristö
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kuvaus tallennuksen aikana vallinneista ympäristötekijöistä.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: environnement
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Description des conditions dans lesquelles un enregistrement audio ou vidéo a été effectué.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Umgebung
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Beschreibung der Umgebungs-Konditionen unter denen die Aufnahme erzeugt worden ist.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: περιβάλλον
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Περιγραφή των συνθηκών κατά τις οποίες πραγματοποιείται μία καταγραφή
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: környezet
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Azoknak a környezeti feltételeknek a leírása, amelyek a felvétel során adottak voltak.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ambiente
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Descrizione delle condizioni ambientali in cui la registrazione è stata effettuata.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: vide
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ar vidi saistīto resursa izveides nosacījumu apraksts.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: środowisko
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Opis warunków środowiska w jakich nagranie zostało dokonane.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ambiente
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Descrição das condições ambientais subjacentes à criação da gravação.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: entorno
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Descripción de las condiciones ambientales en las que se ha efectuado una grabación.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: miljö
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Beskrivning av de miljömässiga förhållanden under vilka inspelningen tillkom.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: escort interpreting
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Type of interpreting that requires that the interpreter(s) accompany foreign visitors to a country to ensure that they are able to communicate during their stay.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: etymology source
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The reference or source abbreviation for etymology of the lexeme is given here. Use a Range Set.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: event structure
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates the structure of the communication event.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: структура на събитията
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Показва структурата на комуникационното събитие.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: estructura de l'esdeveniment
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fa referència a l'estructura d'un esdeveniment comunicatiu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: struktura događaja
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Označava strukturu komunikacijskog događaja.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: begivenhedsstruktur
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Strukturen af en kommunikationsbegivenhed.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sündmuse struktuur
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Näitab suhtlussündmuse struktuuri.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tapahtuman rakenne
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ilmoittaa viestintätapahtuman rakenteen.
Structure d'un évènement de communication
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Ereignis-Struktur
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Spezifiziert die Struktur des kommunikativen Ereignisses.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: δομή γεγονότος
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Προσδιορίζεται η δομή του επικοινωνιακού γεγονότος
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: esemény struktúra
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A kommunikációs esemény struktúráját adja meg.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: struttura di un evento
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica la struttura di un evento di comunicazione.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: notikuma struktūra
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda, kāda ir saziņas notikuma struktūra.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Struttura tal-avveniment
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tindika l-istruttura tal-avveniment tal-komunikazzjoni.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: struktura zdarzenia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Opisuje strukturę zdarzenia komunikacyjnego.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: estrutura de evento comunicativo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica a estrutura do evento comunicativo.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: estructura de un evento
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hace referencia a la estructura de un evento de comunicación.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: händelsestruktur
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anger strukturen hos en kommunikationshändelse.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: example-based machine translation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A data-driven mode of machine translation that implements a case-based reasoning approach of machine learning at run-time to translate sub-sentential elements by analogy with previously translated segments drawn from a bilingual corpus of parallel texts.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: execution location
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identification of the location where the tool/service is being executed.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: място на изпълнение
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Идентификация на мястото, където се изпълнява средството/услугата.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lloc d'execució
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identificació del lloc on s'executa l'eina/servei.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lokacija izvršenja
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identifikacija lokacije gdje se izvršava alat/usluga.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: afviklingsplacering
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Placeringen hvor værtøjet/servicen bliver afviklet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: täitmiskoht
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Näitab, kus rakendus töötab.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: suorituspaikka
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Työkalun/palvelun suorituspaikan tunniste.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: emplacement d'éxécution
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Lieu ou un outil ou service est exécuté.
Indikation des Ortes an dem das Werkzeug/der Service ausgeführt werden kann.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: futtatási hely
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Azt a helyet adja meg, ahol az eszköz/szolgáltatás fut.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: luogo di esecuzione
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identificazione del luogo in cui è eseguito il tool/servizio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: izpildes vieta
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Informācija par rīka/pakalpojuma izpildes vietu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Il-post tat-twettiq
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: identifikazzjoni tal-post fejn qed titwettaq għodda jew jingħata servizz.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: miejsce działania
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa miejsce, w którym narzędzie/usługa jest uruchomione.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: local de execução
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identificação do local onde a ferramenta/serviço está a ser executada.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lugar de ejecución
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identificación del lugar en que se ejecuta la herramienta/servicio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: exekveringsplats
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identifiering av platsen där verktyget/servicen exekveras.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: experiment investigator
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of whether the experiment investigator was present during the elicitation phase.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Versuchsleiter
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe, ob der Versuchsleiter während der Datenerhebung anwesend war.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: experiment name
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of a short name to identify an experiment/experimental study.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Experimentname
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe eines (Kurz-)Namens zur Identifikation eines Experiments/einer experimentellen Studie.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: experiment title
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the complete title of the experiment/experimental study without any abbreviations.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Experimenttitel
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe des vollständigen Titels eines Experiments/einer experimentellen Studie ohne jegliche Abkürzungen.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: experiment type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specification of the design type used for the elicitation of experimental data within a research study, especially in the field of psychology.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Experimenttyp
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Spezifikation des Designtyps der Datenerhebung, der für experimentelle Daten in einer Forschungsstudie verwendet wurde, insbesondere innerhalb der Psychologie.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: experimental paradigm
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the paradigm chosen for a research study, especially experiments in the field of psychology.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Experimentelles Paradigma
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe des Paradigmas, das einer Forschungsstudie zugrunde liegt, insbesondere Experimente im Bereich der Psychologie.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: experimental setting
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A transmission of the content taking place within a controlled environment for the purpose of testing hypotheses.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: параметри на експеримента
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Трансмисия на съдържанието, което се провежда в контролирана среда с цел - тестване на хипотези.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: configuració experimental
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Una transmissió del contingut que es produeix en un entorn controlat amb l'objectiu de comprovar hipòtesis.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: eksperimentalno okruženje
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Prijenos sadržaja koji se odvija u kontroliranom okruženju u svrhu provjere hipoteza.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: eksperimentel opsætning
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: En kontrolleret opsætning af omgivelserne for, at kunne eftervise hypoteser.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: katseseaded
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hüpoteesi testimise eesmärgil kontrollitud keskkonnas toimuv sisu edastus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: koetilanne
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sisällön siirtäminen kontrolloidussa ympäristössä tarkoituksena hypoteesin testaaminen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dispositif expérimental
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Description du dispositif permettant de tester une hypothèse (dans un environnement contrôlé).
Eine Beschreibung der Festlegungen innerhalb einer kontrollierten Umgebung zum Zwecke des Testens von Hypothesen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kísérleti elrendezés
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kontrollált környezet létrehozása hipotézis ellenőrzés céljából.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: impostazione sperimentale
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Una trasmissione del contenuto che si produce in un ambiente controllato con l'obiettivo di testare ipotesi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: eksperimentāli apstākļi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Satura pārraide kontrolētā vidē, lai pārbaudītu kādu hipotēzi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: warunki eksperymentu
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Transmisja zawartości zachodzi w ramach kontrolowanego środowiska w celu przetestowania hipotezy.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dispositivo experimental
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Transmissão do conteúdo a ter lugar no âmbito de um ambiente controlado com o objectivo de testar hipóteses.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: configuración experimental
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Una transmisión del contenido que se produce en un entorno controlado con el objetivo de comprobar hipótesis.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: experimentell sättning
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: En överföring av det innehåll som försiggår inom en en kontrollerad miljö i syfte att pröva hypoteser.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: face to face
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The transmission of the message ensures full multi-sensorial interaction between speaker and listener(s)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: лице в лице
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Предаването на послание осигурява мултисензорно взаимодействие между говорещия и слушателя/слушателите.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: cara a cara
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La transmissió del missatge garanteix una interacció multisensorial completa entre l'emissor i el receptor.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: licem u lice
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Prijenos poruke osigurava punu višeosjetilnu interakciju između govornika i jednog ili više slušatelja
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ansigt til ansigt
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Overførelsen af beskeden sikrer en fuld multisensorisk interaktion mellem taler og lytter(e).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: näost näkku
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sõnum edastatakse näost näkku, s.t. nii kõneleja kui kuulaja saavad selleks kasutada mitut meelt, eriti nägemismeelt.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kasvokkain
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Viestin siirto mahdollistaa vuorovaikutuksen kaikkien aistien välityksellä puhujan ja kuuntelijan/kuuntelijoiden kanssa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: en vis à vis
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La transmission du message se fait en vis à vis ce qui a pour conséquence que plusieurs sens (en particulier la vue) sont utilisables par les interlocuteurs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Face-to-Face
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Die Übertragung von Informationen von Gesicht zu Gesicht, d.h. unter Einschluss der ganzen multisensortischen Interaktion zwischen Sprecher und Zuhörer.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: szemtől szembe
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az üzenet átadásakor az interakcióban részt vevő beszélő és hallgató(k) összes releváns érzékszerve szerepet kap.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: faccia a faccia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La trasmissione del messaggio assicura la completa interazione multi-sensoriale tra parlante e ascoltatore(i)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: klātienē
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ziņas nodošanas laikā notiek tieša sadarbība starp runātāju un klausītāju.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Wiċċ imb'wiċċ
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: It-trażmissjoni tal-messaġġ tiżgura interazzjoni multisensorjali bejn il-kelliem u s-semmiegħ/a.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: bezpośredniość
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Przekaz wiadomości zapewnia pełną, wielosensoryczną interkację pomiędzy nadawcą i odbiorcą (odbiorcami).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interacção frente a frente
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A transmissão da mensagem garante uma total interacção multi-sensorial entre o falante e o(s) ouvinte(s).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: cara a cara
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La transmisión del mensaje garantiza una interacción multisensorial completa entre el orador y el receptor.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ansikte mot ansikte
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Överföringen av meddelandet säkerställer full multisensorisk interaktion mellan talare och lyssnare.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: false
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Contrary to what is true, erroneous.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: family
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The access to the communication event is restricted to relatives.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: семейство
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Достъпът до комуникационното събитие е ограничено до роднините.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: família
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'accés a un esdeveniment comunicatiu està restringit a familiars.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: obitelj
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Pristup komunikacijskom događaju ograničen je na rođake.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: familie
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Adgangen til kommunikationsbegivenheden er begrænset til slægtninge.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: perekond
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Juurdepääs suhtlussündmusele on üksnes pereliikmetel.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: perhe
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Viestintätapahtumaan osallistuminen on rajattu sukulaisille.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: famille
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La communication se fait entre participants liés par des relations familiales.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Familie
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Der Zugriff auf den kommunikativen Ereignis ist limitiert auf Familien-Mitglieder.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: család
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A hozzáférés a kommunikációs eseményhez a rokonokra van korlátozva.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: famiglia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'accesso all'evento comunicativo è ristretto ai parenti.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ģimene
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Piekļuve saziņas notikumam ir pieejama tikai radiniekiem.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Familja
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L-aċċess għall-komunikazzjoni hu disponibbli għall-qraba biss.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: rodzina
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Dostęp do zdarzenia komunikacyjnego jest ograniczony do krewnych.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: família
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: O acesso ao evento comunicativo restringe-se a familiares.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: familia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El acceso a un evento de comunicación está restringido a familiares.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: familj
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Åtkomsten till kommunikationshändelsen är begränsad till släktingar.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fax number
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The Fax number of a person or an organization that is involved in creating, managing or providing access to resources or tools/services.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: номер на факс
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Номерът на факса на лицето или организацията, които участват в създаването, поддържането или осигуряването на достъп до ресурсите или средствата/услугите.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: número de fax
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El número de fax d'una persona o organització involucrada en la creació, manteniment o la concessió d'accés a recursos o eines/serveis.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: broj telefaksa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Broj telefaksa osobe ili organizacije koja je uključena u izradu, upravljanje ili davanje pristupa resursima ili alatima/uslugama.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: faxnummer
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Faxnummeret til en person eller en organisation der er involveret i skabelsen, vedligeholdelsen af eller adgangen til ressourcer eller værktøjer/tjenester.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: faksinumber
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ressursi või rakenduse loomise, haldamise või juurdepääsuga seotud isiku või asutuse faksinumber.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: faksinumero
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sen henkilön tai organisaation faksinumero, joka tuottaa tai hallitsee resursseja ja/tai työkaluja/palveluita tai päättää niiden käyttöoikeuksista.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: numéro de fax
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Numéro de fax d'une personne ou d'une organisation impliquée dans la création, la maintenance ou la distribution d'une ressource, d'un outil ou d'un service.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Fax Nummer
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Die Fax-Nummer einer Person oder einer Organisation, die in der Erzeugung, dem Management oder der Verarbeitung der Ressourcen oder der Werkzeuge/Services involviert ist.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fax szám
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Egy olyan személy vagy intézmény fax száma, amely részt vesz egy erőforrás, eszköz/szolgáltatás létrehozásában, fenntartásában illetve elérhetővé tételében.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: numero di fax
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Il numero di fax di una persona o di un'organizzazione coinvolta nella creazione, nella gestione e nella distribuzione di una risorsa o di strumenti/servizi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: faksa numurs
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Resursa vai rīka/pakalpojuma izveidē, uzturēšanā vai piekļuves nodrošināšanā iesaistītās personas vai organizācijas faksa numurs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Numru tal-fax
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: In-numru tal-fax ta' persuna jew organizzazzjoni involuta fil-ħolqien, fil-ġestjoni jew fl-għoti ta' aċċess għal riżorsi jew għodda/servizzi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: numer faksu
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Numer faksu osoby lub organizacji, która była zaangażowana w tworzenie zasobu lub narzędzia/usługi, zarządzanie nim lub zapewnienie dostępu do niego.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: número de fax
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: O número de fax da pessoa ou organização envolvida na criação, gestão e disponibilização de acesso aos recursos ou ferramentas/serviços.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: número de fax
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El número de fax de una persona u organización involucrada en la creación, mantenimiento o la concesión de acceso a recursos o herramientas/servicios.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: faxnummer
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Faxnumret till en person eller organisation som är involverad i att skapa, hantera eller ge åtkomst till resurser eller verktyg/tjänster.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: field of research
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specification of the linguistic field for assigning a resource type to its linguistic context.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Forschungsgebiet
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Spezifikation des linguistischen Forschungsbereichs zur Zuordnung eines Ressourcentyps zu einem linguistischen Kontext.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: first publication
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the first publication of a resource (e.g. the first publication year of a book).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: forensic linguistics
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Applications of linguistic science to the domain of law.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: криминоложка лингвистика
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Приложение на лингвистичната наука в областта на правото.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingüística forense
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Aplicacions de la ciència lingüística a l'àmbit del dret.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: forenzička lingvistika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Primjena lingvističke znanosti na područje prava.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: retslingvistik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sprogvidenskab anvendt i juridisk domæne.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kohtulingvistika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Keeleteaduse rakendused õigusvaldkonnas.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: oikeuslingvistiikka
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kielitieteen sovellukset oikeusjärjestelmän piirissä.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: linguistique d'expertise juridique
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Application de la linguitique à l'expertise juficiaire.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Forensische Linguistik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anwendungen der Linguistik im Bereich des Studiums von Gesetzen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: törvényszéki nyelvészet
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A nyelvtudomány jogi területen való alkalmazása.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: linguistica forense
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Applicazione della scienza linguistica al dominio della legge.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tiesu lingvistika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Lingvistikas izmantošana jurisprudencē.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Lingwistika forensika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Applikazzjoni tax-xjenza lingwistika għall-qasam tal-liġi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: językoznawtwo sądowe
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Zastosowanie językoznawstwa w dziedzinie prawa i sądownictwa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: linguística forense
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Aplicações da ciência linguística à área legal.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingüística forense
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Aplicaciones de la ciencia lingüística al ámbito del derecho.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: forensisk lingvistik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Användningar av lingvistik inom rättssystemet.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fully automatic high quality translation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A completely automatic high quality translation of a foreign text into the target language without human pre- or post-editing.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: funder
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Name of the funder of the project.

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Името на спонсора на проекта.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sponsor

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: rahastaja
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Projekti rahastaja nimi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: rahoittaja
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Projektin rahoittajan nimi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: financeur
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nom du financeur (ou d'un des financeurs) du projet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Geldgeber
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Der Name des Geldgebers des Projektes.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: χρηματοδότης
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Όνομα του φυσικού προσώπου ή της υπηρεσίας που χρηματοδοτεί το έργο
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: alapító
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A projekt alapítójának a neve.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: finanziatore
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nome del finanziatore del progetto
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: finansētājs
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Projekta finansētāja nosaukums.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Finanzjatur
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L-isem tal-finanzjatur tal-proġett.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fundator
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nazwa fundatora projektu (organizacji, instytucji lub osoby finasującej projekt).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: financiador
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nome do financiador do projecto.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: general corpus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specification of the corpus type as general corpus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Allgemeines Korpus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Spezifikation des Korpustyps als allgemeines Korpus.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: general linguistics
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The broad study of linguistics without specialization in any subfield or particular reference to a specific linguistic theory.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: обща лингвистика
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Общо изследване на езика без специализиране в някоя конкретна област или без отнасяне към конкретна лингвистична теория.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingüística general
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'estudi ampli de la lingüística, sense especialitzar-se en cap subdisciplina o sense fer referència en particular a una teoria lingüística específica.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: opća lingvistika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Široko definirano lingvističko izučavanje, bez specijalizacije u nekom potpodručju ili posebne referencije na određenu lingvističku teoriju.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: almen lingvistik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sprogvindenskabelige studier i bred forstand, uden specialisering på delområder eller særlig reference til en specifik teori.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: üldkeeleteadus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Üldine keeletadus, ei allu ühelegi alamvaldkonnale ega konkreetsele lingvistilisele teooriale.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: yleinen kielitiede
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kielentutkimus laajasti ilman mitään erikoistumista tieteen osa-alueeseen tai viittausta johonkin tiettyyn kieliteoriaan.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: linguistique générale
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'étude de la langue en général sans référence à un domaine particulier ou à une théorie particulière.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Allgemeine Linguistik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Das breite Studium der Linguistik ohne Spezialisierung auf eine Sub-Disziplin oder ohne Referenz auf eine bestimmte linguistische Theorie.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: általános nyelvészet
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nyelvészet tág értelemben véve: részterületre vagy egy meghatározott elméleti keretre való szűkítés nélkül.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: linguistica generale
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'ampio studio della linguistica senza specializzazione in nessun sottocampo, e senza particolare riferimento ad una specifica teoria linguistica.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: vispārīgā valodniecība
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Valodas pētīšana plašā nozīmē, nespecializējoties kādā nozarē vai neizmantojot kādu konkrētu lingvistiku teoriju.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Lingwistika ġenerali
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L-istudju ġenerali tal-lingwistika mingħajr speċjalizzazzjoni f'ebda qasam speċifiku u mingħajr referenza għal xi teorija lingwistika speċifika.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: językoznawstwo ogólne
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Szeroko rozumiany obszar badań lingwistycznych bez wyróżniania specjalizacji w żadnym z podobszarów lub odwoływania się do określonej teorii lingwistycznej.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: linguística geral
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Estudo generalizado da linguística, sem especialização em nenhum sub-campo nem particular referência a uma teoria linguística específica.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingüística general
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El estudio amplio de la lingüística sin especializarse en ninguna subdisciplina o sin hacer referencia en particular a un teoría lingüística en concreto.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: allmän språkvetenskap
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Allmänna språkvetenskapliga studier utan specialisering i något underområde eller med särskild referens till en specifik språkvetenskaplig teori.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: genre
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The conventionalized discourse or text types of the content of the resource, based on extra-linguistic and internal linguistic criteria.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: жанр
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Установени типове текст или дискурс на съдържанието на даден ресурс посредством екстралингвистични и вътрешнолингвистични критерии.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: gènere
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Els tipus de discurs o text convencionals del contingut del recurs, en base a criteris extralingüístics així com criteris lingüístics interns.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: žanr
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Konvencionalizirani tipovi diskursa ili teksta koji se odnose na sadržaj resursa, na temelju izvanjezičnih i unutarjezičnih kriterija.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: genre
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Konventionelle diskurs- eller teksttyper indeholdt i ressourcen, kendetegnet ved ikke-sproglige og interne sproglige kriterier.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: žanr
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ressursi sisu tavakohased vestluse- või tekstiliigid, keelesiseste ja -väliste kriteeriumite kohaselt.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: genre
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Resurssin sisältämät konventionaaliset diskurssi- tai tekstityypit kielenulkoisten tai kielellisten kriteerien perusteella.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: genre
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Types de textes ou de discours basés sur une typologie autant que possible partagée et faisant appel au contenu de la ressource et à des critères extralinguistiques.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Genre
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Die konventionalisierten Diskurs- oder Text-Typen, die den Inhalt beschreiben und auf außer-linguistischen und linguistischen Kriterien basieren.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: κειμενικό είδος
műfaj
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az erőforrás tartalmának konvencionális diskurzus- vagy szövegtípusai, amelyeket nyelvi illetve nyelven kívüli kritériumok segítségével állapíthatunk meg.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: genere
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tipi di discorso o di testo convenzionali del contenuto della risorsa, basata su criteri extra-linguistici e criteri linguistici interni.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: žanrs
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Vispārpieņemti resursā esošie diskursa vai teksta tipi, kas noteikti pēc lingvistiskiem un ārpuslingvistiskiem kritērijiem.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Ġeneru
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: id-diskors konvenzjonalizzat jew it-tipi ta' test tal-kontenut tar-riżors, ibbażat fuq kriterja extralingwistiċi u kriterji lingwistiċi interni.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: gatunek
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Skonwencjonalizowana klasyfikacja diskursów i tekstów na typy pod względem zawartości oparta na pozajęzykowych i wewnątrzjęzykowych kryteriach.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: género
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Os tipos de discurso ou de texto convencionados no âmbito do conteúdo do recurso, com base em critérios extra-linguísticos e intra-linguísticos.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: género
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Los tipos de discurso o texto convencionales del contenido del recurso, en base a criterios extralingüísticos así como criterios lingüísticos internos.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: genre
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: De konventionaliserade diskurs- eller texttyperna i resursen, baserade på extralingvistiska och interna lingvistiska kriterier.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: geographic coverage
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The geographic scope that the content of a resources is from or about.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: географско покритие
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Географският обхват, откъдето произхожда или за който се отнася ресурсът.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: cobertura geogràfica
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'àmbit geogràfic d'on procedeix el contingut d'un recurs o sobre el qual versa el contingut d'un recurs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: zemljopisna pokrivenost
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Zemljopisni opseg otkuda potječe ili na koji se odnosi sadržaj nekog resursa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: geografisk dækningsområde
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Det geografiske område ressourcen dækker eller stammer fra.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: geograafiline katvus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Geograafilised piirkonnad, kust ressurss pärineb või millest ressurss räägib.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: maantieteellinen kattavuus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Maantieteellinen alue, josta resurssien sisältö on peräisin tai jota se koskee.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: couverture géographique
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La région du monde d'où provient le contenu d'une ressource ou la région du monde (en particulier du point de vue langagier) au sujet duquel parle la ressource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Geographische Abdeckung
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Der geographische Bereich auf den sich der Inhalt der Ressource bezieht.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: γεωγραφική κάλυψη
földrajzi lefedettség
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az a földrajzi kiterjedés, amelyet az erőforrás származása vagy tartalma lefed.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: copertura geografica
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'ambito geografico da cui proviene il contenuto di una risorsa o sul quale si basa il contenuto di una risorsa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ģeogrāfiskā atbilsme
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ģeogrāfiskā vieta, no kurienes ir vai uz ko attiecas resursa saturs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Kopertura ġeografika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ir-reġjon ta' provenjenza tar-riżors, jew ir-reġjun li hu s-suġġett tal-kontenut tar-riżors.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pokrycie geograficzne
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Obszar geograficzny, z którego zawartość zasobu pochodzi lub którego dotyczy.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: cobertura geográfica
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Região geográfica da qual provém ou à qual se refere o conteúdo do recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: cobertura geográfica
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El ámbito geográfico de donde procede el contenido de un recurso o sobre el que versa el contenido de un recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: geografisk täckning
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Det geografiska omfång som innehållet i en resurs kommer från eller handlar om.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: geographical coordinates
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The geographical coordinates identifying the location of the creation of the resource specified as a pair according to the norms.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: географски координати
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Географските координати идентифицират мястото на създаване на ресурса, специфицирани по двойки според нормите.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: coordenades geogràfiques
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Les coordenades geogràfiques que identifiquen el lloc de creació del recurs, especificades com una parella d'acord amb les convencions.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: zemljopisne koordinate
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Zemljopisne koordinate koje određuju lokaciju nastanka resursa, izražene u paru prema standardima.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: geografiske koordinater
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: De geografiske koordinater der identificerer stedet hvor den pågældende ressource er blevet skabt, angivet som et par, i henhold til normen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: geograafilised koordinaadid
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Normidele vastav geograafiliste koordinaatide paar, mis näitab ressursi loomise asukohta.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: maantieteelliset koordinaatit
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Maantieteelliset koordinaatit, jotka ilmoittavat resurssin luomispaikan määritettynä normien mukaisena parina.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: coordonées géographiques
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Les coordonnées géographiques identifiant la localisation de la création d'une ressource sous forme d'une paire (le plus souvent longitude et latitude) dans un système normalisé.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Geographische Koordinaten
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Die geographischen Koordinaten, die den Ort der Erzeugung der Ressource spezifizieren in Form eines Zahlenpaares entsprechend der gültigen Standards.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: γεωγραφικές συντεταγμένες
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Οι γεωγραφικές συντεταγμένες που προσδιορίζουν τον τόπο δημιουργίας ενός πόρου. Δηλώνονται ως ζεύγος με βάση το σχετικό πρότυπο
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: földrajzi koordináták
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Azok a földrajzi koordináták, amelyek a szokásos módon azonosítják az erőforrás keletkezésének a helyét.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: coordinate geografiche
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Le coordinate geografiche per identificare il luogo della creazione della risorsa specificata, come una coppia, secondo le norme.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ģeogrāfiskās koordinātas
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ģeogrāfiskās koordinātas, kas identificē resursa izveides vietu, izteiktas kā pāris atbilstoši normām.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: coordenadas geográficas
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Coordenadas geográficas que identificam o local onde o recurso foi criado, apresentadas como um par, de acordo com as normas.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: coordenadas geográficas
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Las coordenadas geográficas que identifican el lugar de creación del recurso especificadas en pareja siguiendo las convenciones.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: geografiska koordinater
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: De geografiska koordinater som identifierar platsen för skapelsen av den resurs som specificeras som ett par enligt normerna.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: globalization
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The business processes and allocation of resources necessary for taking a product to various markets around the globe.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: glossary
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A terminological list of designations from a subject field, frequently with equivalents in one or more languages.

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Good Quality

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hea kvaliteediga
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hyvä
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: hyvä laatu
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: bonne
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Qualification de la qualité d'une ressource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: gut
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Aufnahme hat eine gute Qualität.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: jó
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Jó minőségű
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: buona

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Buena calidad
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: god

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: harvesting date
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Date when a copy was taken of the original resource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: дата на придобиване
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Датата, когато е взето копие от оригиналния ресурс.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: data de la còpia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data en què s'ha realitzat una còpia del recurs original.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: datum pobiranja
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Datum kada je iz izvornog resursa uzeta kopija.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: høstningsdato
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Datoen da en original ressource blev kopieret.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kogumiskuupäev
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kuupäev, millal originaalressursist koopia tehti.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kopiontipäivämäärä
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Päivämäärä, jolloin alkuperäisestä resurssista otettiin kopio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: date de moissonage
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: date à laquelle une copie d'une ressource (ou de ses métadonnées) a été effectuée.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ημερομηνία συγκομιδής
begyűjtés időpontja
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Másolat készítésének időpontja az eredeti erőforrásról.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: data di raccolta
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data in cui una copia è stata presa dalla risorsa originale.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: savākšanas datums
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Datums, kad no resursa oriģināla tika paņemta kopija.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: data zebrania
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data określająca kiedy kopia została pobrana z oryginalnego zasobu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: data da recolha
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data em que foi tirada uma cópia a partir do original.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fecha de la copia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fecha en que se realizó una copia del recurso original.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: skördedatum
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Datumet då en kopia gjordes av originalresursen.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: historical
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the temporal classification of something, especially a language, as being historical.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: historisch
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe der zeitlichen Klassifikation von etwas, insbesondere einer Sprache, als historisch.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: historical linguistics
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The diachronic study of language change.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: историческа лингвистика
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Диахронното изследване на езиковите промени.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingüística històrica
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'estudi diacrònic dels canvis que es produeixen en una llengua.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: povijesna lingvistika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Dijakronijsko izučavanje jezične promjene.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: historisk lingvistik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Diakronisk analyse af sprogets udvikling.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ajalooline keeleteadus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Keele muutuse diakrooniline uurimine.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: historiallinen kielitiede
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Diakroninen kielen muutoksen tutkimus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: linguistique historique
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Etude diachronique de la langue (et donc de son évolution).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: HistorischeLinguistik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Die diachronische Erforschung der Veränderung von Sprachen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: történeti nyelvészet
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A nyelvváltozás diakrónikus tanulmányozása.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: linguistica storica
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Lo studio diacronico dell'evoluzione del linguaggio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: vēsturiskā valodniecība
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Valodniecības nozare, kas diahroniski pēta valodas pārmaiņas.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Lingwistika storika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: l-istudju diakroniku tal-bidla tal-lingwa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: językoznawstwo diachroniczne
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Studia nad zmianami w języku w ujęciu diachronicznym.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: linguística histórica
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Estudo diacrónico das mudanças linguísticas.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingüística histórica
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El estudio diacrónico de los cambios que se producen en una lengua.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: historisk lingvistik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Diakroniska studier av språkförändring.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: history of linguistics
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Study of the history and development of linguistic science.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: история на лингвистиката
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Изследване на историята и развитието на лингвистиката.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: història de la lingüística
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Estudi de la història i el desenvolupament de la lingüística com a ciència.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: povijest lingvistike
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Izučavanje povijesti i razvitka jezikoslovne znanosti.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingvistisk historie
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Studiet af historien og udviklingen af lingvistik som videnskab.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: keelteaduse ajalugu
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Teadus, mis uurib keeleteaduse ajalugu ja arengut.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kielitieteen historia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kielitieteen historia ja kehitys.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: histoire de la linguistique
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Etude de l'histoire du développement des théories et idées linguistiques.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Geschichte der Linguistik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Analyse der Geschichte und der Entwicklung der linguistischen Wissenschaft.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: a nyelvészet története
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A nyelvtudomány történetével és fejlődésével foglalkozó tudomány.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: storia della linguistica
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Studio della storia e dello sviluppo della scienza linguistica.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: valodniecības vēsture
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Zinātnes nozare, kas pēta valodniecības vēsturi un attīstību.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: L-istorja tal-lingwistika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: l-Istudju tal-istorja u l-iżvilupp tax-xjenza lingwistika.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: historia językoznawstwa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Badania na historią i rozwojem językoznawstwa jako nauki.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: história da linguística
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Estudo da história e do desenvolvimento das ciências da linguagem.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: historia de la lingüística
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Estudio de la historia y el desarrollo de la lingüística como ciencia.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingvistisk historia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Studier av språkvetenskapens historia och utveckling.

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hem-/kontorsinspelningsmiljö

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: homonym number
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Used to differentiate homonym entries (lexemes that are spelled the same but have no semantic relationship). This field comes directly after the lx field and simply contains a number, e.g. 1, 2, or 3, etc. Use a Character Range Set.

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Interaction between a subject and a machine.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: диалог между човек и машина

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Interacció entre un subjecte i una màquina.

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Interakcija između nekog subjekta i stroja.

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Interaktion mellem menneske og maskine.

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Inimese ja arvuti vaheline suhtlus.

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Emberek és gépek közötti interakció.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: människa–maskin-dialog
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Interaktion mellan en människa och en maskin.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hybrid machine translation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A mode of machine traslation that leverages the strengths of statistical and rule-based translation methodologies.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: identifier
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Any kind of unique id.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Identifikator
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Gibt Ids für jegliche Art von Referenzen an.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: illustrator
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of a person illustrating a resource such as a book.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: image
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: image data. "Image" requires a display device (such as a graphical display, a graphics printer, or a FAX machine) to view the information.

imatge
slika
billede
pilt
kuva
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: kuvadata. "Kuvan" esittäminen edellyttää näyttölaitetta kuten graafinen näyttö, graafinen tulostin tai telekopiolaite.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: image
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Au sens banal de représentation visuelle. Pas au sens métaphorique d'image d'un système sur disque par exemple.

εικόνα
kép
immagine

Immaġni
obraz cyfrowy

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe der Programmiersprache, die für die Implementierung von, zum Beispiel, einem Tool verwendet wurde.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: input parameter
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Parameter for a program used for input of a specific type of resource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Eingabeparameter
input resource

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Eingabetyp

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interactive
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Speech events consists of verbal interaction between at least two Actors.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: интерактивен
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Речевите събития съдържат вербално взаимодействие между поне двама актори.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interactiu
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Els esdeveniments orals consisteixen en la interacció entre, com a mínim, dos actors.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interaktivan
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Govorni se događaji sastoje od verbalnih interakcija između barem dvaju aktanata.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interaktiv
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Talebegivenheder består af verbal interaktion mellem mindst to personer.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interaktiivne
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Suhtlus koosneb vähemalt kahe osaleja kõnest.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interaktiivinen
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Keskustelutapahtuma koostuu verbaalisesta interaktiosta ainakin kahden puhujan välillä.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interactif
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Les énoncés consistent en une interaction entre au moins deux acteurs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Interaktiv
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ereignisse, die die verbale Interaktion von mindestens zwei Sprechern umfassen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interaktív
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Olyan beszédesemények amelyek legalább két aktor közötti verbális interakciót tartalmaznak.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interattivo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Gli eventi discorsivi consistono in interazioni verbali tra almeno due attori.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interaktīvs
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Runas aktu veido vismaz divu dalībnieku verbāla mijiedarbība.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interaktywny
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Zdarzenie polegające na wypowiedzi za pomocą mowy, które składa się ze słownej interakcji przynajmniej pomiędzy dwoma aktorami.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interactivo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Eventos discursivos consistem em interacção verbal entre, pelo menos, dois intervenientes.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interactivo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Los eventos orales consisten en la interacción entre al menos dos actores.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interaktiv
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Talhändelser består av verbal interaktion mellan minst två talare.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interactivity
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Characterizes the degree of interactivity between all the participants in the resource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: интерактивност
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Характеризира степента на интерактивност между всички участници в ресурса.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interactivitat
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fa referència al grau d'interactivitat entre tots els participants del recurs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interaktivnost
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Karakterizira stupanj interaktivnosti između svih sudionika u resursu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interaktivitet
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Karakteriserer graden af interaktivitet mellem deltagerne i ressourcen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interaktiivsus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Iseloomustab ressursi kõigi osalejate vahelise interaktiivsuse taset.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: vuorovaikutuksellisuus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Luonnehtii vuorovaikutuksen määrää kaikkien resurssin osanottajien kesken.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interactivité
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Caractérisation du degré d'interactivité entre les acteurs d'un dialogue (ou plurilogue).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Interaktivität
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Charakterisiert den Grad an Interaktivität zwischen den Partizipanten in einer Ressource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: διαδραστικότητα
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Προσδιορίζει τον βαθμό διάδρασης μεταξύ των συμμετεχόντων σε έναν πόρο
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interaktivitás
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A párbeszédben/beszélgetésben részt vevők interaktivitásának mértékét adja meg.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interattività
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Caratterizza il grado di interattività tra tutti i partecipanti della risorsa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interaktivitāte
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Raksturo resursa dalībnieku interaktivitātes pakāpi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Interattivita
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: tikkaratteriza l-grad ta' interattivita bejn il-pateċipanti kollha fir-riżors.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interaktywność
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Charakteryzuje stopień interaktywności pomiędzię uczestnikami w zasobie.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interactividade
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Caracteriza o nível de interactividade entre todos os participantes no recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interactividad
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hace referencia al grado de interactividad entre todos los participantes del recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interaktivitet
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anger graden av interaktivitet mellan alla deltagare i resursen.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interannotator agreement
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An indication of the inter-annotator agreement if appropriate methods where applied.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: съгласие между анотаторите
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Индикация за съгласие между анотаторите, ако са използвани подходящите методи.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: acord entre anotadors
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fa referència a l'acord entre anotadors en cas que s'hagin aplicat els mètodes adequats.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sporazumnost obilježavatelja
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Označava jesu li obilježavatelji suglasni glede primjene prikladnih metoda.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: anntotarorenighed
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indikator for enigheden mellem annotatorer; udtrykker de anvendte metoders sikkerhed.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: märgendajatevaheline ühtivus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Näitab, kuivõrd eri märgendajate märgendused ühtivad, vastavate meetodite kohaselt arvutatult.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interannotaatiosopimus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tieto annotoijien keskinäisestä yksimielisyydestä jos asiaakuuluvaa menettelyä on käytetty.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: accord interannotateurs
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Une indication quand à l'accord interannotateurs dans le cas où des méthodes permettant de calculer cet accord on été utilisées.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Interannotator Übereinstimmung
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indikation der Übereinstimmung zwischen Annotatoren zur Prüfung in wie weit adäquate Methoden eingesetzt wurden.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: συμφωνία επισημειωτών
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Δείκτης της συμφωνίας μεταξύ των επισημειωτών με την εφαρμογή σχετικής μεθοδολογίας
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: annotátorok közötti egyetértés
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az annotátorok közötti egyetértés mérőszáma, megfelelő módszerek alkalmazása mellett.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: accordo tra annotatori
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Un'indicazione dell'accordo tra annotatori nel caso in cui sono stati utilizzati dei metodi appropriati.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: marķētāju viedokļa sakritība
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda marķētāju viedokļa sakritību, ja ir izmantotas attiecīgas metodes.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Ftehim bejn l-annotaturi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: indikazzjoni tal-ftehim bejn l-annotaturi jekk ikun ġew użati l-metodi xierqa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: zgodność pomiędzy anotatorami
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Wskaźnik zgodności pomiędzy anotatorami, który mówi o tym jak bardzo podobne są decyzje podjęte przez niezależnych anotatorów. Wysoka wartość wskaźnika oznacza, że dla tych samych elementów zasobu anotatorzy przypisali te same oznaczenia.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: concordância inter-anotadores
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicação da concordância inter-anotadores caso se apliquem os métodos apropriados.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: acuerdo entre anotadores
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hace referencia al acuerdo entre anotadores en el caso de que se hayan aplicado los métodos adecuados.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interannoterar-överenskommelse
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: En indikation på överenskommelse mellan annoterare om adekvata metoder tillämpats.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interlingua
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An abstract intermediary language used in the machine translation of human language.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interlingual machine translation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A mode of machine translation that (at least theoretically) initially transforms the source text the into an interlingua, i.e., an abstract language-independent representation, and then generates the target language text from the interlingua. Discussion: The main disadvantage of this strategy is the difficulty of creating an adequate interlingua. It should be both abstract and independent of the source and target languages. The more languages added to the translation system, and the more different they are, the more potent the interlingua must be to express all possible translation directions. Another problem is that it is difficult to extract meaning from texts in the original languages to create the intermediate representation. Many translation and even MT experts are highly sceptical of the possibility of applying the interlinagual approach. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Interlingual_machine_translation

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: internationalization
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The process of generalizing a product so that it can handle multiple languages and cultural conventions (such as non-Roman scripts, varying date/time/currency formats, and so forth) without the need for substantial modification.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interpretation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The product of the interpreting process.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interpreting
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The process of understanding and analyzing a spoken or signed message and re-expressing that message faithfully, accurately and objectively in another language, taking the cultural and social context into account.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interpreting audience
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Presence and nature of an audience that the interpreter is signing or voicing for

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interpreting source
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Source modality and language type.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: interpreting target
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Target modality and language type of interpreted language use.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: involvement
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates in how far the researcher was involved in the linguistic event.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: участие
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Показва доколко изследователят участва в лингвистичното събитие.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: implicació
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fa referència al nivell d'implicació de l'investigador en l'esdeveniment lingüístic.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: uključenost
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Označava koliko je istraživač bio uključen u jezični događaj.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: medvirken
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angiver i hvilken udstrækning en forsker var medvirkende i den lingvistiske begivenhed.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: osalus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Näitab, kui palju uurija keelesündmuses osales.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: osallistuneisuus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ilmoittaa missä määrin tutkija osallistui kielelliseen tapahtumaan.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: implication personelle
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indique le degré d'implication du chercheur à l'origine de la ressource dans l'évènement langagier.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Beteiligung
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Gibt an in wie weeit der Wissenschaftler beteiligt war bei dem aufgenommenen linguistischen Ereignis.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: bevonódás
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Azt jelzi, hogy a kutató mennyire volt bevonódva a nyelvi eseménybe.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: coinvolgimento
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica il grado di coinvolgimento del ricercatore nell'evento linguistico.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: līdzdalība
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda, cik lielā mērā pētnieks ir iesaistījies lingvistiskajā notikumā.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Involviment
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: tindika il-livell ta' involviment tar-riċekatur fl-avveniment lingwistiku.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: uczestnictwo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa jak dalece badacz uczestniczył w zdarzeniu lingwistycznym.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: envolvimento
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica o nível de envolvimento do investigador no evento linguístico.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: partipación
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hace referencia al nivel de implicación del investigador en el evento lingüístico.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: medverkan
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anger i hur hög grad forskaren har varit involverad i den lingvistiska processen.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: isbn
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the International Standard Book Number (ISBN).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ismn
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the International Standard Music Number (ISMN).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: key
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Name-value pair to describe domain specific information.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: knowledge representation resource
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Any logical system for ordering, classifying, or categorizing concepts and the relations among them.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: language acquisition
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The study of the process of acquiring human language.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: усвояване на езика
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Изследване на процеса на усвояване на естествения език.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: adquisició del llenguatge
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Estudi del procés d'adquisició del llenguatge humà.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: usvajanje jezika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Izučavanje procesa usvajanja ljudskoga jezika.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sprogtilegnelse
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Studiet af processen ved tilegnelse af sprog.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: keele omandamine
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Teadus, mis uurib loomuliku keele omandamise protsessi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kielen omaksuminen
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tutkimus luonnollisen kielen omaksumisprosessista.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: acquisition langagière
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Etude du processus d'acquisition du langage chez les êtres humains.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Spracherwerb
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Die Analyse des Erwerbs von Sprachen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nyelvelsajátítás
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az emberi nyelv elsajátításával foglalkozó tudomány.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: acquisizione del linguaggio
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Lo studio del processo dell'acquisizione umana del linguaggio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: valodas apguve
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Pēta cilvēka valodas apgūšanas procesu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Akkwiżizzjoni tal-lingwa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: l-istudju tal-proċess ta' akkwiżizzjoni tal-lingwa fil-bnedmin.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nabywanie języka
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Badania nad procesem nabywania języka naturalnego przez człowieka.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: aquisição da linguagem
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Estudo do processo de aquisição da linguagem humana.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: adquisición del lenguaje
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El estudio del proceso de adquisición del lenguaje humano.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: språkinlärning
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Studier av processer för hur mänskligt språk tillägnas.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: language documentation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The theory, methodology, and process of language description and documentation, including linguistic field methods and fieldwork techniques.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: езикова документация
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Теорията, методологията и процесът на описание на езика, включително методите на лингвистичната област и техниките на терен.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: documentació d'una llengua
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La teoria, metodologia i procés de descripció i documentació d'una llengua, incloent els mètodes lingüístics i les tècniques de treball de camp.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dokumentiranje jezika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Teorija, metodologija i postupak opisa i dokumentiranja jezika, uključujući i terenske lingvističke metode i tehnike terenskoga rada.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sprogdokumentation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Teorien, metoden og processen ved sprogbeskrivelse og dokumentation, inklusive lingvistiske feltmetoder og teknikker.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: keele dokumentatsioon
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Keele kirjelduse ja dokumentatsiooni teooria, metodoloogia ja protsess, sealhulgas välitööde meetodid ja tehnikad.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kielen dokumentointi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kielen kuvauksen ja dokumentoinnin teoria, metodologia ja prosessi mukaan lukien lingvistiikan kenttätyön menetelmät ja tekniikka.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: description d'une langue
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La théorie, la méthodologie et les processus mis en oeuvre pour décrire et documenter une langue à la fois en ce qui concerne la description linguistique et le recueil de données (travail de terrain).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Sprach-Dokumentation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Die Theorie, Methodik und der Prozess der Sprach-Beschreibung und Dokumentation einschließlichlinguistischer Feldmethoden und -techniken.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nyelvdokumentáció
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A nyelvleírás és dokumentáció elmélete, módszertana és folyamata, amely magában foglalja a nyelvészeti terepmunka módszertanát és különböző technikáit.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: documentazione su una lingua
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La teoria, la metodologia, e il processo di descrizione e documentazione della lingua, incluso metodi di campo linguistico e tecniche di lavoro sul campo.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: valodas dokumentācija
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Valodas apraksta un dokumentācijas teorija, metodoloģija un process, ieskaitot lauka pētījumu metodes un paņēmienus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Dokumentazzjoni tal-lingwa
