rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: it-teorija, il-metodolġija, u l-proċess ta' deskrizzjoni u dokumentazjoni tal-lingwa, inklużi l-metodi prattiċi tal-lingwistika u t-tekniki tal-istudju prattiku tal-lingwistika.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dokumentowanie języka naturalnego
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Teoria, metodologia i proces opisywania i dokumentowania języka naturalnego z uwzględnieniem lingwistycznych badań terenowych oraz technik pracy w terenie.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: documentação de línguas
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A teoria, metodologia e processo de descrição e documentaçao das línguas, incluindo métodos de línguistica de campo e técnicas de trabalho de campo.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: descripción de un idioma
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La teoría, metodología y proceso de descripción y documentación de un idioma, incluyendo los métodos lingüísticos y las técnicas de trabajo de campo.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: språkdokumentation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Teorin, metoden och processen bakom språkbeskrivning och -dokumentation, inklusive lingvistiska fältmetoder och fältarbetstekniker.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: language id
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identifier of the language as defined by ISO 639 that is included in the resource or supported by the tool/service.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: езиков идентификатор
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Идентификатор на езика, дефиниран от ISO 639, който е включен в ресурса или се поддържа от средството/услугата.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: codi de llengua
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identificador de la llengua que s'inclou en el recurs o que és suportada per l'eina/servei, segons el que disposa la norma ISO 639.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: identifikator jezika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identifikator jezika, kako je definiran u ISO 639, uključen u resurs ili podržan alatom/uslugom.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sprogidentifikator
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identifikator for sproget der indgår i ressourcen eller er understøttet af værktøjet/servicen, i henhold til ISO 639.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: keele id
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ressursis sisalduva või rakenduse poolt toetatava keele identifikaator ISO 639 kohaselt.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kielitunnus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: ISO 639:n mukainen tunnus kielelle, joka sisältyy resurssiin tai jota tuetaan työkalun/palvelun avulla.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: code de langue
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Code de langue tel que défini dans la norme ISO 639. Cette langue pouvant être présente dans une ressource ou faire partie des langues prises en charge par un outil ou un service.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Sprach Identifikator
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identifikator der Sprache entsprechend dem ISO 639 Standard, die in der Ressource enthalten ist bzw. von dem Werkzeug/Service unterstützt wird.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nyelvi azonosító
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: ISO 639 által definiált azonosító, azon nyelvek azonosítására, amelyek az erőforrás részét képezik, vagy támogatva vannak az eszköz/szolgaltatás által.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: codice della lingua
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identificatore della lingua come definito da ISO 639 che è incluso nella risorsa o supportato dal tool/servizio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: valodas identifikators
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: ISO 639 definētais valodas identifikators, kas ir iekļauts resursā vai ko atbalsta rīks/pakalpojums.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ID tal-lingwa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: il-kodiċi tal-lingwa kif definit permezz tal-ISO 639 inkluża fir-riżors jew appoġġata mill-għodda/servizz.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: identyfikator języka
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa język, który występuje w zasobie lub jest wspierany przez narzędzie/usługę; język jest nazwany w sposób zdefiniowany w ISO 639.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: código de língua
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identificador da língua incluída no recurso ou apoiada pela ferramenta/serviço, conforme estipulado pel ISO 639.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: código de idioma
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identificador del idioma según lo dispuesto en la norma ISO 639 que se incluye en el recurso o es soportado por la herramienta/servicio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: språkidentifikation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identifikation av språket enligt ISO 639, som inkluderas i resursen eller stöds av verktyget/tjänsten.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: language in
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An identifier of the language in which the description of the resource is written.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: езиков индекс
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Идентификатор на езика, в който е дадено описание на ресурса.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: llengua de la documentació
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Un identificador de la llengua en què està escrita la documentació del recurs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: jezik opisa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identifikator jezika na kojemu je napisan opis resursa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sprog på
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identifikator for ressourcebeskrivelsens sprog.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kirjelduskeel
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ressursi kirjelduse keele identifikaator.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kuvauksen kieli
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tunnus kielelle, jolla resurssin kuvaus on kirjoitettu.
Identifiant d'une langue dans laquelle la description d'une ressource est écrite.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Sprache-In
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ein Identifikator der Sprache in der die Beschreibung der Ressource geschrieben ist.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: a dokumentáció nyelve
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Annak a nyelvnek az azonosítója, amelyen az erőforrásra vonatkozó dokumentációt írták.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingua della documentazione
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Un identificatore della lingua in cui è scritta la descrizione della risorsa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: valodā
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Resursa apraksta valodas identifikators.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Lingwa tad-dokumentazzjoni
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: identifikazzjoni tal-lingwa li hija miktuba fiha d-deskrizzjoni tar-riżors.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: język opisu
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa język, w którym został napisany opis zasobu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: língua in
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identificador da língua na qual a descrição do recurso foi escrita.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: idioma de la documentación
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Un identificador del idioma en el que está escrita la documentación del recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: språk in
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: En identifikation av det språk på vilket beskrivningarna av resursen är skrivna.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: language mediation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The communication of meaning from one language to another by either written (translation) or oral (interpreting) means.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: language name
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A human understandable name of the language that is used in the resource or supported by the tool/service.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: име на езика
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Име на езика, което е разбираемо за човека и което се използва в ресурса или се поддържа от средството/услугата.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nom de la llengua
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nom de la llengua emprada en el recurs o suportada per l'eina/servei, escrit en llenguatge natural.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: naziv jezika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Čovjeku razumljiv naziv jezika koji se rabi u resursu ili koji je podržan alatom/uslugom.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sprogets navn
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: En menneskeligt forståeligt navn på det sprog, der er brugt i ressourcen eller værktøjet/servicen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: keele nimi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ressursis sisalduva või rakenduse poolt toetatava keele inimloetav nimetus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kielen nimi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kielen luonnollinen nimi, jota käytetään resurssissa tai jota tuetaan työkalun/palvelun avulla.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nom de langue
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Le nom d'une langue, en termes directement compréhensible pour des humains, utilisée dans une ressource ou prise en compte par un outil ou un service
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Sprachname
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ein lesbarer Name der SPrache die in der Ressource enthalten ist bzw. von dem Werkzeug/Service unterstützt wird.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: γλώσσα
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Το όνομα της γλώσσας που χρησιμοποιείται σε έναν πόρο ή υποστηρίζεται από ένα εργαλείο/ υπηρεσία
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nyelv neve
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az erőforrás részét képező vagy az eszközök/szolgáltatás által támogatott nyelvek ember által érthető neve.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nome della lingua
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Un nome comprensibile all'uomo della lingua usata nella risorsa o supportata dal tool/servizio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: valodas nosaukums
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Cilvēkam saprotams resursā izmantotās vai rīka/pakalpojuma atbalstītās valodas nosaukums.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: L-isem tal-lingwa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Isem li jkun jiftiehem tal-lingwa użata fir-riżors jew appoġġata permezz tal-għodda/servizz.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nazwa języka
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nazwa języka, który jest używany w zasobie lub jest wspierany przez narzędzie/usługę, wyrażona w sposób zrozumiały dla człowieka.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nome da língua
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nome da língua usada no recurso ou apoiada pela ferramenta/serviço, que seja entendido pelo homem.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nombre del idioma
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nombre del idioma que se emplea en el recurso o que es soportado por la herramienta/servicio escrito en lenguaje natural.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: språknamn
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ett av människor begripligt namn på det språk som används i resursen eller stöds av verktyget/tjänsten.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: language script
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the writing system used to represent the language in form of a four letter code as it is defined in ISO-15924.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: езиков код
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Показва коя система за записване се използва, за да се представи езикът във форма на 4-буквен код, дефиниран в ISO-15924.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: codi d'escriptura
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicació del sistema d'escriptura emprat per representar la llengua, expressat mitjançant un codi de quatre caràcters, d'acord amb el que estableix la la norma ISO-15924.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kod pisma
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Oznaka pismovnog sustava koji se rabi za reprezentaciju jezika, u obliku četveroslovnog koda kako je definirano u ISO-15924.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: skriftsystem
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identifikation af skriftsystemet der er brugt til at repræsentere sproget vha. en kode bestående af fire bogstaver som er fastlagt i ISO-15924.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: keele kiri
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Näitab keele kirjasüsteemi neljatähelise koodina, ISO-15924 kohaselt.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kielen kirjoitusjärjestelmä
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kielen kirjoitusjärjestelmä ISO-15924:n mukaisena neljän kirjaimen koodina.
Identification du système d'écriture utilisé pour transcrire une langue tel que défini dans la norme ISO-15924.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Sprach-Schreibschrift
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indikation des Schreibsystems in Form eines 4-Buchstaben Codes wie in ISO-15924, das zur Repräsentation der Sprache verwendet worden ist.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: a nyelv írása
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az ISO-15924 által definiált 4 betűs kód, amely megadja az adott nyelv reprezentációjára használt írásrendszert.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: codice di scrittura
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicazione del sistema di scrittura usato per rappresentare la lingua sotto forma di un codice di quattro lettere, così come è definito in ISO-15924
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: valodas skripts
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda, kādā rakstības sistēmā valoda apzīmēta ar četrzīmju kodu atbilstoši standartam ISO-15924.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Sistema tal-kitba tal-lingwa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: indikazzjoni tas-sistema tal-kitba użata biex tirrappreżenta l-lingwa f'forma ta' kodiċi b'erba' ittri kif huwa definit f'ISO-15924.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nazwa alfabetu
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa za pomocą czteroliterowego kodu zgodnego z definicją w ISO-15924 system pisma (alfabet), który został zastosowany w zasobie do zapisu wyrażeń językowych.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: código de língua
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicação do sistema de escrita usado para representar uma língua sob a forma de um código com quatro letras, conforme definido no ISO-15924.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: código de escritura
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Referencia al sistema de escritura empleado para representar el idioma expresado mediante un código de cuatro caracteres siguiendo lo establecido en la norma ISO-15924.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: språkskript
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anger det skrivsystem som används för att representera språket i form av en fyrbokstavskod enligt ISO-15924.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: language service / product
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An act or a variety of work performed using linguistic resources or the products of such work.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: last update
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date of the last update.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: последно обновяване
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Датата на последното обновяване.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: darrera actualització
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La data de la darrera actualització.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: zadnje ažuriranje
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Datum zadnjega ažuriranja.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sidste opdatering
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Datoen for den sidste opdatering.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: viimane uuendus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Viimase uuenduse kuupäev.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: viimeisin päivitys
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Viimeisen päivityksen päivämäärä.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dernière mise à jour
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Date de la plus récente mise à jour d'une ressource, d'un outi ou d'un service.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: τελευταία ενημέρωση
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Η ημερομηνία της τελευταίας ενημέρωσης ενός πόρου ή εργαλείου
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: utolsó frissítés
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az utolsó frissítés dátuma
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ultimo aggiornamento
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La data dell'ultimo aggiornamento.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pēdējais atjauninājums
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Pēdējā atjauninājuma datums.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: L-aħħar aġġornament
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: id-data tal-aħħar aġġornament.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ostatnia aktualizacja
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data ostatniej aktualizacji.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: última actualização
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data da última actualização.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: última actualización
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La fecha de la última actualización.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sista uppdateringen
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Datumet för den sista uppdateringen.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: learner corpus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specification of the type of a corpus as a learner corpus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Lernerkorpus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Spezifikation des Korpustyps als ein Lernerkorpus.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: legal interpreting
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Interpreting that is focused either on interpreting in courtroom settings (judicial or judiciary interpreting) or quasi-judicial interpreting (interpreting that takes place in other legal settings).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: legal status
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Describes the legal status of the organization that is involved in creating, managing or providing access to a resource or a tool/service.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: правен статус
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Описва правния статус на организацията, която участва в създаването, поддържането или осигуряването на достъп до ресурса или средството/услугата.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: estatus legal
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fa referència a l'estatus legal de l'organització involucrada en la creació, manteniment o concessió d'accés a un recurs o eina/servei.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pravni status
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Opisuje pravni status organizacije uključene u izradu, upravljanje ili davanje pristupa nekom resursu ili alatu/usluzi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: juridisk status
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Beskriver den organisations juridiske status som er involveret i en ressources udarbejdelse/ vedligeholdelse eller giver adgang til en ressource, et værktøj eller en service.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: õiguslik seisund
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kirjeldab ressursi või rakenduse loomise, haldamise või juurdepääsuga seotud asutuse õiguslikku seisundit.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: laillinen asema
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Osoittaa sen organisaation laillisen aseman, joka tuottaa tai hallitsee resursseja ja/tai työkaluja/palveluita tai päättää niiden käyttöoikeuksista.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: personalité juridique
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Décrit la personalité juridique d'une organisation impliquée dans la création, la gestion ou la mise à disposition d'une ressource, d'un outil ou d'un service.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Rechts-Status
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Beschreibt den Rechts-Status der Organisation die involviert ist in der Erzeugung, dem Management oder der Verarbeitung der Ressource oder des Werkzeuges/Services.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: νομικό καθεστώς
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Περιγράφει το νομικό καθεστώς του οργανισμού ο οποίος δημιουργεί ή/και διαχειρίζεται έναν πόρο ή εργαλείο/υπηρεσία
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: jogi forma
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Annak a szervezetnek a jogi formáját adja meg, amely részt vett az erőforrás vagy eszköz/szolgáltatás létrehozásában, fenntartásában vagy elérhetővé tételében.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: status legale
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Descrive lo status legale dell'organizzazione conivolta nella creazione, gestione e distribuzione della risorsa o tool/servizio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: juridiskais statuss
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda, kāds juridiskais statuss ir organizācijai, kas iesaistīts resursa vai rīka/pakalpojuma izveidē vai piekļuves nodrošināšanā tam.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: status prawny
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Opisuje status prawny organizacji, która była zaangażowana w tworzenie zasobu lub narzędzia/usługi, zarządzanie nim lub zapewnienie dostępu do niego.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: estatuto legal
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Descreve o estatuto legal da organização envolvida na criação, gestão e disponibilização do recurso ou da ferramenta/serviço.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: status legal
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hace referencia al status legal de la organización involucrada en la creación, mantenimiento o concesión de acceso a un recurso o herramienta/servicio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: legal status
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Beskriver den legala statusen för den organisation som deltar i skapandet av, hanteringen av eller åtkomsten till en resurs eller verktyg/tjänst.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: legal translation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The preparation of written translations of documents related to criminal and/or civil matters, such as medical or psychological evaluations; forensic reports (drug analyses, DNA reports or medical reports); divorce decrees; foreign judgments; extradition documents; statutes and contracts, or other relevant documents.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lexical unit
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicate the type(s) of headword(s) used in the Lexicon.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: лексикална единица
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Показва типа/типовете на заглавната дума/заглавните думи, използвана/използвани в лексикона.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: unitat lèxica
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fa referència al/s tipus de paraula/es clau emprada/es en un lèxic.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: leksička jedinica
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Označava tip ili tipove stožernice odnosno stožernica koje se rabe u Leksikonu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: leksikalsk enhed
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angiver hvilken type eller hvilke typer af opslagsord er anvendt i leksikonnet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: leksikaalne üksus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Näitab leksikonis kasutatavate märksõna(de) liiki.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: leksikaalinen yksikkö
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Leksikkoon talletettujen pääsanojen tyyppi/tyypit.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: unité lexicale
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Type possible d'une entrée principale dans'un lexique.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Lexikalische Einheit
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Beschreibt die Art des Kopfwortes des Lexikons.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: λεξική μονάδα
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Προσδιορίζεται ο τύπος των εγγραφών ενός λεξικού
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lexikai egység
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A lexikonban használt címszó vagy címszavak típusát adja meg.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: unità lessicale
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica il tipo o i tipi di lemma/i usati nel Lessico.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: leksikas vienība
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda, kāda tipa (vai tipu) šķirkļavārdi tiek izmantoti leksikonā.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Unita lessikali
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: tindika t-tip/i ta' kelma/kliem ewlieni użat fil-Lessiku.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: forma hasłowa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa typ (lub typy) słowa kluczowego/hasła (lub haseł) użytych w leksykonie.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: unidade lexical
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica o tipo ou tipos de entradas lexicais usadas no léxico.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: unidad léxica
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hace referencia al tipo o los tipos de palabra(s) clave empleadas en un léxico.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lexikal enhet
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anger typen/typerna av huvudord som används i lexikonet.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lexicographical dictionary
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A reference book containing an alphabetical list of words, with information given for each word, usually including meaning, pronunciation, and etymology.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lexicography
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The process of compiling or studying lexical resources and dictionaries, either monolingual or multilingual.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: лексикография
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Процесът на изработване или изучаване на лексикалните ресурси и речниците - едноезикови и многоезикови.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lexicografia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El procés de compilació o estudi de recursos lèxics i diccionaris, ja siguin monolingües o multilingües.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: leksikografija
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Postupak prikupljanja ili izučavanja leksičkih resursa i rječnika, jednojezičnih ili višejezičnih.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: leksikografi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Udarbejdelse eller undersøgelse af monolingvale eller multilingvale leksikalske ressourcer og ordbøger
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: leksikograafia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Leksikaalsete ressursside ja sõnastike, nii üks- kui mitmekeelsete, koostamise või uurimise protsess.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: leksikografia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Yksi- tai monikielisten leksikaalisten resurssien ja sanakirjojen laatiminen tai tutkiminen .
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lexicographie
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Etude et/ou réalisation de ressources lexicales ou de dictionnaires monolingues ou multilingues.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Lexikographie
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Der Prozess der Zusammenstellung oder der Analyse monolingualer oder multilingualer lexikalischer Ressourcen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: λεξικογραφία
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Η διαδικασία δημιουργίας και μελέτης λεξικών πόρων, μονόγλωσσων ή πολύγλωσσων
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lexikográfia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Lexikai erőforrások és szótárak kompillálásának vagy tanulmányozásának folyamata, melyek lehetnek egy- vagy többnyelvűek.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lessicografia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Il processo di compilazione e studio di risorse lessicali e di dizionari, monolingue o multilingue.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: leksikogrāfija
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Leksikas resursu un vārdnīcu (gan vienvalodas, gan vairākvalodu) sastādīšana un pētīšana.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Lessikografija
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: il-proċess ta' ġbir jew studju ta' riżorsi lessikali u dizzjunarji, kemm dawk monolingwi kif ukoll dwk multilingwi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: leksykografia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Proces kompilacji lub badań nad zasobami językowymi i słownikami, zarówno jednojęzycznymi jak i wielojęzycznymi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lexicografia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Processo de compilação ou de estudo de recursos lexicais e dicionários, quer monolingues, quer multilingues.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lexicografía
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El proceso de compilación o estudio de recursos léxicos y diccionarios, ya sean monolingües o multilingües.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lexikografi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Att sammanställa och studera antingen enspråkiga eller flerspråkiga lexikala resurser och ordböcker.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lexicon language status
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The function of a language in a lexical resource (resouce internal function: a vernacular language as a target language of a linguistic description; a metalanguage of a linguistic description, normally a language of broader spreading, e.g. English) or in a language speaking community (resource external function: a national language as a state or official language of a vernacular language speaking community; a regional language as a language of communication in a certain geographic area).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lexicon type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A description of the type of the lexicon.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: вид на лексикона.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Описание на вида на лексикона.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tipus de lèxic
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Una descripció del tipus de lèxic.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tip leksikona
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Opis tipa leksikona.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: leksikontype
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: En beskrivelse af leksikontypen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: leksikoni liik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Leksikoni liigi kirjeldus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: leksikon tyyppi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Leksikon tyypin kuvaus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: type de lexique
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Description du type de lexique (voir exemples).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Lexikon-Typ
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Eine Beschreibung des Types des Lexikons.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: τύπος λεξικού
a lexikon típusa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A lexikon típusának leírása.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tipo di lessico
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Una descrizione del tipo di Lessico.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: leksikona tips
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Leksikona tipa apraksts.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Tip ta' lessiku
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: deskrizzjoni tat-tip ta' lessiku.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: typ leksykonu
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Opis typu leksykonu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tipo de léxico
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Descrição do tipo de léxico.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tipo de léxico
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Una descripción del tipo del léxico.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: typ av lexikon
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: En beskrivning av typen av lexikon.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: licence type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the type of a copyright licence.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Lizenztyp
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe des Typs einer Lizenz, unter der etwas kopiert oder weitergegeben werden kann.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: license
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A description of the licensing conditions under which the resource can be used.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: лиценз
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Описание на условията на лиценза, при които може да се използва ресурсът.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: llicència
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Una descripció de les condicions de llicència sota les quals es pot emprar un recurs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: licencija
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Opis uvjeta licenciranja po kojima se resurs može koristiti.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: licens
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: En beskrivelse af licensbetingelserne for brugen af ressourcen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: litsents
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ressursi kasutuslitsentsi tingimuste kirjeldus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lisenssi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kuvaus ehdoista, joiden vallitessa resurssia saa käyttää.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: license
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Une description de la licence permettant d'utiliser une ressource, un outil ou un service.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Lizenz
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Eine Beschreibung der Lizenz-Konditionen unter denen die Ressource verwendet werden kann.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: άδεια χρήσης
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Περιγραφή των συνθηκών άδειας χρήσης με βάση της οποίας χρησιμοποιείται ένας πόρος
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: licensz
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A licenszfeltételek leírása, amelyek az erőforrás használatát szabályozzák.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: licenza
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Una descrizione delle condizioni di licenza sotto cui la risorsa può essere usata.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: licence
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Resursas izmantotājam izvirzīto licencēšanas nosacījumu apraksts.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: licencja
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Opis warunków licencji na jakiej dany zasób może być użyty.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: licença
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Descrição das condições da licença, ao abrigo das quais o recurso pode ser usado.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: licencia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Una descripción de las condiciones de licencia bajo las que se puede emplear un recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: licens
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: En beskrivning av de licensvillkor under vilka resursen kan användas.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lifecycle status
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Names the status of a resource according to a lifecycle model.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Lifecycle Status
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Bezeichnung für den Status einer Ressource gemäß einem Modell für Lifecycles.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: linguistic subject
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Provides a controlled vocabulary for describing the subject matter of a resource as relevant to a particular subfield of linguistics.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: лингвистичен обект
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Осигурява контролиран речник за описание на темата на ресурса като част от определено равнище на лингвистиката.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tema lingüístic
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Proporciona un vocabulari controlat per descriure el tema d'un recurs en referència a la seva rellevància per a una subdisciplina lingüística concreta.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingvističko područje
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Daje kontrolirani rječnik za opis predmeta nekog resursa, relevantan za određeno potpodručje lingvistike.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingvistisk emne
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Giver et kontrolleret vokabular til beskrivelse af ressourcens emne hvis emnet er relevant for et bestemt lingvistisk delområde.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: keeleteaduse valdkond
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Annab piiratud sõnavara ressursi seostamiseks asjakohaste keeleteaduse valdkondadega.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingvistinen aihe
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kontrolloidun sanaston mukainen kuvaus resurssin aiheesta jonkin kielitieteen osa-alueen kannalta.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: champ linguistique
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Vocabulaire contrôlé pour associer à une ressource des champs linguistiques pour l'étude desquels la ressource est pertinente.
Das Element bietet ein kontrolliertes Vokabular, um die linguistische Sub-Disziplin zu bezeichnen, für die der Gegenstand der Ressource besonders relevant ist .
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nyelvészeti tárgy
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kontrollált szókincs egy erőforrás témájának leírására, amennyiben az releváns egy nyelvészeti részterület számára.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: campo linguistico
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Offre un vocabolario controllato per descrivere l'oggetto di una risorsa in riferimento alla sua rilevanza per un sottocampo linguistico.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingvistiskā tematika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sniedz kontrolētu vārdu krājumu kādai valodniecības nozarei aktuālās resursa tematikas aprakstīšanai.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: suġġett lingwistiku
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: tipprovdi vokabularju kkontrollat biex tiġi deskritta t-tema ta' riżors skont ir-relevanza għal qasam partikolari tal-lingwistika.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tematyka w ujęciu językoznawczym
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Definiuje kontrolowany słownictwo do opisu tematycznego zasobu w odniesieniu do określonej poddziedziny językoznawstwa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tema linguístico
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fornece um vocabulário controlado para descrever o tema de um dado recurso, de acordo com sua a relevância para um sub-campo particular da linguística.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tema lingüístico
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Facilita un vocabulario controlado para describir el tema de un recurso en referencia a su relevancia para una subdisciplina lingüística concreta.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingvistiskt ämne
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ger ett kontrollerat vokabulär för att beskriva innehållet i en resurs som relevant för ett särskilt underområde av lingvistiken.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: linguistic theories
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Theories (argued to be) fundamental to linguistic science, often spanning more than one subfield such as phonology and syntax.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: лингвистични теории
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Теории (за които се смята), че са основополагащи за лингвистичната наука. Те често обхващат повече от една област, например фонология и синтаксис.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: teories lingüístiques
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Teories (que es consideren) essencials per a la ciència lingüística i que sovint comprenen més d'una disciplina, com per exemple, la fonologia i la sintaxi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingvističke teorije
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Teorije (za koje se tvrdi) da su od temeljne važnosti za jezikoslovlje, a često se protežu na više od jednog potpodručja, poput fonologije i sintakse.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingvistiske teorier
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Grundlæggende sprogvidenskabelige teorier; de vedrører ofte mere end et delområde, fx fonologi og syntaks.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingvistilised teooriad
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Teooriad, mida (vaieldavalt) peetakse keeleteaduses fundamentaalseteks, sageli hõlmavad rohkem kui üht alamvaldkonda, nagu fonoloogia või süntaks.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kielitieteelliset teoriat
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Teoriat, joita on tarjottu perustaksi kielitieteelle ja jotka yleensä kattavat useita kielitieteen osa-alueita (esim. fonologian ja syntaksin).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: théories linguistiques
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Théories (qui se veulent) fondamentales pour l'étude de la langue et qui, le plus souvent, couvrent plus d'un champ tels que phonologie ou syntaxe.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Linguistische Theorie
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Theorien sind fundamentell für die linguistische Forschung, oftmals umfassen sie mehrere Sub-Disziplinen wie z.B. Phonologie und Syntax.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nyelvészeti elméletek
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Elméletek, amelyek (sokak szerint) alapvetőek a nyelvtudomány számára, gyakran több részterületet is felölelnek, mint például a szintaxis és fonológia.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: teorie linguistiche
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Teorie (come solitamente sono definite) fondamentali per la scienza linguistica, che spesso si estendono a più di un sottocampo, come per esempio la fonologia e la sintassi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingvistiskās teorijas
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Valodniecības pamatteorijas (par tādām uzskatītas), kas bieži aptver vairāk nekā vienu tās nozari (piemēram, fonoloģija vai sintakse).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Teoriji lingwistiċi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Teoriji (li wieħed jista' jgħid) li huma fundamentali għax-xjenza lingwistika, li sikwit ikopru aktar minn subqasam wieħed, bħall-fonoloġija u s-sintassi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: teoria lingwistyczna
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Teorie, które są postulowane jako fundamentalne dla językoznawstwa, często obejmujące więcej niż jedną z dziedzin takich jak fonologia lub składnia.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: teorias linguísticas
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Teorias consideradas fundamentais para as ciências da linguagem, muitas vezes abrangendo mais do que um sub-campo, tal como a fonologia ou a sintaxe.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: teorías lingüísticas
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Teorías (que se suelen sostener como) esenciales para la ciencia lingüística y que a menudo abarcan más de una disciplina, como por ejemplo la fonología y la sintaxis.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingvistiska teorier
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Teorier som är/anges vara fundamentala inom språkvetenskapen och som ofta täcker mer än ett underområde, som fonologi och syntax.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: linguistics and literature
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The application of linguistic analysis to literary texts, e.g., fiction, drama, or poetry.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: лингвистика и литература
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Прилагането на лингвистичен анализ към литературни текстове, напр. фикция, драма или поезия.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingüística i literatura
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'aplicació de l'anàlisi lingüística a textos literaris, com per exemple prosa, teatre o poesia.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingvistika i književnost
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Primjena lingvističke analize na književne tekstove, npr. beletristiku, dramu ili poeziju.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingvistik og litteratur
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Lingvistisk analyse anvendt på litterære tekster, fx fiktion, drama eller poesi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: keeleteadus ja kirjandus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Keeleteaduse rakendus kirjanduslike tekstide, näiteks ilukirjanduse, näitekirjanduse või luuletuste analüüsiks.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kielitiede ja kirjallisuus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Lingvistisen analyysin soveltaminen kirjallisiin teksteihin, esim. kaunokirjallisuuteen, draamaan tai runouteen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: linguistique appliquée à l'étude de la littérature
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Application des méthodes d'analyse linguistique à l'étude de textes littéraires (par exemple, textes de fiction, théâtre ou poésie).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Linguistik und Literatur
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Die Anwendung linguistischer Analyse auf literarische Texte wie z.B. auf Science Fiction, Dramen oder Poesie.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nyelvészet és irodalom
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A nyelvészeti elemzés alkalmazása irodalmi szövegekre, például regényekre, drámára vagy költészetre.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: linguistica e letteratura
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'applicazione dell'analisi linguistica a testi letterari, come ad esempio testi poetici, teatrali, narrativi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: valodniecība un literatūra
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Literāru tekstu, piemēram, prozas, drāmas vai dzejas, lingvistiska analīze.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Il-lingwistika u l-litteratura
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: l-applikazzjoni ta' analiżi lingwisitka għal testi litterarji, bħal drammi jew poeżija.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: językoznawstwo i literatura
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Zastosowanie lingwistycznej analizy do tekstów literackich, np. prozy, dramatu lub poezji.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: linguística e literatura
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Aplicação de análise linguística a textos literários, por exemplo, ficção, drama ou poesia.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingüística y literatura
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La aplicación del análisis lingüístico a textos literarios, como por ejemplo prosa, teatro o poesía.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingvistik och litteratur
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Användning av lingvistisk analys på litterära texter, t.ex. drama och poesi.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: literary translation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Type of translation where written literature is rendered from one language into another.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: literature
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The content narrates an imaginary event and is valued for its beautiful language.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: литература
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Съдържанието предава въображаемо събитие и се цени заради красотата на изразяване.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: literatura
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El contingut narra un esdeveniment imaginari i es valora per la bellesa del llenguatge emprat.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: književnost
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sadržaj prepričava izmišljeni događaj te se smatra vrijednim zbog ljepote svojega jezika.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: litteratur
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indholdet fortæller en opdigtet begivenhed og er værdsat for dens smukke sprog.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kirjandus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sisu koosneb kujuteldava sündmuse jutustusest, mida hinnatakse ka selle kauni keelekasutuse pärast.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kirjallisuus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sisältö kertoo kuvitteellisesta tapahtumasta ja sitä arvostetaan kauniista kielestä.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: littérature
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Le contenu relate des évènements de fiction et est apprécié pour sa forme (beau langage) autant que pour ce qu'il relate.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Literatur
irodalom
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A tartalom egy elképzelt eseményt mutat be. Az irodalmi művek nyelvezete is értéket képvisel.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: letteratura
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Il contenuto narra un evento immaginario, esso è apprezzato per la bellezza del suo linguaggio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: literatūra
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Teksta saturs apraksta iedomātu notikumu un tiek vērtēts tā izteiksmes dēļ.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Litteratura
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Il-kontenut jirrakkonta avveniment immaġinarju u huwa vvalutat għall-lingwaġġ sabih tiegħu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: literatura
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Zawartość opisuje o wyobrażonych zdarzeniach i jest ceniona ze względu na piękno języka.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: literatura
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: O conteúdo narra um acontecimento imaginário e é apreciado sobretudo pela beleza da sua linguagem.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: literatura
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El contenido narra un evento imagiario y se valora por la belleza del lenguaje que emplea.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: litteratur
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Innehållet förmedlar ett uppdiktat skeende och värdesätts för sitt vackra språk.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: little endian
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Byte order with least significant byte (or bit) first.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: малък ендиан (little endian)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Подредба на байтове, при която най-незначителният байт (бит) е първи.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: little endian
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ordre dels bytes amb el byte (o bit) menys important situat en primer lloc.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: mali endian
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Poredak byteova u kojemu je najmanje značajan byte (ili bit) prvi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: little endian
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Bitorden, hvor den mest mest betydende bit er højrestillet
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pöördesitus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Baidijärjestus, kus kõige vähem oluline bait (või bitt) on esimene.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: little endian
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tavujärjestys, jossa vähiten tärkein tavu on ensin.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: petit boutien
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: ordre des octets dans lequel les octets (ou bits) les moins significatifs sont donnés en premier
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Little Endian
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Bytefolge in der das am wenigsten signifikante Byte (Bit) zuerst kommt.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kis endián
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Olyan bájtsorrend, amikor egy szám kisebb helyiértékű bájtját (vagy bitjét) tároljuk előbb.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: little endian
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ordine di byte con il primo byte (o bit) meno significativo.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: little endian
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Baitu secība, kurā maznozīmīgākais baits (vai bits) ir pirmais.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: little endian
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: ordni tal-bytes fejn l-inqas byte (jew bit) sinifikanti tiġi l-ewwel.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: little endian
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Orden de los bytes con el el byte (o bit) menos importante situado en primer lugar
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: little endian
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Byteföljd med den minst signifikanta byten (eller biten) först.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: local path
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of a local path (e.g. a file within a directory stored on a computer) for locating a resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: localization
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The cross-cultural communication process of preparing locale-specific versions of a product or service, consisting of translation of textual material into the language and textual conventions of the target locale, and adaptation of nontextual materials as well as input, output, and delivery mechanisms to meet the cultural, technical, and regulatory requirements of that locale.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: location address
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The address where the resource was created or originated.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: локационен адрес
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Адресът, на който ресурсът е направен или откъдето произхожда.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: adreça postal
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'adreça del lloc on el recurs ha estat creat o originat.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: adresa lokacije
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Adresa gdje je resurs izrađen ili odakle potječe.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lokationsadresse
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Adressen hvor ressourcen blev skabt eller stammer fra.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: asukoha aadress
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Aadress, kus ressurss loodi või kust see pärineb.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sijaintipaikan osoite
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Osoite missä resurssi luotiin tai mistä se on peräisin.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: adresse postale
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'adresse postale où la ressource a été crée ou d'où la ressource est originaire.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Ortsadresse
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Die Adresse des Ortes an dem die Ressource erzeugt worden ist.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: διεύθυνση
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Η διεύθυνση στην οποία δημιουργήθηκε ένας πόρος
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: székhely
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az erőforrás létrehozásának vagy származásának címe.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: indirizzo postale
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Lìindirizzo dove la risorsa è stata creata o riginata.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: atrašanās vietas adrese
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Adrese, kurā resurss ir izveidots vai no kuras nāk.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: indirizz postali
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: l-indirizz ta' fejn inħoloq jew minn fejn joriġia ir-riżors.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: adres miejsca pochodzenia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Adres miejsca, w którym zasób został stworzony lub z którego pochodzi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: endereço postal
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Morada do local onde o recurso foi criado ou originado.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dirección de la ubicación
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La dirección en que el recurso fue creado u originado.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lokaliseringsadress
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Den adress där resursen skapades eller uppkom.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: location continent
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The continent of where the resource was created or originated.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: локация на континента
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Континентът, където ресурсът е направен или откъдето произхожда.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: continent
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El continent del lloc on el recurs s'ha creat o originat.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kontinent lokacije
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kontinent gdje je resurs izrađen ili odakle potječe.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lokationskontinent
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kontinentet hvor ressourcen blev skabt eller grundlagt.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: asukoha manner
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Manner, kus ressurss loodi või kust see pärineb.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sijaintipaikan maanosa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Maanosa missä resurssi luotiin tai mistä se on peräisin.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: continent
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Le continent où la ressource a été crée ou bien le continent d'où la ressource est originaire.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Ort-Kontinent
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Der Kontinent auf dem die Ressource erzeugt worden ist.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ήπειρος
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Η ήπειρος στην οποία δημιουργήθηκε ένας πόρος
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: a székhely kontinense
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az a kontinens, ahol az erőforrás készült vagy ahonnan származik.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: continente
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Il continente in cui la risorsa è stata creata o riginata.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: atrašanās vietas kontinents
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kontinents, kurā resurss ir izveidots vai no kura nāk.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kontynent pochodzenia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kontynent, na którym zasób został stworzony lub z którego pochodzi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: continente
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Continente onde o recurso foi criado ou originado.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: continente de la ubicación
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El continente del lugar en que se creó u originó el recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lokaliseringskontinent
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Den kontinent där resursen skapades eller tillkom.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: location country
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The country where the resource was created or originated.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: локация на държавата
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Държавата, в която е направен ресурсът или откъдето той произхожда.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: país
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: País on el recurs s'ha creat o originat.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: zemlja lokacije
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Zemlja gdje je resurs izrađen ili odakle potječe.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lokationsland
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Landet hvor ressourcen blev skabt eller grundlagt.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: asukoha riik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Riik, kus ressurss loodi või kust see pärineb.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sijaintimaa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Maa missä resurssi luotiin tai mistä se on peräisin.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pays
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Pays dans lequel un ressource a été créée ou pays d'où une ressource est originaire.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Ort Land
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Das Land, in dem die Ressource erstellt wurde.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: χώρα
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Η χώρα στην οποία δημιουργήθηκε ένας πόρος
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: a székhely országa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az ország, ahol az erőforrás készült, vagy ahonnan származik.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: paese
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Paese in cui la risorsa è stata creata o originata.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: atrašanās vietas valsts
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Valsts, kurā resurss ir izveidots vai no kuras tas nāk.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Pajjiż
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: il-pajiż fejn inħoloq jew minn fjn joriġina r-riżors.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kraj pochodzenia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kraj, w którym dany zasób został stworzony lub z którego pochodzi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: país
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: País onde o recurso foi criado ou originado.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: país de la ubicación
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: País en que se creó u originó el recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lokaliseringsland
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Det land där resursen skapades eller tillkom.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: location region
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The region or sub-region where the resource was created or originated.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: локация на региона
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Регионът или част от региона, където ресурсът е направен или откъдето той произлиза.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: regió
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La regió o subregió on el recurs s'ha creat o originat.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: regija lokacije
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Regija ili podregija gdje je resurs izrađen ili odakle potječe.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lokationsregion
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Regionen hvor ressourcen blev skabt eller grundlagt.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: asukoha piirkond
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Piirkond (kas administratiivne või mitte), kus ressurss loodi või kust see pärineb.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sijaintialue
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Alue tai osa-alue missä resurssi luotiin tai mistä se on peräisin.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: région
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Région (administrative ou non) où une ressource a été crée ou bien région d'où une ressource est originaire.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Ort Region
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Die Region oder Teil-Region, in welcher die Ressource erstellt wurde bzw. aus welcher sie stammt.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: περιοχή
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Η περιοχή στην οποία δημιουργήθηκε ένας πόρος
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: székhely régiója
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A körzet vagy alkörzet, ahol az erőforrás készült vagy ahonnan származik.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: regione
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La regione o sotto-regione in cui la risorsa è stata creata o originata.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: atrašanās vietas reģions
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Reģions vai apakšreģions, kurā resurss ir izveidots vai no kura tas nāk.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Reġjun
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: ir-reġjun jew subreġjun fejn inħoloq jew minn fejn joriġina r-riżors.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: region pochodzenia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Region lub okręg, w którym zasób został stworzony lub z którego pochodzi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: região
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Região ou sub-região onde o recurso foi criado ou originado.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: región de la ubicación
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La región o subregión en que se creó u originó el recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lokaliseringsregion
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Den region eller underregion där resursen skapades eller tillkom.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: longitudinal study
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of a study's elicitation method or research design as a longitudinal study, especially in the field of psychology.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Längsschnittstudie
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe der Datenerhebungsmethode oder des Forschungsdesigns einer Studie als Längsschnittstudie, insbesondere im Bereich der Psychologie.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: low
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Low quality
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ниско
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ниско качество
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: baixa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Baixa qualitat
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nizak
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: niska kvaliteta
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lav
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Lav kvalitet
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: madal
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Madala kvaliteediga
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: huono
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: huono laatu
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: basse qualité
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Mauvaise qualité
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: niedrig
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Niedrige Qualität.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: alacsony
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Alacsony minőség
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: bassa qualità
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Scarsa qualità
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: zema
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Zema kvalitāte
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Baxxa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: kwalita inferjuri
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: niska
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Niska jakość
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: baixa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Baixa qualidade
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: baja
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Baja calidad
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: låg
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: låg kvalitet

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: machine readable dictionary
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An electronic lexical resource designed to be consulted by human being that can be loaded in a database and can be queried via application software.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: machine translation lexicon
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An electronic lexical resource in which the individual lexical entries contain equivalents in two or more languages together with morphological, syntactic and/or semantic information to facilitate automatic or semi-automatic processing of lexemes during machine translation.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: main level information
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Information level that indicates the type of lexical attributes that can be found in the lexicon (orthography, pronunciation, morphology etc).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: информация за основното равнище
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Показва типа на лексикалните атрибути, които може да се открият в лексикона (ортография, произношение, морфология и др.)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: informació principal
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fa referència al tipus d'atributs lèxics que es poden trobar en el lèxic (ortografia, pronunciació, morfologia, etc.)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: informacija glavne razine
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Razina informacije koja označava tip leksičkih atributa koji se mogu naći u leksikonu (pravopis, izgovor, morfologija itd.).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: overordnet oplysningsniveau
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Oplysningsniveau der angiver hvilken type leksikalske attributter er anført i leksikonnet (ortografi, udtale, morfologi osv.)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: üldstruktuur
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Näitab leksikonis leiduvate leksikaalsete tunnuste (ortograafia, hääldus, morfoloogia jne) liiki.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: päätason informaatio
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Informaatiotaso, joka osoittaa minkä tyyppisiä attribuutteja leksikosta löytyy (ortografia, ääntäminen, morfologia jne).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: structure générale
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Donne le type d'attributs qu'on peut trouver dans un lexique (orthograhe, prononciation, morphologie, etc)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Hauptniveau Information
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Informationsniveau, das die Art der lexikalischen Attribute angibt, die in dem Lexikon vorkommen (Orthographie, Aussprache, Morphologie, usw.).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: πληροφορία βασικού επιπέδου
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Προσδιορίζεται ο τύπος/ τα είδη των λεξικών χαρακτηριστικών που περιλαμβάνονται σε ένα λεξικό (ορθογραφία, προφορά, μορφολογία κ.λπ.)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: felső szintű információ
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A lexikai attribútumok azon típusait adja meg, amelyek megtalálhatóak a lexikonban (ortográfia, kiejtés, morfológia, stb.)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: informazione di livello principale
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica il tipo di attributi lessicali che possono essere trovati nel essico (ortografia, pronuncia, morfologia ecc.).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pamatinformācija
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda, kādu tipu leksiskie atribūti atrodami leksikonā (ortogrāfija, izruna, morfoloģija u.tml.)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: informazzjoni ta' livell ewlieni
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: informazzjoni ta' livell li jindika t-tip ta' attributi lessikali li jistgħu jinstabu fil-lessiku (ortografija, pronunzja, morfoloġija eċċ).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: informacja poziomu głównego
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa typ leksykalnych atrybutów, jakie można znaleźć w danym leksykonie (ortografia, wymowa, morfologia itd.).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: informação principal
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica a natureza da informação lexical contida no léxico (ortografia, pronúncia, morfologia, etc.)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información principal
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hace referencia al tipo de atributos léxicos que se pueden encontrar en el léxico (ortografía, pronunciación, morfología, etc.).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: information på huvudnivå
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Informationsnivå som anger den typ av lexikala attribut som kan finnas i lexikonet (ortografi, uttal, morfologi etc.).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: main script
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of a language script as being the main script of a resource or not.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Hauptschriftsystem
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe, ob ein Schriftsystem das Hauptschriftsystem einer Ressource ist (d.h. das Skript, das vorwiegend verwendet wurde) oder nicht.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: markup
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Any text, tag, or code that is added to the data of a document to convey information about it.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: mathematical linguistics
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The field of study which treats the mathematical properties of language.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: математическа лингвистика
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Област на науката, която изследва математическите свойства на езика.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingüística matemàtica
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El camp d'estudi que tracta les propietats matemàtiques del llenguatge.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: matematička lingvistika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Područje istraživanja koje obrađuje matematička svojstva jezika.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: matematisk lingvistik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Studiet af sprogs matematiske egenskaber.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: matemaatiline lingvistika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Teadus, mis tegeleb keele matemaatiliste omadustega.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: matemaattinen kielitiede
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tieteenala, joka käsittelee kielen matemaattisia ominaisuuksia.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: linguistique mathématique
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Champ qui regroupe des études portant sur les propriétés mathématiques des langues.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Mathematische Linguistik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Linguistische Disziplinen, die mathematische Verfahren in der Sprachverarbeitung einsetzen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: matematikai nyelvészet
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A nyelv matematikai tulajdonságaival foglalkozó tudományterület.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: linguistica matematica
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Il campo di studio che tratta le proprietà matematiche del linguaggio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: matemātiskā lingvistika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nozare, kas pēta valodas matemātiskās īpašības.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Lingwistika matematika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: il-qasam ta' studju li jitratta l-elementi matematiċi tal-lingwaġġ.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ligwistyka matematyczna
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Dziedzina badań dotycząca matematycznych własności języków.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: linguística matemática
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Área de estudo que se ocupa das propriedades matemáticas das línguas.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingüística matemática
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El campo de estudio que trata las propiedades matemáticas del lenguaje.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: matematisk lingvistik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Det område som behandlar matematiska egenskaper hos språk.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: media type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specification of the media type of the resource or the media types the tool/service is suitable for.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: медиен тип
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Специфициране на медийния тип на ресурса или на медийните типове, за които средството/услугата са подходящи.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tipus de mitjà
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fa referència al tipus de mitjà del recurs o als tipus de mitjans per als quals l'eina/servei és aplicable.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tip medija
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifikacija tipa medija za resurs ili tipova medija za koje je pogodan alat/usluga.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: medietype
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifikation af ressourcens medietype eller angivelse af mediedtyperne som er egnede for værktøjet/servicen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: meedia liik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ressursi meedia või rakenduse poolt toetatava meedia liik.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: mediatyyppi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Resurssin mediatyyppi tai mediatyypit, joihin työkalu/palvelu soveltuu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: type de media
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Type de media d'une ressource ou type de media accepté en entrée par un outil ou un service.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Medientyp
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Spezifikation des Medientyps einer Ressource oder des Medientyps, für welchen ein Werkzeug/Service ausgelegt ist.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: είδος/ τύπος μέσου
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Προσδιορίζεται ο τύπος μέσου ενός πόρου ή οι τύποι μέσων για τους οποίους είναι κατάλληλο ένα εργαλείο/υπηρεσία
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: médiatípus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az erőforrás médiatípusának vagy azon médiatípusoknak a megadása, amelyek használhatóak az adott eszközzel/szolgáltatással.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tipo di supporto
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specificazione del tipo di supporto della risorsa o dei tipi di supporto adeguati per uno strumento/servizio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: datu nesēja tips
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda, kādus datu nesējus izmanto vai kādiem datu nesējiem piemērots rīks vai pakalpojums.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Tip ta' midja
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: speċifikazzjoni tat-tip ta' midja tar-riżors jew tat-tipi ta' midja li huma adattati għalihom l-għodda/servizz.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: typ medium
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa typ medium, w którym jest zasób zarejestrowany lub typ medium, który jest właściwy dla narzędzia/usługi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tipo de meio de comunicação
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Especificação do tipo de aplicação requerida pelo recurso ou dos tipos de aplicação que se adequam à ferramenta/serviço.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tipo de medio
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hace referencia al tipo de medio del recurso o a los tipos de medios para los que es aplicable la herramienta/servicio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: medietyp
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angivelse av resursens medietyp eller de medietyper som passar verktyget/tjänsten.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: medical interpreting
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Type of community interpreting that facilitates communication between people speaking different languages in health care settings (patient to doctor, doctor to doctor, etc).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: medical translation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Translation of texts for the medical subject field.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: medium
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The medium that is used to access the resource or the tool.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: посредник
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Посредникът, който се използва, за да се получи достъп до ресурса или средството.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: mitjà
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El mitjà emprat per accedir al recurs o l'eina.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: medij
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Medij koji se koristi za pristup resursu ili alatu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: medie
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Mediet til at få adgang til ressourcen eller værktøjet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: meedium
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ressursile või rakendusele juurdepääsu võimaldav meedium.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tietoväline
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Väline, jota tarvitaan resurssin tai työkalun käyttämiseen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: medium
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Le medium permettant d'accèder à une ressource ou à un outil.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Medium
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Das Medium, durch das der Zugriff auf die Ressource oder das Werkzeug erfolgt.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: μέσο πρόσβασης
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Το μέσο που χρησιμοποιείται για την πρόσβαση σε έναν πόρο ή εργαλείο
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: médium
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az a médium, amellyel az erőforrás vagy az eszköz elérhető.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: mezzo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Il mezzo usato per accedere alla risorsa o allo strumento.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: datu nesējs
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Datu nesējs, kas tiek izmantots, lai piekļūtu resursam vai rīkam.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Mezz
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: il-mezz użat għall-aċċess tar-riżors jew l-għodda.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: medium
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Medium, w ramach którego odbywa się dostęp do zasobu lub w ramach którego pracuje narzędzie.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: suporte
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Suporte utilizado para aceder ao recurso ou à ferramenta.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: medio
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El medio empleado para acceder al recurso o la herramienta.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: medium
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Det medium som används för att få åtkomst till resursen eller tjänsten.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: meta language
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Name of the language that is used as a metalanguage in the resource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: метаезик
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Названието на езика, който се използва като метаезик в ресурса.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metallenguatge
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nom del llenguatge emprat com a metallenguatge en el recurs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metajezik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Naziv jezika koji je rabljen kao metajezik u resursu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metasprog
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Navnet på metasproget brugt i ressourcen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metakeel
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ressursis metakeelena kasutatava keele nimetus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metakieli
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Resurssissa metakielenä käytettävän kielen nimi .
Nom de la langue qui est utilisée comme métalangue.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Metasprache
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Bezeichnung der Sprache, die in der Ressource als Metasprache dient.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: μεταγλώσσα
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Το όνομα της γλώσσας που χρησιμοποιείται ως μεταγλώσσα σε έναν πόρο
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metanyelv
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az erőforrásban metanyelvként használt nyelv neve.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metalinguaggio
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nome del linguaggio usato come un metalinguaggio nella risorsa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metavaloda
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Resursā par metavalodu izmantotās valodas nosaukums.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metajęzyk
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nazwa języka, który został zastosowany jako metajęzyk w ramach danego zasobu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metalinguagem
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nome da língua utilizada no recurso como metalinguagem
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metalenguaje
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nombre del lenguaje empleado como metalenguaje en el recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metaspråk
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Namnet på det språk som används som metaspråk i resursen.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metadata creation date
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date of creation of this metadata description.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: дата на създаване на метаданните
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Датата на създаването на това описание от метаданни.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: data de creació de les metadades
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La data de creació d'aquesta descripció de metadades.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: datum izrade metapodataka
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Datum izrade ovoga opisa metapodataka.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metadata skabelsesdato
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Datoen da metadataen blev skabt.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metadata loomiskuupäev
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kuupäev, millal see metadata kirjeldus loodi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metadatan luontipäivä
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Päivämäärä, jolloin tämä metadatakuvaus luotiin.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: date de création des méta-données
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La date de création des méta-données considérées.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Metadaten Erstellungsdatum
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Datum der Erstellung der Metadaten-Beschreibung.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ημερομηνία δημιουργίας μεταδεδομένων
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Η ημερομηνία δημιουργίας της περιγραφής μεταδεδομένων
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: a metaadat létrehozásának időpontja
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A metaadat-leírás létrehozásának időpontja.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: data di creazione dei metadati
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La data di creazione di questa descrizione di metadati.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metadatu izveides datums
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Šo metadatu izveides datums.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Data tal-ħolqien tal-metadata
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: id-data ta' meta nħolqot din id-deskrizzjoni tal-metadata.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: data utworzenia metadanych
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data utworzenia opisu w postaci metadanych.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: data da criação de metadados
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data da criação desta descrição de metadados.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fecha de creación de los metadatos
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La fecha de creación de esta descripción de metadatos.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: skapelsedatum för metadata
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Det datum då denna metadatabeskrivning skapades.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metadata creator
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The name(s) of the person(s) that created this metadata description.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: създател на метаданните
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Името(имената) на човека(хората), който(които) са създали описанието от метаданни.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: creador de les metadades
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El nom (o noms) de la/es persona/es que han creat aquesta descripció de metadades.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: autor metapodataka
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ime(na) osobe ili osoba koje su izradile ovaj opis metapodataka.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metadata-skaber
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Navn(ene) på person(er) der skabte denne metadata beskrivelse.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metadata looja
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Selle metadata kirjelduse looja(te) nimi/nimed.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metadatan luoja
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sen henkilön tai niiden henkilöiden nimet, jotka loivat tämän metadatakuvauksen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: créateur des méta-données
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Le(s) nom(s) des personnes qui a(ont) créé les méta-données considérées.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Metadaten-Verfasser
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Name/n der Person/en, die den Metadatensatz erstellt hat/haben.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: δημιουργός μεταδεδομένων
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Το όνομα του προσώπου που δημιουργεί την περιγραφή μεταδεδομένων
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: a metaadat létrehozója
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Azon személy(ek) neve(i), aki a metaadat-leírást létrehozta.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: creatore dei metadati
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Il nome (o i nomi) della persona (o delle persone) che hanno creato questa descrizione dei metadati.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metadatu autors
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Šos metadatus rakstījušās personas vārds.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Ħallieq tal-metadata
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L-isem/ismijiet tal-persuna/i li ħolqu din id-deskrizzjoni tal-metadata.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: twórca metadanych
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nazwisko (nazwiska) osoby (osób), która utworzyła dany opis w postaci metadanych.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: criador dos metadados
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nome da pessoa ou pessoa que criaram esta descrição de metadados.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: creador de los metadatos
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El nombre (o nombres) de la(s) persona(s) que crearon esta descripción de metadatos.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: skapare av metadata
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Namn(en) på den person (de personer) som skapade denna metadatabeskrivning.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metadata language
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An identifier of the language in which the metadata description was written.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: език на метаданните
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Идентификатор на езика, на който описанието на метаданните е написано.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: llenguatge de les metadades
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identificador del llenguatge amb què s'ha escrit la descripció amb metadades.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: jezik metapodataka
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identifikator jezika na kojemu je napisan opis metapodataka.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metadatasprog
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: En identifikator for det sprog metadata er skrevet i.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metadata keel
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Metadata kirjelduse keele identifikaator.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metadatakieli
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sen kielen tunniste, jolla metadatakuvaus luotiin.
