rdf:Description.rdfs:label: langage de description des méta-données
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Un identifiant du language dans lequel les méta-données sont décrites.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Metadatensprache
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kennung für die Sprache, in welcher die Metadatenbeschreibung verfasst wurde.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: γλώσσα μεταδεδομένων
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Αναγνωριστικό της γλώσσας στην οποία έχει γραφεί η περιγραφή των μεταδεδομένων
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: a metaadat nyelve
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Annak a nyelvnek az azonosítója, amelyben a metaadat-leírást létrehozták.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: linguaggio dei metadati
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Un identificatore del linguaggio utilizzato per la descrizione dei metadati.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metadatu valoda
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Metadatu valodas identifikators.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Lingwa tal-metadata
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: identifikatur tal-lingwa li fiha nkitbet il-metadata.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: język metadanych
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identyfikator (symbol) języka, w którym zostały zapisane metadane.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: língua dos metadados
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identificador da língua em que foi escrita a descrição dos metadados.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: idioma de los metadatos
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hace referencia al idioma en que fue escrita la descripción con metadatos.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metadataspråk
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angivelse av det språk på vilket dessa metadata skrevs.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metadata registry
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An information system for registering metadata.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metalanguage
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: a language used in a multi-language lexical resource as a language of description

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: mime type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specification of the mime-type of the resource which is a formalized specifier for the format included or a mime-type that the tool/service accepts.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: майм тип
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Специфицирането на майм типа на ресурса е формализиран спецификатор за включения формат или е майм тип, който се приема от средството/услугата.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tipus mime
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fa referència al tipus MIME del recurs, que és un especificador formal del format inclòs, o el tipus MIME que l'eina/servei accepta.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: mime tip
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifikacija MIME tipa resursa koji predstavlja formalizirani specifikator za uključeni format ili MIME tipa koji alat/usluga prihvaća.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: mime type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: En ressources MIME type eller en MIME type et værktøj/service accepterer.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: mime tüüp
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ressursi MIME tüüp või rakenduse sisendis eeldatav MIME tüüp.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: mime-tyyppi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Resurssin MIME-tyypin kuvaus, joka on käytetyn dataformaatin standardoitu tunniste tai työkalun/sovelluksen tunnistama MIME-tyyppi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: type mime
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Type mime d'une ressource, ou type mime attendu en entrée d'un outil ou d'un service.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: MIME Type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe des Internet-Media-Typs als formale Bezeichnung des Inhalts einer Ressource oder des Medientyps, der für ein Werkzeug/einen Service geeignet ist.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: mime típus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az erőforrás mime-típusának megadása, amely az erőforrás részét képező formátumok formalizált specifikációja, vagy egy olyan mime-típus, amelyet az eszköz, szolgáltatás elfogad.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tipo mime
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specificazione del mime-type della risorsa, il quale è uno specificatore formale del formato incluso, o del mime-type accettato dallo strumento/servizio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: mime tips
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Resursa MIME tips, kas ir formalizēts formāta nosaukums, vai MIME tips, ko atbalsta rīks vai pakalpojums.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: typ mime
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określenie typu MIME zasobu, który jest ustalonym symbolem opisującym format zawarty w zasobie lub format, który narzędzie/usługa akceptuje.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tipo mime
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Especificação do tipo MIME do recurso que é um especificador do formato incluído ou do tipo MIME aceite pela ferramenta/serviço.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: mime type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hace referencia al mime type del recurso, que es un especificador formal del formato incluido o el mime type que la herramienta/servicio acepta.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: mime-typ
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angivelse av resursens mime-typ, som är en formaliserad angivelse för det inkluderade formatet eller en mime-typ som verktyget/tjänsten accepterar.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: minimum of hard disk space
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the minimum of hard disk space required for the installation of something, especially for tools.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Minimum an Festplattenplatz
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe des Minimums an Festplattenplatz an, der für die Installation von etwas benötigt wird, insbesondere von Tools.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: minimum of working memory space
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the minimum working memory space required for the installation of somethining, especially for tools.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Minimum an Arbeitsspeicherplatz
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe der Mindestgröße des benötigten Arbeitsspeicherplatzes für die Installation von etwas, insbesondere von Tools.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: modalities
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A listing of all modalities that are contained in the recording such that they can be subject of analysis or that are supported by the tool/service.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: модалности
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Списък на модалностите, които се съдържат в даден запис и могат да бъдат обект на анализ или да се поддържат от средството/услугата.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: modalitats
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Un llistat de totes les modalitats que conté un enregistrament, i que poden ser objecte d'anàlisi o que l'eina/servei suporta.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: modaliteti
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Popis svih modaliteta sadržanih u zapisu, koji mogu biti predmetom analize ili koje podržava alat/usluga.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: modalitet
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: En liste over alle modaliteter der er i en optagelse, således at de kan blive analyseret eller de kan være understøttet af et værktøj/service.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: modaalsused
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nimekiri kõigis modaalsustest, mis salvestuses analüüsitaval kujul sisalduvad või mida rakendus toetab.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: viestintätavat
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kaikkien niiden viestintätapojen luettelo, jotka sisältyvät tallenteeseen ja joita voidaan analysoida tai tukea työkalun/palvelun avulla.
Liste des modalités (parole, gestes, ...) contenues dans un enregistrement et qui peuvent donc être étudiées ou liste de modalités que permet d'analyser un outil ou un service.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Modalitäten
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Liste aller Modalitäten, die in einer Aufnahme enthalten sind und somit einer Analyse unterzogen werden können bzw. von dem Werkzeug/Service unterstützt werden.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: τροπικότητες
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Απαρίθμηση των τροπικοτήτων που περιλαμβάνονται σε μία καταγραφή και υπόκεινται σε ανάλυση ή υποστηρίζονται από ένα εργαλείο/ υπηρεσία
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: modalitások
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Azon modalitások listája, amelyek elemzés céljából kerültek rögzítésre vagy támogatva vannak a szóbanforgó eszköz/erőforrás által.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: modalità
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Un elenco di tutte le modalità contenute nella registrazione in modo tale che esse possano essere oggetto di analisi o supportate dallo strumento/servizio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: veidi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tiek uzskatīti visi datu veidi, kas ir sastopami ierakstā un kas varētu būt izpētes objekts vai ko rīks/pakalpojums atbalsta.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Modalitajiet
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Lista tal-modalitajiet kollha inklużi f'rekording b'tali mod li jistgħu ikun s-suġġett ta' analiżi jew li huma appoġati mill-għodda/servizz.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: modalności
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Lista wszystkich modalności, które są zawarte w nagraniu i które mogą być przedmiotem analizy lub które są wspierane przez narzędzie/usługę.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: modalidades
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Listagem de todas as modalidades contidas na gravação que podem ser objecto de análise, ou que são suportadas pela ferramenta/serviço.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: modalidades
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Un listado de todas las modalidades que contiene una grabación y que pueden ser objeto de análisis o que están soportadas por la herramienta/servicio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: modaliteter
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Uppställning över alla de modaliteter som inspelningen innehåller, så att de kan utsättas för analys eller stöds av verktyget/tjänsten.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: modern
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the temporal classification of something, especially a language, as being modern.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: modern
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe der zeitlichen Klassifikation von etwas, insbesondere einer Sprache, als modern im Sinne von gegenwärtig.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: monitor corpus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specification of the type of a corpus as a monitor corpus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Monitorkorpus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Spezifikation des Korpustyps als Monitorkorpus.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: monologue
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Communication event with only one main participant.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: монолог
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Комуникационно събитие само с един участник.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: monòleg
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Esdeveniment comunicatiu amb un únic participant principal.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: monolog
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Komunikacijski događaj sa samo jednim sudionikom.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: monolog
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kommunikationsbegivenhed med en enkelt deltager.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: monoloog
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ainult ühe osalejaga suhtlussündmus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: monologi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Viestintätapahtuma, jossa on vain yksi pääasiallinen osanottaja.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: monologue
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Evenement de communication oral avec un seul participant ou un participant principal.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Monolog
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kommunikationssituation mit nur einem aktiven Teilnehmer.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: μονόλογος
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Επικοινωνιακό γεγονός με έναν μόνο συμμετέχοντα
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: monológ
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Egy főbb résztvevő közreműködésével létrejövő kommunikációs esemény.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: monologo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Evento comunicativo con un solo partecipante principale.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: monologs
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Saziņas notikums, kurā aktīvi iesaistīts viens dalībnieks.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: monologu
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: avveniment ta' komunikazzjoni b'parteċipant ewlieni wieħed.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: monolog
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Zdarzenie komunikacyjne z tylko jednym głównym uczestnikiem.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: monólogo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Evento comunicativo com apenas um participante.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: monólogo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Evento de comunicación con un único participante principal.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: monolog
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kommunikation med endast en huvuddeltagare.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: morphology
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The study of the structure and constituency of individual words.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: морфология
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Науката за структурата и съдържанието на отделните думи.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: morfologia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'estudi de l'estructura i constituència de paraules aïllades.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: morfologija
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Proučavanje strukture i sastava pojedinih riječi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: morfologi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Undersøgelsen af enkeltords struktur og bestanddele.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: morfoloogia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Keeleteaduse osa, mis uurib sõnavorme ja nende sisemist struktuuri.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: morfologia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Yksittäisten sanojen rakenteen tutkimus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: morphologie
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Etude de la structure interne des mots ou des formes.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Morphologie
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Die Erforschung der Struktur und Zusammensetzung einzelner Worte.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: μορφολογία
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Η μελέτη της δομής και της σύστασης των λέξεων
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: morfológia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A szavak szerkezetével és összetevőivel foglalkozó tudomány.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: morfologia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Lo studio della struttura e della costituzione delle singole parole.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: morfoloģija
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Gramatikas daļa, kas pēta valodas morfoloģisko sistēmu - morfēmu struktūru un funkcijas, gramatiskās kategorijas, gramatisko formu veidošanu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: morfologia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Badania nad strukturą i składnikami poszczególnych słów.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: morfologia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Estudo da estrutura e constituência das palavras isoladamente.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: morfología
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El estudio de la estructura y constituencia de palabras aisladas.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: morfologi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Studier av strukturer hos enskilda ord.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: neurolinguistics
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The study of brain structure and the physical representation of language in the brain.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: невролингвистика
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Науката за структурата на мозъка и физическото представяне на езика в мозъка.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: neurolingvistika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Proučavanje strukture mozga i fizičke reprezentacije jezika u mozgu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: neurolingvistik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Studiet af hjernens struktur og sprogs fysiske repræsentation i hjernen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: neurolingvistika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Teadus, mis uurib aju ehitust ja keele füüsilist esitust ajus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: neurolingvistiikka
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tieteenala, joka tutkii aivojen rakennetta ja kielen fysikaalista edustusta aivoissa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: neurolinguistique
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Etude de la structure du cerveau et de la représentation physique du langage dans le cerveau.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Neurolinguistik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Die Erforschung neuronaler Strukturen und der physiologischen Repräsentation von Sprache im Gehirn.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: νευρογλωσσολογία
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Η μελέτη της δομής του εγκεφάλου και της αναπαράστασης της γλώσσας σε αυτόν
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: neurolingvisztika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az emberi agy szerkezetével valamint a nyelv fizikai reprezentációjával foglalkozó tudomány.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: neurolinguistica
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Lo studio della struttura del cervello e della rappresentazione fisica del linguaggio nel cervello.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: neirolingvistika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Pēta smadzeņu uzbūvi un valodas fizisko atspoguļojumu smadzenēs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: neurolingwistyka
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Badania nad strukturami mózgu oraz fizyczną reprezentacją języka w mózgu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: neurolinguística
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Estudo das estruturas mentais e da representação física da linguagem no cérebro.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: neurolingüística
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El estudio de la estructura cerebral y de la representación física del lenguaje en el cerebro.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: neurolingvistik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Studier av hjärnstrukturen och den fysiska representationen av språket i hjärnan.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: newspaper article
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The content is non-fictional distributed via a newspaper, a magazine or the internet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: статия във вестник
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Съдържанието е нефикционално и се разпространява чрез вестник, списание или интернет.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: article de diari
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El contingut no és fictici i es distribueix a través d'un diari, una revista o internet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: novinski članak
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sadržaj je informativan, a distribuira se putem novina, časopisa ili Interneta.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: avisartikel
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indholdet er ikke-fiktion og er distribueret via avis, tidsskrift eller internet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ajaleheartikkel
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sisu koosneb ajalehes, ajakirjas või internetis avaldatud teatmekirjandusest.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sanomalehtiartikkeli
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sisältö on tosiasiapohjaista ja välitetään sanomalehtien, aikakauslehtien tai internetin kautta.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: article de journal
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Le contenu d'un article de journal est factuel (non fictionel) et est distribué par un journal quotidien, un magazine ou internet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Zeitschriftenartikel
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Der Inhalt ist nicht fiktional; die Veröffentlichung erfolgt durch eine Zeitung, eine Zeitschrift oder das Internet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: újságcikk
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A tartalom nem-kitalált, újság, magazin vagy az internet segítségével terjesztik.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: articolo di giornale
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Il contenuto distribuito tramite giornale non è di finzione, una rivista o internet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: avīžraksts
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Dokumentāls raksts, kas publicēts avīzē, žurnālā vai internetā.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: artykuł prasowy
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Zawartość nie jest fikcją literacką i została opublikowana w gazecie, czasopiśmie lub w Internecie.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: artigo de jornal
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: O conteúdo é não-ficcional e a sua distribuição é feita via jornais, revistas ou pela internet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: artículo de periódico
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El contenido no es ficticio y se distribuye a través de un periódico, una revista o internet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tidningsartikel
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Innehållet är icke-fiktivt och distribueras via tidningar, magasin eller Internet.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: no-observer
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: No outside observer is present.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: без наблюдатели
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Няма външни наблюдатели
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sense observador
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: No hi ha cap observador present.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: bez promatrača
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nije prisutan vanjski promatrač.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ingen observatør
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ingen udefrakommende observatør til stede.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: vaatlejata
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Välisvaatlejat kohal ei ole.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ilman havainnoijaa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ei ulkopuolista havainnoijaa paikalla.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pas d'observateur
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Aucun observateur extérieur n'est présent.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Ohne Beobachter
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kein außenstehender Beobachter ist anwesend.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: megfigyelő-mentes
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nincsen külső megfigyelő jelen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: senza osservatore
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Assenza di un osservatore esterno.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: bez skatītāja
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nepiedalās skatītājs no ārpuses.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: brak obserwatora
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Żaden zewnętrzny obserwator nie był obecny.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sem observador
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Não está presente nenhum observador exterior.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sin observador
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: No hay ningún observador presente.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ingen observatör
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ingen utomstående observatör är närvarande.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nomenclature
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Terminology structured systematically according to pre-established naming rules.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: non-elicited
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The researcher does not interfere verbally with the speech event (other than the researcher's mere presence).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: несвидетелственост
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Изследователят не участва вербално в комуникационното събитие (това е различно от присъствието на излседователя).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: no elicitat
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El/la investigador/a no interfereix verbalment en l'esdeveniment comunicatiu (a part de la seva mera presència).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nepotaknut
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nema verbalne intervencije straživača u govorni događaj (osim same nazočnosti istraživača).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ikke-eliciteret
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Forskeren griber ikke verbalt ind i talehandlingen (andet end ved sin blotte tilstedeværelse).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: esile kutsumata
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Uurija ei sekku verbaalselt kõnesündmusse (muul viisil kui lihtsalt kohal olles).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: elisitoimaton
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tutkija ei puutu sanallisesti puhumistapahtumaan ( muuten kuin olemalla paikalla).
Le chercheur n'interfère pas (à l'oral) dans l'évènement de communication au delà de sa présence.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Nicht-elizitiert
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Der Wissenschaftler greift nicht verbal in die Kommunikationssituation ein (abgesehen von seiner bloßen Anwesenheit).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nem-kiváltott
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A kutató nem veszt részt verbálisan a beszédeseményben (csak a puszta jelenlétével).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: non provocato
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: I ricercatori non intervengono verbalmente durante l'evento del discorso (a parte la mera presenza del ricercatore).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: neizvilināts
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Pētnieks verbāli neietekmē runas notikumu ( ir vienīgi klāt šajā notikumā).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: niewyodrębniony
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Badacz nie wpływa werbalnie na zdarzenie języka mówionego (w inny sposób niż sama obecność badacza).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: não-elicitado
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: O investigador não interfere verbalmente no evento discursivo (exceptuando o facto de estar presente).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: no provocado
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El investigador no interfiere verbalmente en el evento de comunicación (aparte de la mera presencia del investigador)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: icke framkallat
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Undersökaren ingriper inte verbalt i talhändelsen (förutom med sin blotta närvaro).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: non-interactive
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Speech/song produced without expecting extended verbal responses from hearer(s).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: неинтерактивност
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Реч/песен, които са представени без очакване на дълги вербални реакции от слушателя/слушателите.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: no interactiu
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Discurs/cançó produït/da sense esperar respostes extenses per part del/s oïdor/s.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: neinteraktivan
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Govor/pjevanje koji se proizvodi bez očekivanja opsežnijih verbalnih odgovora od slušatelja.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: non-interaktiv
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tale/sang produceret uden forventning om udvidet reaktion fra tilhørende.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: mitteinteraktiivne
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kõne/laul on tekitatud ootamata kuulajatelt verbaalset vastust.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ei-interaktiivinen
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Puhetta/laulua, johon ei odoteta sanallista palautetta kuulijoilta.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: non interactif
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Parole ou chant produit sans attendre de réponse verbale de la part des auditeurs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Nicht-interaktiv
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sprache/Gesang produziert ohne eine verbale Reaktion der Zuhörer zu erwarten.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nem-interaktív
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Olyan kibocsájtott beszéd/hang, amelyre nem várunk verbális választ.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: non interattivo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Discorso/canzone prodotta senza aspettarsi risposte verbali estese da parte dell'ascoltatore o degli ascoltatori.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: neinteraktīvs
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Runa/dziesma, kas izpildīta, negaidot no klausītāja aktīvu verbālu iesaistīšanos.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nieinteraktywna
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Mowa/piosenka wytworzona bez oczekiwania rozszerzonej odpowiedzi werbalnej ze strony słuchacza (słuchaczy).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: não-interactivo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fala/canção produzida sem o intuito de gerar respostas verbais da parte do(s) ouvinte(s).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: no interactivo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Discurso/canción producido sin esperar respuestas extensas por parte del (de los) oyente(s).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: icke interaktiv
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tal/sång utan förväntad utvecklad verbal respons från lyssnaren/lyssnarna.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: normal
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Normal Quality
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: нормално
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Нормално качество
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: normal
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Qualitat normal
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: normalan
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Normalna kvaliteta
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: normal
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Normal kvalitet
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tavaline
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tavalise kvaliteediga
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: normaali
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: normaali laatu
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: qualité normale
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Qualité normale
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Normal
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Normale Qualität
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: megfelelő
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Megfelelő minőség
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: normale
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Qualità normale
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: normāla
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Normāla kvalitāte
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: normalna
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Normalna jakość
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: normal
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Qualidade normal
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: normal
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Calidad normal
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: normal
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: normal kvalitet

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: not a natural format
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sessions where the number of participants does not define the structure of the communication event.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: не е естествен формат
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Сесии, където броят на участниците не определя структурата на комуникационното събитие.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: format no natural
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sessions on el nombre de participants no defineix l'estructura de l'esdeveniment comunicatiu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nije prirodni format
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sesije gdje broj sudionika ne definira strukturu komunikacijskog događaja.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ikke naturligt format
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Møder hvor antallet af deltagere ikke definerer kommunikationsbegivenhedens struktur.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: mitteloomulik formaat
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Salvestused, kus osalejate arv ei määra suhtlussündmuse struktuuri.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: keinotekoinen formaatti
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Formaatti, jossa osanottajien lukumäärä ei määritä viestintätapahtuman rakennetta.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: format non naturel
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sessions dans lesquelles le nombre de participants ne définit pas la structure de l'évènement de communication.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Kein natürliches Format
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sitzungen, in welchen die Anzahl der Teilnehmer nicht die Struktur des Kommunikations-Ereignisses bestimmt.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nem természetes formátum
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Olyan események, amikor a részt vevők száma nem határozza meg a kommunikációs esemény szerkezetét.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: formato non naturale
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sessioni in cui il numero dei partecipanti non definisce la struttura dell'evento di comunicazione.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nav dabisks formāts
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sesijas, kurā dalībnieku skaits nenosaka saziņas notikuma struktūru.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nienaturalny format
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sesje, w których liczba uczestników nie określa struktury zdarzenia komunikacyjnego.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: formato não-natural
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sessões em que o número de participantes não define a estrutura do evento comunicativo.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: formato no natural
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sesiones en las que el número de participantes no define la estructura del evento de comunicación.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ej naturligt format
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sessioner där antalet deltagare inte definierar kommunikationshändelsens struktur.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: note taking
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A way of conceptualizing and summarizing information on paper to support interpretation into another language.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: notes (general)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A generic dump for all personal notes about an entry, subentry, or sense. More specific note fields provide a finer differentiation to one's notes: p (phonology), g (grammar), d (discourse), a (anthropology), s (sociolinguistics), and q (questions). All "note fields" should use capitalization and punctuation as needed.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: notes (questions)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: For any question or note for further study, pertinent to the lexeme, that you want separate from general notes. Capitalization and punctuation should be used as needed.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: notes (sociolinguistics)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: For any sociolinguistics note pertinent to the lexeme that you want separate from general notes. Capitalization and punctuation should be used as needed.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: number of languages
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An indication of the number of languages that are included in the resource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: брой на езиците
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Показва броя на езиците, които са включени в ресурса.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nombre de llengües
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fa referència al nombre de llengües que s'inclouen en el recurs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: broj jezika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Oznaka broja jezika uključenih u resurs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: antal sprog
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Antallet af sprog brugt i ressourcen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: keelte arv
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Näitab, mitu eri keelt ressursis sisaldub.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kielten lukumäärä
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ilmoittaa resurssiin sisältyvien kielten lukumäärän.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nombre de langues
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication du nombre de langues présentes dans la ressource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Anzahl der Sprachen
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe der Anzahl an Sprachen, die in einer Ressource enthalten sind.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: αριθμός γλωσσών
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Δείκτης του αριθμού γλωσσών που περιλαμβάνονται σε έναν πόρο
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nyelvek száma
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Azt adja meg, hogy hány nyelv szerepel az erőforrásban.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: numero di lingue
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Un'indicazione del numero di lingue incluse nella risorsa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: valodu skaits
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda resursā iekļauto valodu skaitu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: liczba języków
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa liczbę języków, które występują w zasobie.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: número de línguas
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicação do número de línguas incluídas no recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: número de idiomas
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hace referencia al número de idiomas que se incluyen en el recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: antal språk
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anger det antal språk som ingår i resursen.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: number of participants
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the number of participants involved in a research study, especially in the field of psychology.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Teilnehmerzahl
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe der Anzahl der Teilnehmer an, die in eine Forschungsstudie involviert sind, insbesondere im Bereich der Psychologie.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: number of speakers
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: the number of speakers in the recording
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: брой на говорещите
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Броят на говорещите на записа
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nombre de parlants
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El nombre de parlants en l'enregistrament.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: broj govornika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: broj govornika koji se pojavljuju na zapisu
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: antal talere
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Antallet af talere i en optagelse
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kõnelejate arv
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Salvestuses sisalduvate kõnelejate arv.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: puhujien lukumäärä
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: puhujien lukumäärä nauhoituksessa
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nombre de locuteurs
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: le nombre de locuteurs apparaissant dans l'enregistrement
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Sprecherzahl
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe der Anzahl von Sprechern in einer Aufnahme.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: αριθμός ομιλητών
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ο αριθμός των ομιλητών που περιλαμβάνονται σε μια καταγραφή
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: a beszélők száma
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: a felvételen szereplő beszélők száma
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: numero di parlanti
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Il numero di parlanti nella registrazione.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: runātāju skaits
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: runātāju skaits ierakstā
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: liczba mówców
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Liczba mówców występujących w nagraniu
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: número de hablantes
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: el número de hablantes en la grabación
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: antal talare
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anger det antal talare som förekommer i inspelningen.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: oldest
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the age of the oldest person participating in a research study, especially in the context of psychology or linguistics.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Ältester
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe des Alters der ältesten Person, die an einer Forschungsstudie teilnimmt, insbesondere im Bereich der Psychologie oder Linguistik.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: on-site interpreting
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Interpreting delivery method that requires the interpreter to be physically present in order for the interpretation to take place. In on-site interpreting settings, all of the parties who wish to speak to one another are usually located in the same place.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: one-time elicitation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the time frame of an elicitation within a research study, especially in the field of psychology or linguistics, as a one-time occasion.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Einmalige Datenerhebung
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe des Zeitraums einer Datenerhebung innerhalb einer Forschungsstudie, insbesondere im Bereich der Psychologie oder Linguistik, als eine einmalige Datenerhebung.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ontology
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: In computer science and information science, a formal representation of knowledge as a set of concepts within a domain, and the relationships between those concepts that can be used to reason about the entities within that domain, and may be used to describe the domain.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: open source
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the availability of a tool as open source software or not.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Open Source
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe der Verfügbarkeit eines Tools als Open Source Software oder nicht.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: operating system
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identification of the operating system and its exact specification that is required to execute the tool/service.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: операционна система
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Идентификация на операционната система и точните й спецификации, които се изискват, за да тръгне средството/услугата.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sistema operatiu
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fa referència al sistema operatiu i a l'especificació exacta necessària per executar l'eina/servei.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: operativni sustav
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identifikacija operativnoga sustava te njegova točna specifikacija potrebna za izvršenje alata/usluge.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: operativsystem
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Operativsystemet og dets eksakte specifikationer der kræves for at kunne afvikle værktøjet/servicen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: operatsioonisüsteem
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Näitab rakenduse tööks vajalikku operatsioonisüsteemi ja selle täpset spetsifikatsiooni.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: käyttöjärjestelmä
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Käyttöjärjestelmän tunniste ja tarkka spesifikaatio, joka vaaditaan jotta työkalu/palvelu toimisi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: système d'exploitation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identification du système d'exploitation (spécification exacte) nécessaire pour faire tourner un outil ou un service.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Betriebssystem
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe des Betriebssystems als exakte Spezifikation der Voraussetzungen, die es ermöglichen ein Werkzeug /einen Service auszuführen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: λειτουργικό σύστημα
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Προσδιορίζεται το λειτουργικό σύστημα το οποίο απαιτείται για τη λειτουργία ενός εργαλείου/ υπηρεσίας
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: operációs rendszer
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az operációs rendszer azonosítása és egzakt specifikációja ahhoz, hogy az eszköz/szolgáltatás végrehajtható legyen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sistema operativo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identificazione del sistema operativo e la sua esatta specificazione, la quale è richiesta per eseguire lo strumento/servizio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: operētājsistēma
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda rīka vai pakalpojuma izpildei nepieciešamo operētājsistēmu un precīzu tās specifikāciju.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: system operacyjne
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa system operacyjny oraz jego dokładną specyfikację, która jest wymagana do uruchomienia narzędzia/usługi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sistema operativo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identificação do sistema operativo e das especificações necessárias para executar a ferramenta/serviço.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sistema operativo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hace referencia al sistema operativo y a la especificación exacta necesaria para ejecutar la herramienta/servicio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: operativsystem
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anger operativsystem och dess exakta specifikation som krävs för att köra verktyget/tjänsten.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: orchestration
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: For webservices, orchestration refers to the prefered orchestration engine (or group of engines using the same orchestration formats).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: organization
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The organization that was leading the creation project or that is responsible for accessing the resource and the contact person is affiliated with.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: организация
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Организацията, която е ръководила проекта по създаването на ресурса или която отговаря за достъпа до него и в която работи лицето за контакт.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: organització
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'organització que ha liderat el projecte de creació o que és responsable de l'accés al recurs, i a la qual està adscrita la persona de contacte.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: organizacija
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Organizacija koja je vodila izradu projekta ili koja je odgovorna za pristup resursu, te u kojoj djeluje osoba za kontakt.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: organisation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Organisationen der stod i spidsen for projektet eller er ansvarlig for tilgangen til ressourcen og hvortil kontaktpersonen er tilknyttet ,
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: organisatsioon
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Organisatsioon või asutus, mis juhtis ressursi loomist või mis on vastutav ressursile juurdepääsu võimaldamise eest ja millega kontaktisik seotud on.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: organisaatio
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Organisaatio, joka on ohjannut luontihanketta tai joka vastaa pääsystä resursseihin ja jonka jäsen yhteyshenkilö on.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: organisation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'organisation en charge du projet qui a créé, géré ou distribué une ressource et à laquelle est affilié la personne à contacter pour cette ressource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Organisation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Die Organisation, die in der Erstellung der Ressource federführend beteiligt war, oder die Organisation, die für die Verwaltung des Zugriffs auf die Ressource zuständig ist und der die Kontaktperson angehört.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: οργανισμός
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ο οργανισμός που είναι υπεύθυνος για τη δημιουργία ή/και την πρόσβαση σε έναν πόρο
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: szervezet
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Annak a szervezetnek a neve, amely vezető szerepet töltött be az erőforrás létrehozásában vagy elérhetővé tételében, illetve annak a személynek az affiliációja, aki az erőforrás megosztásáért felelős.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: organizzazione
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'organizzazione che conduceva il progetto di creazione o che è responsabile dell'accesso alla risorsa e alla quale è affiliata la persona da contattare.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: organizācija
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Organizācija (līdz ar tās kontaktpersonu), kas vadījusi resursa izveides projektdarbu vai kas ir atbildīga par piekļuvi šim resursam.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: organizacja
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Organizacja, która odgrywała wiodącą rolę w projekcie, w ramach którego zasób/narzędzie/usługa została utworzona lub organizacja, która jest odpowiedzialna za udostępnianie zasobu; ponadto informacja o osobie do kontaktów związanej z daną organizacją.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: organização
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Organização envolvida na criação do projecto ou responsável pelo acesso ao recurso e ao contacto da pessoa a ele afiliada.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: organización
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La organización que lideró el proyecto de creación o que es responsable del acceso al recurso y a la que está afiliada la persona de contacto.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: organisation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Den organisation som ledde skapelseprojektet eller som är ansvarig för åtkomsten till resursen, och den kontaktperson som organisationen samarbetar med.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: original source
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates the original resources that were at the base of the creation/derivation process.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: оригинален ресурс
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Показва оригиналните ресурси, които са били основата за процеса на създаване/деривация.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: font original
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fa referència als recursos originals que constitueixen la base del procés de creació/derivació.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: originalni izvor
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Označava originalne resurse koji su bili temeljem u postupku izrade/derivacije.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: original kilde
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: den originale ressource, der dannede basis for skabelsen/afledelsesprocessen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: algallikas
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Näitab algset ressurssi, mille põhjal uus loodi või tuletati.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: alkuperäinen lähde
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ilmoittaa alkuperäiset resurssit, jotka olivat perustana luomis/johtamistapahtumalle.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: source d'origine
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Source originelle à la base de la création de la ressource actuelle (ou de sa dérivation).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Originalquelle
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe der ursprünglichen Ressource, die dem Erstellungs- oder Ableitungsprozess zu Grunde liegt.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: πηγή
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Προσδιορίζονται οι αρχικές πηγές στις οποίες βασίζεται η δημιουργία/παραγωγή ενός πόρου
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: eredeti erőforrás
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Megadja az eredeti erőforrásokat, amelyek a létrehozási/derivációs folyamat kiindulásaként szolgáltak.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fonte originale
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica le risorse originali che erano alla base del processo di creazione/derivazione.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: avots
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda resursus, kas bija pamatā izveides/atvasināšanas procesam.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: źródło oryginalne
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa oryginalne źródło - zasoby, które były podstawą dla procesu utworzenia lub rozszerzenia.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fonte original
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica os recursos originais que estiveram na base do processo de criação/derivação.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fuente original
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hace referencia a los recursos originales que constituyeron la base del proceso de creación/derivación.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ursprunglig källa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anger den ursprungliga resurs som byggde upp skapelse-/avledningsprocessen.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: other
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Other
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: други
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Други
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: altre
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Altre
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ostalo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ostalo
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: andet
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Andet
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: muu
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Muu
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: muu
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Jokin muu vaihtoehto
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: autre
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Autre. Sert à marquer une valeur différentes de celles spécifiées dans une liste définie)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Sonstige
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sonstige (als Wert um anzuzeigen, dass kein passender Wert in Werteliste vorhanden ist).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: egyéb
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Egyéb
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: altro
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Altro
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: cits
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Cits
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: inny
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Inny
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: outros
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Outros
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: otro
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Otro
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: annan
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Annan

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: output type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specification of the output type of a tool.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Ausgabetyp
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Spezifikation des Ausgabetyps eines Tools.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pages
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the (range of) pages used for the citation or derivation of a resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: paradigm
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Used for specifying the noun or verb class, gender, or other paradigm set that the lexeme or headword is associated with. These classes are generally given labels or numbers to differentiate them. Use the Range Set feature for consistency.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: paradigm label (English)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Used to label the paradigm form given in the pdv field. This is useful for paradigm sets that are incomplete or irregular. Use a Range Set.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: parallel corpus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specification of the type of a corpus as a parallel corpus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Paralleles Korpus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Spezifikation des Korpustyps als paralleles Korpus.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: participant age
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The age of the person participating in the content of the resource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: възраст на участника
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Възрастта на лицето, участващо в съдържанието на ресурса.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: edat del participant
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'edat de la persona que participa en el contingut del recurs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dob sudionika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Dob osobe koja sudjeluje u sadržaju resursa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: deltagers alder
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Alderen på deltageren i indholdet af ressourcen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: osaleja vanus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ressursi sisus osaleva isiku vanus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: osanottajan ikä
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Resurssin sisältöön osallistuvan henkilön ikä.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: age d'un participant
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'age d'une personne qui contribue (en général oralement) au contenu d'une ressource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Teilnehmer-Alter
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Alter der Person, die am Inhalt der Ressource teilnimmt.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ηλικία του συμμετέχοντα
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Η ηλικία του προσώπου που συμμετέχει στο περιεχόμενο ενός πόρου
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: az adatközlő életkora
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az adatközlő személy életkora.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: età di un partecipante
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'età di una persona che contribuisce al contenuto della risorsa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dalībnieka vecums
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Resursā saturā iekļautās personas vecums.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: wiek uczestnika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Wiek osoby występującej w treści zasobu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: idade do participante
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Idade da pessoa que participou no conteúdo do recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: edad del participante
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La edad de la persona que participa en el contenido del recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: deltagarens ålder
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Åldern på den deltagare som deltar i resursens innehåll.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: participant birthdate
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date of birth of the person participating in the content of the resource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: рожден ден на участника
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Датата на раждане на лицето, участващо в съдържанието на ресурса.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: data de naixement del participant
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La data de naixement de la persona que participa en el contingut del recurs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: datum rođenja sudionika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Datum rođenja osobe koja sudjeluje u sadržaju resursa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: deltagers fødselsdato
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fødselsdato på den person der er deltageren i indholdet af ressourcen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: osaleja sünnikuupäev
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ressursi sisus osaleva isiku sünnikuupäev.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: osanottajan syntymäaika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Resurssin sisältöön osallistuvan henkilön syntymäaika.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: date de naissance d'un participant
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La date de naissance d'une personne qui contribue (en général à l'oral) au contenu d'une ressource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Teilnehmer-Geburtsdatum
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Das Geburtsdatum der Person, die am Inhalt der Ressource partizipiert.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ημερομηνία γέννησης του συμμετέχοντα
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Η ημερομηνία γέννησης του προσώπου που συμμετέχει στο περιεχόμενο ενός πόρου
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: az adatközlő születési ideje
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az adatközlő személy születési ideje.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: data di nascita di un partecipante
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La data di nascita di una persona che contribuisce al contenuto della risorsa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dalībnieka dzimšanas datums
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Resursa saturā iekļautās personas dzimšanas datums.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: data urodzenia uczestnika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data urodzenia osoby występującej w treści zasobu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: data de nascimento do participante
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data de nascimento da pessoa que participou no conteúdo do recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fecha de nacimiento del participante
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La fecha de nacimiento de la persona que participa en el contenido del recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: deltagarens födelsedag
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anger det datum en deltagare i innehållet föddes.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: participant code
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Short unique code to identify the person participating in the content of the resource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: код на участника
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Кратък уникален код за идентифициране на лицето, участващо в съдържанието на ресурса.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: codi del participant
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Codi curt i únic per identificar la persona que participa en el contingut del recurs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kod sudionika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kratak jedinstveni kod kojime se identificira osoba koja sudjeluje u sadržaju resursa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: deltagers kode
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: En kort unik kode der identificerer deltageren i indholdet af ressourcen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: osaleja kood
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ressursi sisus osaleva isiku identifitseerimiseks mõeldud lühike unikaalne kood.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: osanottajan koodi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Lyhyt yksikäsitteinen koodi sen henkilön tunnistamiseksi, joka osallistuu resurssin sisältöön.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: code de participant
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Un code unique et court pour identifier un participant (en général à l'oral) au contenu d'une ressource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Teilnehmer-Kode
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kurzer eindeutiger Kode um die Person zu identifizieren, die am Inhalt der Ressource partizipiert.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: αναγνωριστικό/κωδικός συμμετέχοντα
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Σύντομος μοναδικός κωδικός του προσώπου που συμμετέχει στο περιεχόμενο ενός πόρου
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: az adatközlő kódja
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az adatközlő személy rövid egyedi azonosító kódja.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: codice di un partecipante
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Codice unico breve per identificare la persona che partecipa al contenuto della risorsa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dalībnieka kods
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Īss, unikāls kods, kas identificē resursa saturā iekļauto personu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kod uczestnika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Krótki, unikalny kod do identyfikacji osoby występującej w treści zasobu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: código do participante
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Código único que identifica a pessoa que participou no conteúdo do recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: código del participante
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Código corto y único para identificar a la persona que participa en el contenido del recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: deltagarens kod
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kort unik kod som identifierar den person som deltar i innehållet i resursen.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: participant dominant language
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifies the preferred language of a participant.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: доминиращ език на участника
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Специфицира предпочитания език на участника.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: llengua dominant del participant
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fa referència a la llengua preferida per un participant.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dominantni jezik sudionika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Određuje preferirani jezik sudionika.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: deltagerens primære sprog
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angiver hvilket sprog en deltager foretrækker.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: osaleja peamine keel
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Määrab osaleja enim eelistatavat keelt.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: osanottajan ensisijainen kieli
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Määrittää osanottajan ensisijaisen kielen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: langue dominante de participant
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Langue d'expression préférée d'un participant.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Dominante Sprache des Teilnehmers
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Spezifiziert die bevorzugte Sprache des Teilnehmers/der Teilnehmerin.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: az adatközlő domináns nyelve
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Megadja az adatközlő által elsődlegesen használt nyelvet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingua dominante del partecipante
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifica la lingua preferita di un partecipante.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dalībnieka pamatvaloda
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda dalībniekam pieņemamāko valodu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: podstawowy język uczestnika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Opisuje język preferowany przez uczestnika.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: língua dominante do participante
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Especifica a língua em que o participante melhor se expressa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: idioma dominante del participante
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hace referencia al idioma preferido por un participante.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: deltagarens primära språk
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anger det språk deltagaren föredrar.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: participant education
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The education of the person participating in the content of the resource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: образование на участника
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Образованието на лицето, участващо в съдържанието на ресурса.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: educació del participant
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El nivell de formació de la persona que participa en el contingut del recurs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: obrazovanje sudionika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Obrazovanje osobe koja sudjeluje u sadržaju resursa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: deltagerens uddannelse
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Den persons uddannelse der er deltageren i indholdet af ressourcen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: osaleja haridus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ressursi sisus osaleva isiku haridustase.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: osanottajan koulutus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Resurssin sisältöön osallistuvan henkilön koulutus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: niveau d'étude de participant
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Niveau d'étude d'une personne qui participe (souvent oralement) au contenu d'une ressource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Teilnehmer-Ausbildung
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Die Ausbildung der Person, die inhaltlich an der Ressource beteiligt ist.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: εκπαίδευση συμμετέχοντα
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Εκπαιδευτική βαθμίδα του προσώπου που συμμετέχει στο περιεχόμενο του πόρου
