rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sisu viitab või annab kommentaari esmasele andmete allikale.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: toissijainen dokumentti
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sisältö viittaa tai kommentoi ensisijaista tietoa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: document secondaire
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Le contenu se réfère à ou commente un document initial (appelé document primaire).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Sekundäres Dokument
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Der Inhalt bezieht sich auf (oder kommentiert) die Primärdaten.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: másodlagos dokumentum
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A másodlagos dokumentum tartalma az elsődleges adatra vagy annak egy részére referál, vagy arra vonatkozó megjegyzéseket tartalmaz.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: documento secondario
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Il contenuto fa riferimento a, o commenta, una parte di dati principali.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sekundārs dokuments
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tā saturs norāda uz kādiem primāriem datiem vai komentē tos.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dokument wtórny
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Treść odnosi się lub komentuje fragment danych źródłowych.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: documento secundário
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: O conteúdo faz referência ou comenta um documento principal.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: documento secundario
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El contenido hace referencia a, o comenta acerca de una muestra de datos primarios.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sekundärt dokument
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Innehållet avser eller kommenterar primära data.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: segmentation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specification of the pointers in time or sequence that indicates the segmentation process.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: segmentació
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Especificació dels indicadors en el temps o seqüència que indica el procés de segmentació.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: segmentacija
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifikacija pokazatelja vremena ili slijeda koja ukazuje na postupak segmentacije.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: segmentering
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specificerer tids- og frekvensmarkører der angiver segmenteringsprocessen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: segmenteerimine
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kirjeldab viidad ajas või muus järjendis, mis osutavad segmenteerimisprotsessi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: segmentaatio
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Määrittää ne aika- tai järjestysosoittimet, jotka viittaavat segmentoitumistapahtumaan.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: segmentation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Décrit des pointeurs dans le temps ou dans une séquence sur lesquels s'appuie un processus de segmentation.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Segmentierung
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Spezifikation der Zeitzeiger oder Zeitsequenzen, die den Segmentierungsprozess anzeigen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: szegmentálás
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Megadja azokat az időbeli vagy szekvenciabeli mutatókat, amelyek jelzik a szegmentálási folyamatot.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: segmentazione
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specificazione dei puntatori nel tempo, o in una sequenza che inica il processo di segmentazione.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: segmentēšana
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norādes laika vai secības rādītājus, kas atspoguļo segmentēšanas procesu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: segmentacja
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa wskaźniki w dziedzinie czasu lub sekwencję, która wyraża proces segmentacji.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: segmentação
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Especificação dos indicadores temporais ou sequenciais que indicam o processo de segmentação.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: segmentación
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Especificación de los indicadores en el tiempo o secuencia que indica el proceso de segmentación.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: segmentering
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: De tids-/sekvensmarkörer som visar segmenteringsprocessen.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: segmentation method
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the method with which the segmentation was achieved.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: mètode de segmentació
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicació del mètode amb què s'ha obtingut la segmentació.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metoda segmentacije
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Oznaka metode s pomoću koje je izvršena segmentacija.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: segmenteringsmetode
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angiver metoden som segmenteringen blev opnået med.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: segmenteerimismeetod
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Näitab meetodit, millega segmenteeriti.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: segmentaatiomenetelmä
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ilmoittaa menetelmän , jolla segmentaatio tehtiin.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: méthode de segmentation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indique la méthode de segmentation adoptée.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Segmentierungsmethode
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe der Methode, mit welcher die Segmentierung bewerkstelligt wurde.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: szegementációs módszer
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Megadja azt a módszert, amellyei a szegmentációt végezték.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metodo di segmentazione
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicazione del metodo con cui la segmentazione è tata ottenuta.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: segmentācijas metode
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda, ar kādu metodi tiek iegūta segmentācija.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metoda segmentacji
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa metodę, za pomocą które przeprowadzono segmentację.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: método de segmentação
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicação do método usado para fazer a segmentação.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: método de segmentación
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicación del método con el que se obtuvo la segmentación.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: segmenteringsmetod
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anger vilken metod som använts vid segmenteringen.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: segmentation unit
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The units according to which the segmentation process is conducted.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Einheit für die Segmentierung
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Einheit, die die Grundlage für die Segmentierung bietet.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: semantics
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The study of the meaning of linguistic structures.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: semàntica
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'estudi del significat de les estructures lingüístiques.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: semantika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Izučavanje značenja jezičnih struktura.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: semantik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Studiet af betydningen i lingvistiske strukturer.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: semantika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Teadus, mis uurib lingvistiliste struktuuride tähendust.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: semantiikka
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kielellisesten rakenteiden merkityksen tutkimus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sémantique
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Etude du sens associé au structures linguistiques.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Semantik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Die Untersuchung der Bedeutung linguistischer Strukturen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: szemantika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nyelvi szerkezetek jelentéseivel foglalkozó tudomány.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: semantica
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Lo studio del significato delle strutture linguistiche.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: semantika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nozare, kas pēta valodas struktūru nozīmi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: semantyka
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Badanie znaczenia struktur językowych.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: semântica
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Estudo do significado das estruturas linguísticas.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: semántica
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El estudio del significado de las estructuras lingüísticas.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: semantik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Studier av språkstrukturers betydelser.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: semi-interactive
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Primarily monologic speech punctuated by repeated interjections from the hearer(s).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: semiinteractiu
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Discurs principalment en forma de monòleg, puntuat per interjeccions repetides per part del/s receptor/s.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: poluinteraktivan
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Primarno monološki govor, prekinut opetovanim iskazima jednog ili više slušatelja.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: semi-interaktiv
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fortrinsvis monologisk tale afbrudt af gentagne udråb fra tilhøreren/tilhørerne.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: poolinteraktiivne
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Peaosas monoloogiline kõne, mida aeg-ajalt katkestavad kuulajate kommentaarid.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: puoli-interaktiivinen
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Pääasiassa yhden puhujan puhetta, johon kuulijat antavat palautteita.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: semi-interactif
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Parole essentiellement monologique ponctuée d'interjections récurrentes de la part des auditeurs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Semi-interaktiv
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Primär monologische Rede unterbrochen von wiederholten Einwürfen seitens der Zuhörer.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: félig interaktív
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Elsődlegesen monologikus beszéd, amelyet a hallgatóság ismételten félbeszakít.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: semi-interattivo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Discorso principalmente sotto forma di monologo punteggiato da interiezioni ripetute dall'ascoltatore o dagli ascoltatori.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: daļēji interaktīvs
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Pamatā monologs, ko pārtrauc izsaukumi no klausītāja puses.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: półinteraktywny
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Głównie mowa w postaci monologu przerywana poprzez powtarzające się interakcje ze strony słuchacza (słuchaczy).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: semi-interactivo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Discurso maioritariamente monológico, pontuado por repetidas interjeições por parte do(s) ouvinte(s).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: semi-interactivo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Discurso principalmente en forma de monólogo puntuado por interjecciones repetidas por parte del (de los) receptor(es).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: semi-interaktiv
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: I första hand monologiskt tal som avbryts av ideliga interjektioner från lyssnaren/lyssnarna.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: semi-spontaneous
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Prompted speech/song.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: semiespontani
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Parla/cançó provocada.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: poluspontan
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Potaknut govor/pjesma.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: semi-spontan
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sang/tale på opfordring.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: poolspontaanne
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Palutud kõne/laul.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: osittain spontaani
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: pyydetty puhe/laulu
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: semi-spontané
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Discours ou chant réclamé ou relancé.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Semi-spontan
félig spontán
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kérésre történő megnyilatkozás (beszéd/dal).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: semi-spontaneo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Discorso/canzone provocato.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: daļēji spontāns
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Runa/dziesma pēc aicinājuma.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: półspontaniczny
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Mowa lub piosenka w odpowiedzi na zachętę
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: semi-espontâneo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fala/canção induzida.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: semiespontáneo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Discurso/canción provocado.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: semi-spontan
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Framkallat tal/framkallad sång.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: seminar interpreting
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Type of business interpreting, usually in consecutive mode, involving small meetings between two or a few more individuals for less formal meetings.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sender
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the person or institution/organisation creating or submitting a digitised resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sense number
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Where a lexeme has more than one sense, this code is used to mark and number mark the beginning of each section that discusses a new sense. Don't use a sense number to mark a different part of speech; sn is only used within a given part of speech (in this hierarchy). (Remember to include sn 1 for records with multiple senses.) Use a Character Range Set.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: series
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the name of a series of resources (e.g. a book series).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sight translation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Oral translation, often impromptu, of a written text from one language to another in the presence of the end user with little or no prior examination on the part of the translator.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sign language interpreting
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The process of transmitting spoken language [such as English] into into a sign language [such as American Sign Language] and/or gestures for communication between deaf and hearing people.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: simultaneous interpreting
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A mode of interpretation that requires the interpreter to listen, analyze, comprehend, convert, edit, and reproduce in real time a speaker or signer’s message while the speaker or signer continues to speak or sign, in a specific social context

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: singing
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The content is performed to a tune.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: cant
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El contingut s'expressa amb una melodia.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pjevanje
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sadržaj se izvodi uz melodiju.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sang
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indholdet er fremført som sang.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: laul
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sisu on viisiga lauldud.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: laulu
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sisältö esitetään laulaen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: chanson
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Le contenu est chanté.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Gesang
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Der Inhalt wird in Form eines Liedes wiedergegeben.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: éneklés
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A tartalmat dallammal együtt adják elő.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: canto
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Il contenuto viene eseguito attraverso una melodia.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dziedāšana
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Satura izpildījums melodijā.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: śpiewanie
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Zawartość jest wykonywana zgodnie z melodią/.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: canção
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: O conteúdo é cantado.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: canto
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El contenido se expresa con una melodía.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sång
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Innehållet ges i form av en sång.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: size
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The size of the resource with regard to the SizeUnit measurement in form of a number.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: mida
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La mida del recurs en base al mesurament amb unitats de mesura en forma numèrica.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: veličina
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Veličina resursa s obzirom na jedinicu mjere (SizeUnit) u obliku broja.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: størrelse
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Størrelsen af ressourcen i forhold til SizeUnit målestokken, angivet ved et tal.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: suurus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ressursi suurus numbrina (mitu ühikut).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: koko
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Numeerisessa muodossa oleva resurssin koko suhteessa SizeUnit-mittayksikköön.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: taille
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La taille d'une ressource (relativement à une unité) sous forme d'un nombre.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Größe
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Die Größe einer Ressource hinsichtlich der Maßangabe zur Größeneinheit (SizeUnit) in Form einer Zahl.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: méret
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Egy erőforrás mérete egy mértékegységhez viszonyítva, számokkal megadva.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: taglia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La taglia della risorsa in riferimento alla misura dell'unità di taglia sotto forma di un numero.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: izmērs
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Resursa izmērs, kas izteikts izmēra mērvienībās ciparu formā.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: rozmiar
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Rozmiar zasobu mierzony za pomocą "Jednostki rozmiaru" SizeUnit i wyrażany w postaci liczby.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tamanho
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tamanho do recurso, medido em relação a uma unidade e expresso em números.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tamaño
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El tamaño del recurso en referencia a la medida por unidad de tamaño en forma de un número.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: storlek
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Numeriskt värde för resursens storlek med avseende på SizeUnit-måttet.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: size per language
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the size per language that is included in the resource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: mida per llengua
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicació de la mida per llengua inclosa en el recurs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: veličina po jeziku
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Oznaka veličine po jeziku koja je uključena u resurs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: størrelse per sprog
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angiver størrelsen for hvert sprog der er medtaget i ressourcen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: suurus keele kohta
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Näitab suurust ressursis sisladuva keele kohta.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: koko kieltä kohti
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ilmoittaa koon jokaista resurssiin kuuluvaa kieltä kohti.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: taille par langue
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication de la taille pour chaque langue contenue dans une ressource des parties en chacune de ces langues.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Größe pro Sprache
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hinweis auf die Größe pro Sprache, die in der Ressource enthalten ist.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nyelvenkénti méret
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az erőforrásban szereplő nyelvek méretének megadása.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: taglia per lingua
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicazione della taglia per la lingua inclusa nella risorsa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: izmērs katrai valodai
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda izmēru katrai valodai, kas ir iekļauta resursā.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: rozmiar na język
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa część rozmiaru zasobu przypadającą na język, który występuje w zasobie.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tamanho por língua
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicação do tamanho ocupado por cada língua no recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tamaño por idioma
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicación del tamaño por idioma que se incluye en el recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: storlek per språk
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anger storleken på varje språk som finns i resursen.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: size per representative level
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the size per representational unit in the resource (i.e. Number of syntactic units, number of semantic units etc.)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: mida per nivell representatiu
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicació de la mida per unitat de representació en el recurs (és a dir, nombre d'unitats sintàctiques, nombre d'unitats semàntiques, etc.).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: veličina po razini reprezentacije
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Oznaka veličine po jedinici reprezentacije u resursu (npr. broj sintaktičkih jedinica, broj semantičkih jedinica itd.).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: størrelse pr. repræsentationsniveau
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angiver størrelsen per repræsentationsenhed i ressourcen (dvs. antallet af syntaktiske enheder, antallet af semantiske enheder, osv.)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: suurus taseme kohta
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Näitab suurust ressursis oleva märgendustaseme kohta (süntaktiliste ühikute arv, semantiliste ühikute arv jne).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: koko kuvaavaa tasoa kohti
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ilmoittaa koon jokaista resurssin kuvausyksikköä kohti (ts. syntaktisten yksiköiden lukumäärä, semanttisten yksiköiden lukumäärä jne.)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: taille par niveau de représentation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication de la taille pour chaque niveau de représentation présent dans la ressource (nombre de mots, de structures syntaxiques, d'unités sémantiques, etc.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Größe pro Repräsentationsebene
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hinweise auf die Größe je Repräsentationseinheit (z.B. Anzahl der syntaktischen Einheiten, Anzahl der semantischen Einheiten).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: a reprezentáció szintje szerinti méret
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az erőforrás mérete a benne található reprezentációs egységek szerint (pl. a szintaktikai egységek vagy a szemantikai egységek száma, stb.)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: taglia per livello rappresentativo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicazione della taglia per unità di rappresentazione nella risorsa (cioè numero di unità sintattiche, numero di unità semantiche ecc.)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: izmērs katram valodas līmenim
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda izmēru katram resursā esošajam līmenim (piem., sintaktisko vienību skaits, semantisko vienību skaits u. tml.)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: rozmiar na poziomie reprezentacji
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa rozmiar mierzony w jednostkach reprezentacji zasobu (tzn. liczba jednostek składniowych, liczba jednostek semantycznych itd.)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tamanho por nível de representação
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicação do tamanho por unidade de representação contida no recurso (i.e. Número de unidades sintácticas, número de unidades semânticas, etc.)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tamaño por nivel representativo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicación del tamaño por unidad de representación en el recurso (esto es, número de unidades sintácticas, número de unidades semánticas, etc.)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: storlek per representativ nivå
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anger storleken på varje representativ enhet i resursen (dvs. antal syntaktiska enheter, antal semantiska enheter etc.).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: size unit
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specification of the unit of size that is used when specifying the size.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: unitat de mida
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Especificació de la unitat de mida que s'utilitza per indicar la mida.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: jedinica veličine
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifikacija jedinice veličine rabljene pri specifikaciji veličine.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: størrelsesenhed
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angiver den måleenhed der er brugt til at specificere størrelsen i.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: suuruse ühik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Määrab ressursi suuruse kirjeldamiseks kasutatava suurusühiku.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: koon mittayksikkö
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ilmoittaa yksikön, jota käytetään koon määrityksessä.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: unité de taille
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Spécification de l'unité de taille à utiliser pour interpréter une taille donnée (donnée comme un simple nombre).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Größeneinheit
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe der Maßeinheit, die verwendet wird um die Größe zu spezifizieren.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: mértékegység
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Annak a mértékegységnek a megjelölése, amely a méret meghatározására szolgál.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: unità di misura
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specificazione dell'unità di misura usata quando si specifica la dimensione.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: izmēra vienība
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Definē mērvienības, kas izmantotas, nosakot izmēru.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: jednostka rozmiaru
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa jednostki rozmiaru, w których jest specyfikowany rozmiar zasobu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: unidade de medida
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Especificação da unidade de medida usada para indicar o tamanho.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: unidad de tamaño
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Especificación de la unidad de tamaño que se emplea al especificar el tamaño.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: storleksenhet
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anger den storleksenhet som används vid specificeringen av storleken.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: social context
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates the social context the event took place in.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: context social
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fa referència al context social en què ha tingut lloc l'esdeveniment.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: društveni kontekst
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Označava društveni kontekst u kojemu se odvijao događaj.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: social kontekst
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angiver den sociale kontekst i hvilken begivenheden fandt sted.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sotsiaalne kontekst
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Kirjeldab sotsiaalset konteksti, milles sündmus aset leidis.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sosiaalinen konteksti
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ilmoittaa kielellisen tapahtuman sosiaalisen kontekstin.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: contexte social
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Context social dans lequel l'évènement (de communication) s'insère.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Sozialer Kontext
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Gibt den sozialen Kontext an, in dessen Rahmen ein Ereignis stattgefunden hat.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: szociális környezet
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Azt a szociális környezetet adja meg, amelyben az esemény létrejött.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: contesto sociale
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica il contesto sociale in cui ha luogo l'evento.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sociālais konteksts
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda, kādā sociālajā kontekstā notikums ir noticis.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kontekst społeczny
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa kontekst społeczny, w którym zdarzenie ma miejsce.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: contexto social
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica o contexto social em que o evento ocorreu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: contexto social
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hace referencia al contexto social en que tuvo lugar el evento.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: social kontext
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anger den sociala kontext som omgav händelsen.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: social family role
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The social or family role of the person participating in the content of the resource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: rol familiar i social
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El rol social o familiar de la persona que participa en el contingut del recurs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: društvena/obiteljska uloga
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Društvena ili obiteljska uloga osobe koja sudjeluje u sadržaju resursa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: social familiemæssig rolle
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Den persons sociale eller familiemæssige rolle der deltager i indholdet af ressourcen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sotsiaalne roll või roll peres
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ressursis osaleva inimese sotsiaalne või pereroll.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sosiaalinen/perherooli
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Resurssin sisältöön osallistuvan henkilön sosiaalinen tai perherooli.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: rôle social ou rôle dans la famille
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Le rôle social ou le rôle dans la famille d'une personne participant (souvent de façon orale) au contenu de la ressource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Soziale/Familiäre Rolle
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Die soziale oder familiäre Rolle einer Person, die inhaltlich an der Ressource partizipiert.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: a társadalomban vagy a családban betöltött szerep
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az adatközlő társadalomban vagy a családban betöltött szerepe.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ruolo sociale e familiare
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Il ruolo sociale o familiare della persona che partecipa al contenuto della risorsa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sociālā loma vai loma ģimenē
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Resursa saturā ietvertās personas sociālā loma vai loma ģimenē.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: rola społeczno-rodzinna
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Rola społeczna lub rodzinna osoby występującej w treści zasobu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: papel social da família
papel familiar y social
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El papel social o familiar de la persona que participa en el contenido del recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: socio-familjeroll
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Den sociala roll eller familjeroll personen som deltar i resursens innehåll har.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sociolinguistics
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The study of language in context of the society that speaks it.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sociolingüística
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'estudi d'una llengua en el context de la societat que la parla.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sociolingvistika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Izučavanje jezika u kontekstu društva koje njime govori.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sociolingvistik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Studiet af sprog i forhold til det samfund der taler det,
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sotsiolingvistika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Teadus, mis uurib keelt selle ühiskonna kontekstis, kus seda keelt räägitakse.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sosiolingvistiikka
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tutkimus kielestä suhteessa yhteiskuntaan, jossa sitä puhutaan.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: socio-linguistique
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'étude d'une langue en référence à la société dans laquelle cette langue est parlée.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Soziolinguistik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Die Untersuchung von Sprache im Kontext der Gesellschaft, die sie spricht.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: szociolingvisztika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A nyelv vizsgálata annak a társadalomnak a kontextusában, amely használja ezt a nyelvet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sociolinguistica
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Lo studio della lingua nel contesto in cui essa è parlata.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sociolingvistika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Pēta valodu saistībā ar sabiedrību, kādā to runā.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: socjolingwistyka
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Badanie języka w kontekście społeczeństwa, które się nim posługuje.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sociolinguística
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Estudo da linguagem no contexto social em que é falada.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sociolingüística
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El estudio de una lengua dentro del contexto de la sociedad que la habla.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sociolingvistik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Studier av språk i förhållande till de samhällen de används i.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: source
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Used to indicate the name and village of the informant who provided the data in the current entry.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: source language
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates if a language is a source language. (boolean)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: llengua origen
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica si la llengua és llengua origen (booleà)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: izvorni jezik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Označava je li jezik izvorni jezik. (boolean).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kildesprog
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angiver om sproget er et kildesprog (Boolsk værdi).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lähtekeel
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Näitab, kas keel on lähtekeeleks, näiteks tõlgetes (boolean).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lähdekieli
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ilmoittaa onko kieli lähdekieli (totuusarvoinen).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: langue d'origine
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indique si la langue est la langue d'origine (cf. traductions par exemple). Valeur booléenne.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Quellsprache
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Zeigt an, ob die Sprache eine Quellsprache ist (boolesch).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: γλώσσα πηγή
forrásnyelv
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Azt jelzi, hogy az adott nyelv forrásnyelv-e (boole-i).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingua d'origine
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica se una lingua è la lingua d'origine. (boolean)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: avotvaloda
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda, vai valoda ir avotvaloda. (boolean)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: język źródłowy
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa czy dany język jest językiem źródłowym (cecha boolowska).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: língua de partida
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identifica se uma língua é a língua de partida (boolean).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lengua origen
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica si la lengua es lengua origen (boolean)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: källspråk
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anger om ett språk är ett källspråk (booleskt värde).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: source text
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The text to be translated.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: special language
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A language used in a subject field and characterized by the use of specific linguistic means of expression.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: specialised corpus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specification of the type of a corpus as a specialised corpus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Spezialisiertes Korpus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Spezifikation des Korpustyps als ein spezialisiertes Korpus.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: spontaneous
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Unprompted speech/song
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: espontani
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Discurs/cançó no provocat
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: spontan
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nepotaknut govor/pjesma
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: spontan
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sang/tale fremført uopfordret.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: spontaanne
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Spontaanne kõne/laul.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: spontaani
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: valmistelematon puhe/laulu
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: spontané
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: discours ou chanson non dirigé
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Spontan
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Rede/Lied, zu dem nicht aufgefordert wurde.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: αυθόρμητος
spontán
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Olyan ének/beszéd, amely felszólítás/kérdés nélkül jött létre.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: spontaneo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Discorso/canzone non provocato
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: spontāns
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Spontāna runa/dziesma - izpildīta bez uzaicinājuma.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: spontaniczny
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Mowa/piosenka produkowana bez zachęty
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: espontâneo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fala/canção não induzida.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: espontáneo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Discurso/canción no provocado
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: spontan
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Icke framkallat tal/sång.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: standard deviation of the participants' mean age
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the standard deviation (STD) of the participants' mean age in a research study, especially in the field of psychology or linguistics.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Standardabweichung des Durchschnittalters der Teilnehmer
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe der Standardabweichung (STD) des Durchschnittsalters der Teilnehmer von einer Forschungsstudie, insbesondere im Bereich der Psychologie oder Linguistik.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: start position
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The start position of the resource such as a time unit for an audio resource (seconds, minutes, etc.) or a chapter, for instance, for a text resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: start year
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The year in which the creation process was started.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: any d'inici
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'any en què ha començat el procés de creació.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: godina početka
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Godina u kojoj je započet postupak izrade.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: begyndelsesår
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Året hvor skabelsen af data blev påbegyndt.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: algusaasta
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Aasta, millal ressursi loomist alustati.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: aloitusvuosi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Vuosi, jolloin luomisprosessi aloitettiin.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: année de début
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'année durant laquelle le processus de création a commencé.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Anfangsjahr
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Das Jahr, in dem der Erstellungsprozess begonnen wurde.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kezdeti év
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az az év, amelyben a létrehozás elkezdődött.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: anno di inizio
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'anno in cui il processo di creazione è iniziato.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sākuma gads
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Gads, kurā tika uzsākta resursa veidošana.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: rok startu
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Rok, w którym proces budowy został rozpoczęty.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ano de início
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ano em que foi iniciado o processo de criação.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: año de inicio
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El año en que comenzó el proceso de creación.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: startår
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Året då skapelseprocessen startades.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: statistical machine translation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A data-driven mode of machine translation where translations are generated on the basis of statistical models whose parameters are derived from the analysis of bilingual text corpora.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: status
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Used to indicate how complete or thoroughly checked an entry is. Use a Range Set.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: stimuli
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A resource created for a purpose of an experiment
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: estímuls
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Un recurs creat a propòsit d'un experiment.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: podražaji
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Resurs izrađen u svrhu eksperimenta
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: stimuli
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: En ressource der er skabt til et eksperiment.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: stiimul
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Mingi eksperimendi nimel koostatud ressurss.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: stimuli
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Resurssi, joka on luotu koetarkoituksiin.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: stimuli
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ressource créée pour une expérience
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Stimuli
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Eine Ressource, die für ein Experiment erstellt wurde.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: inger
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az erőforrást kísérleti célból hozták létre.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: stimoli
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Una risorsa creata per un obiettivo di un esperimento.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: stimuls
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Resurss ir izveidots eksperimentāliem nolūkiem.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: bodziec
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Zasób stworzony na potrzeby eksperymentu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: incentivos
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Recurso criado com fins experimentais.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: estímulos
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Un recurso creado con objeto de un experimento.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: stimuli
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: En resurs som skapats för ett syfte med experimentet.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: structural units
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the structural units that are marked up in the resource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: unitats estructurals
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicació de les unitats estructurals que s'han etiquetat en el recurs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: strukturne jedinice
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Oznaka strukturnih jedinica označenih u resursu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: strukturelle enheder
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Strukturelle enheder der er opmærkede i ressourcen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: strukturaalsed ühikud
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Näitab ressursis märgitud strukturaalseid ühikuid.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: rakenteellinen yksikkö
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ilmoitttaa resurssiin merkityt rakenteelliset yksiköt.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: unités structurelles
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Les unités de structure repérées dans la ressource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Strukturelle Einheiten
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hinweis auf die strukturellen Einheiten, die in der Ressource markiert sind.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: strukturális egység
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az erőforrásban található strukturális egységek megjelölése.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: unità strutturali
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicazione delle unità strutturali che sono contrassegnate in una risorsa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: struktūras vienības
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda, kādas struktūras vienības resursā ir marķētas.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: jednostki strukturalne
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa jednostki strukturalne, które zostały oznaczone w zasobie.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: unidades estruturais
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicação das unidades estruturais assinaladas no recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: unidades estructurales
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicación de las unidades estructurales que se han etiquetado en el recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: strukturella enheter
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anger de strukturella enheter som märkts upp i resursen.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: studio
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: studio recording environment
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: estudi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: entorn d'enregistrament en un estudi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: studio
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: studijska oprema za snimanje
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: studie
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Studieoptagelsesmiljø.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: stuudio
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Salvestus leidis aset salvestusstuudios.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: studio
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: studio nauhoituksen ympäristönä
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: studio d'enregistrement
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: l'enregistrement s'est effectué dans un studio d'enregistrement
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Studio
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Aufnahme in einer Studio-Umgebung
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: studió
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: studióban történő felvétel
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: studio
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ambiente dello studio di registrazione
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: studija
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: ierakstes vide ir studija
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: studio
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: studio jako środowisko rejestracji (nagrywania)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: estudio
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: entorno de grabación en un estudio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: studio
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: studioinspelningsmiljö

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sub genre
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The conventionalized discourse or text sub-types of the content of the resource, based on extra-linguistic and internal linguistic criteria.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sub-level information
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicate the sub-level information that is contained in the lexicon that qualifies the main level information.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: informació de nivell secundari
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fa referència a la informació de nivell secundari continguda en el lèxic, que qualifica la informació del nivell principal.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: informacija sekundarne razine
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Označava informaciju sekundarne razine koja je sadržana u leksikonu, a koja pobliže opisuje informaciju primarne razine.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sekundær information
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sekundær information i leksikon, der kvalificerer den primære information.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: alamtaseme info
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Näitab leksikonis olevat alamtaseme informatsiooni, mis liigitab peataseme infot.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: alatason informaatio
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ilmoittaa leksikon sisältämän alatason informaation, joka tarkentaa päätason informaatiota.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: information en dessous du premier niveau
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indique les informations de second niveau présentes dans un lexique et qui qualifient les informations de premier niveau.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Information zu Unterebenen
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Information über die Unterebenen, die in einem Lexikon enthalten sind und die Information der Hauptebene genauer beschreiben.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: felső szint alatti információ
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Azt a felső szint alatti információt jelöli, amely lexikonban a felső szintű információt minősíti.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: informazione del livello secondario
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica l'informazione del livello secondario, contenuta nel lessico, che qualifica l'informazione del livello principale.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: apakšlīmeņa informācija
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda leksikonā atrodamo apakšlīmeņa informāciju, kas raksturo pamatinformāciju.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dodatkowy poziom informacji
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa dodatkowy poziom informacji, który występuje w leksykonie i zapewnia dodatkową kwalifikację informacji poziomu głównego.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: informação secundária
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica a informação secundária contida no léxico que classifica a informação principal.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información de nivel secundario
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hace referencia a la información de nivel secundario contenida en el léxico que califica la información del nivel principal.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: underordnad information
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anger den underordnade information som ingår i lexikonet som modifierar den överordnade informationen.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: subcorpus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specification of the corpus type as being a subcorpus of a main corpus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Subkorpus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Spezifikation des Korpustyps als ein Subkorpus eines anderen (Haupt-)Korpus.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: substructure name
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The name of the part of a resource that is structurally identifiable.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Name der Teilstruktur
substructure type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The type of the part of a resource that is structurally identifiable.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Typ der Teilstruktur
subtitling
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The addition of textual versions of the dialog in films and television programs, usually displayed at the bottom of the screen.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: survey period
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the survey period in which the elicitation of a research study, especially in the field of psychology or linguistics, was carried out.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Erhebungszeitraum
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe des Erhebungzeitraums, in dem Daten für eine Forschungsstudie, insbesondere im Bereich der Psychologie oder Linguistik, erhoben wurden.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: survey type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication the type of elicitation used for survey data within a research study, especially in the field of psychology or linguistics.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Befragungstyp
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe des Typs der Datenerhebung, der für Befragungsdaten innerhalb einer Forschungsstudie verwendet wurde, insbesondere im Bereich der Psychologie oder Linguistik.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: syntax
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: 'The study of grammatical relations between words and other units within a sentence' (Concise Oxford Dictionary of Linguistics). To be distinguished from morphology, which applies to units smaller than the word.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sintaxi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: "L'estudi de les relacions gramaticals entre paraules i altres unitats dins una frase" (traducció de la definició del Concise Oxford Dictionary of Linguistics). S'ha de diferenciar de la morfologia, que s'aplica a unitats més petites que la paraula.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sintaksa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: 'Izučavanje gramatičkih odnosa između riječi i drugih jedinica unutar rečenice' (Concise Oxford Dictionary of Linguistics). Valja je razlikovati od morfologije, koja se odnosi na jedinice manje od riječi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: syntaks
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Studiet af ords og andre enheders grammatiske sammenhænge i en sætning.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: süntaks
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Teadus, mis uurib sõnade vahelisi grammatilisi seoseid lauses ning lausete struktuuri.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: syntaksi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: "Tutkimus kieliopillisista suhteista sanojen ja muiden yksiköiden välillä lauseessa" (Concise Oxford Dictionary of Linguistics). Syntaksi eroaa morfologiasta, joka käsittelee sanojen rakennetta.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: syntaxe
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Etude des relations grammaticales entre les mots.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Syntax
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Die Untersuchung von grammatischen Relationen zwischen Wörtern und anderen Satzeinheiten. Zu unterscheiden von Morphologie, die sich mit Einheiten unterhalb der Wortgrenze befasst.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: σύνταξη
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Η μελέτη των γραμματικών σχέσεων μεταξύ των λέξεων και άλλων μονάδων μέσα στην πρόταση. Διακρίνεται από τη μορφολογία η οποία αναφέρεται σε μονάδες κατώτερες της λέξης
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: szintaxis
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Szavak és a mondat más elemei közti grammatikai viszonyok tanulmányozása (Concise Oxford Dictionary of Linguistics). Meg kell különböztetni a morfológiától, amely a szónál kisebb szintű egységekkel foglalkozik.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sintassi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Lo studio delle relazioni grammaticali tra parole e altre unità all'interno di una frase "Breve Dizionario di Oxford di Linuistica). Si distingue dalla morfologia, la quale tratta unità più piccole della parola.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sintakse
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Gramatikas daļa, kurā pēta vārdu savienojumu, teikumu un tekstu gramatisko struktūru un izveidošanas likumības.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: składnia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: 'Badania nad relacjami gramatycznymi pomiędzy słowami i innymi jednostkami w ramach zdania' (Concise Oxford Dictionary of Linguistics). Składnię odróżnia od morfologii rodzaj jednostek podlegających opisowi - morfologia ma zastosowanie do jednostek mniejszych niż wyraz.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sintaxe
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: "Estudo das relações gramaticais entre palavras e outras unidades, a nível frásico" (Concise Oxford Dictionary of Linguistics). Distingue-se da morfologia, que se ocupa de unidades menores do que a palavra.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sintaxis
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: "El estudio de las relaciones gramaticales entre palabras y otras unidades dentro de una frase" (traducción de la definición del Concise Oxford Dictionary of Linguistics). Debe diferenciarse de la morfología, que se aplica a unidades más pequeñas que la palabra.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: syntax
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: "Studier av grammatiska relationer mellan ord och andra enheter på meningsnivå" (Concise Oxford Dictionary of Linguistics). Syntax skall skiljas från morfologi, som avser studier av enheter inom ordet.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tagset
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifies the tag set used in the annotation of the resource or a used by the tool/service or it contains a URL that points to the information about the tag set.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: etiquetari
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fa referència a l'etiquetari emprat per a l'anotació del recurs o usat per l'eina/servei, o bé conté una URL que fa referència a la informació sobre l'etiquetari.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: skup oznaka
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Označava skup oznaka koji se rabi u označavanju resursa ili kojime se korist alat/usluga, odnosno sadrži URL koji upućuje na podatak o skupu oznaka.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tagsæt
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tagsættet der er brugt i annoteringen af ressourcen, i et værktøj/en service eller der indeholder en URL som peger på informationen om tagsættet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: märgendisüsteem
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Täpsustab ressursis kasutatud või rakenduses kasutatava märgendite süsteemi. Võib kujutada endast ka viita veebilehele, kus märgendisüsteemi kirjeldatakse.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tagset
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Määrittää tagijoukon, jota käytetään resurssin annotaatiossa tai työkalussa/palvelussa, tai sisältää URL:in joka osoittaa tagsettia koskevaan informaatioon.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ensemble de catégories
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Spécifie l'ensemble des catégories utilisées pour annoter une ressource ou acceptée en entrée ou en sortie par un outil ou un service. Peut contenir une URL qui pointe vers une description de l'ensemble de catégories (ang. tagset).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Tagset
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Spezifiziert ein Tagset, das in der Annotation einer Ressource verwendet wird, oder das von einem Werkzeug/ einem Service eingesetzt wird oder eine URL, die auf Informationen über ein Tagset verweist.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: σύνολο χαρακτηριστικών επισημείωσης
tagset
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Megadja azt a tag-halmazt, amelyet az erőforrás annotálása során használtak, vagy amit az eszköz/szolgáltatás használ. Lehet egy URL is, amely a tagset-re vonatkozó információkra mutat.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: insieme delle etichette
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifica l'insieme delle etichette impiegato per l'annotazione della risorsa o per lo strumento/servizio o contiene un URL che rimanda all'informazione sull'insieme delle etichette.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pazīmju kopa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda resursa marķēšanā vai rīkā/pakalpojumā izmantoto pazīmju kopu; vai norāda uz URL, kurā ir informācija par šo pazīmju kopu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tagset
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa zbiór znaczników (tzw. tagset), który został zastosowany do anotacji (oznaczenia/opisania) zasobu lub został użyty w ramach narzędzia/usługi. Może też zawierać adres URL wskazujący na informację o zbiorze znaczników.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: conjunto de etiquetas para anotação
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Especifica o conjunto de etiquetas usado na anotação do recurso ou aceites pela ferramenta/serviço; pode conter um URL que forneça informaçãos sobre o conjunto de etiquetas.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: etiquetario
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hace referencia al etiquetario empleado para la anotación del recurso o por la herramienta/servicio o bien contiene una URL que hace referencia a la información sobre el tag set.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tagguppsättning
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anger den uppsättning taggar som används vid annotationen av resursen eller som används av verktyget/tjänsten, eller också innehåller den en adress till en webbplats som pekar på information om tagguppsättningen.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tagset language
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates the language of the tag set itself, expressed in the two-letter language codes of iso639.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: llengua de l'etiquetari
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fa referència a la llengua del propi etiquetari, expressada en els codis de llengua de dues lletres de la norma ISO 639.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: jezik skupa oznaka
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Označava jezik samoga skupa oznaka, izražen dvoslovnim kodovima jezika prema iso639.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tagsæt sprog
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Selve tagsættets sprog, angivet i en tobogstavskode som defineret i ISO 639.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: märgendisüsteemi keel
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Näitab märgendisüsteemi enda keelt, vastavalt ISO639 kahetähelisele keelekoodile.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tagsetin kieli
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ilmoittaa tagsetin kielen ilmaistuna iso639:n kaksikirjaimisena kielikoodina.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: langue de l'ensemble des catégories
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La langue dans laquelle est exprimé le jeu de catégories sous forme d'un code de langue iso-639-2 (codes de langues sur deux lettres).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Tagset-Sprache
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Gibt die Sprache des Tagsets selbst an in Form eines Zwei-Buchstaben-Sprachkodes nach ISO639.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: a tagset nyelve
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Megadja a tagset nyelvét egy kétbetűs kód formájában, ahogy azt az iso639 szabvány meghatározza.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingua dell'insieme delle etichette
pazīmju kopas valoda
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda, kādā valodas ir pazīmju kopa, izmantojot valodas nosaukumu divburtu kodus atbilstoši ISO 639.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: język tagsetu
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa język zbioru znaczników wyrażony w postaci dwuliterowego kodu języka standardu iso639.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: língua das etiquetas de anotação
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica a língua em que está escritas as etiquetas de anotação, sob a forma de duas letras, de acordo com o código ISO639
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: idioma del etiquetario
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Hace referencia al idioma de las propias etiquetas del etiquetario, expresadas en los códigos de dos letras de la norma ISO 639.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tagguppsättningsspråk
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anger tagguppsättningens språk, uttryckt i språkkoder bestående av två bokstäver enligt ISO639.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: target language
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates if the language is the target language.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: llengua destí
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica si la llengua és la llengua destí.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ciljni jezik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Označava je li jezik ciljni jezik.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: målsprog
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angiver om sproget er målsproget.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sihtkeel
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Näitab, kas keel on sihtkeel.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kohdekieli
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ilmoittaa onko kieli kohdekieli.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: langue cible
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indique si la langue considérée est la langue cible.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Zielsprache
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Gibt an, ob die Sprache die Zielsprache ist.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: γλώσσα στόχος
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Δηλώνεται αν η γλώσσα που περιλαμβάνεται σε έναν πόρο αποτελεί γλώσσα στόχο
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: célnyelv
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Azt jelzi, hogy az adott nyelv célnyelv-e.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingua d'arrivo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica se la lingua è la lingua d'arrivo.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: mērķvaloda
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Norāda, vai valoda ir mērķvaloda.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: język docelowy
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Określa czy dany język jest językiem docelowym.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: língua de chegada
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica se é ou não a língua de chegada.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lengua meta
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indica si la lengua es la lengua meta.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: målspråk
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anger om språket är målspråk.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: target text
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A text produced as the result of the translation process.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: task
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The major task carried out in the resource or a typical task description of the tool/service.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tasca
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La tasca principal duta a terme en el recurs o una descripció de la tasca típica de l'eina/servei.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: zadatak
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Glavni zadatak izvršen u resursu ili opis tipičnoga zadatka alata/usluge.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: opgave
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Den væsentligste opgave der er udført i ressourcen eller en typisk opgavebeskrivelse af værktøjet/servicen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ülesanne
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Peamine ülesanne, mida ressurss täidab või rakenduse (näiteks dialoogsüsteemi) tüüpiline ülesandekirjeldus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tehtävä
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Pääasiallinen resurssissa suoritettu tehtävä tai työkalun/palvelun tyypillinen tehtäväkuvaus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tâche
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La tâche à accomplir (dialogue finalisé par exemple) telle que reflétée dans la ressource ou une description de la tâche typique d'une outil ou d'un service.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Aufgabe
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Die Hauptaufgabe, die in der Ressource ausgeführt wird oder der typischen Aufgabenbeschreibung des Werkzeugs/Services angegeben ist.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: feladat
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A végrehajtandó feladat akár az erőforrás vonatkozásában, akár az eszköz/szolgáltatás tipikus feladatának leírása.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: compito
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Il compito principale svolto dalla risorsa o una descrizione del compito tipico di uno strumento/servizio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: uzdevums
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Galvenais resursā veiktais uzdevums vai tipiskais rīka vai pakalpojuma uzdevums.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: zadanie
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Główne zadanie realizowane w ramach zasobu lub opis typowego zadania narzędzia/zasobu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tarefa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tarefa principal executada pelo recurso ou uma descrição típica da ferramenta/serviço.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: función
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La función principal llevada a cabo en el recurso o una descripción típica de la función de la herramienta/servicio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: uppgift
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Den mest betydande uppgift som utförs i resursen eller en typisk uppgiftsbeskrivning av verktyget/tjänsten.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: taxonomy
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A collection of controlled vocabulary terms organized into a hierarchical structure.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: technical translation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Type of translation involving the mediation of observed knowledge to manipulate the environment for the improvement of the human condition.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: telephone
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Content transmitted via telephone.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: telèfon
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Contingut transmès per telèfon.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: telefon
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sadržaj prenesen putem telefona.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: telefon
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indholdet er transmitteret via telefon.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: telefon
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sisu on edastatud telefoni teel.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: puhelin
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sisällön siirtäminen puhelimitse.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: téléphone
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Le contenu est transmis via le téléphone.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Telefon
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Inhalt wird über das Telefon übertragen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: telefon
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Telefon által közvetített tartalom.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: telefono
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Contenuto trasmesso via telefono.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: telefons
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Saturs, kas tiek pārraidīts pa telefonu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: telefon
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Treść przesyłana przez telefon.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: telefone
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Conteúdp transmitido por telefone.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: teléfono
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Contenido transmitido por teléfono.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: telefon
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Innehållet överfört via telefon.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: telephone number
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The telephone number of a person or an organization that is involved in creating, managing or accessing the resource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: número de telèfon
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El número de telèfon d'una persona o organització involucrada en la creació, manteniment o accés al recurs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: broj telefona
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Broj telefona osobe ili organizacije uključene u izradu, upravljanje ili pristup resursu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: telefonnummer
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Telefonnummeret til en person eller organisation der er involveret i ressourcens skabelse, vedligeholdelse eller adgang.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: telefoninumber
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ressursi loomise, haldamise või juurdepääsuga seotud isiku telefoninumber.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: puhelinnumero
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Sen henkilön tai organisaation faksinumero, joka tuottaa tai hallitsee resursseja ja/tai työkaluja/palveluita tai päättää niiden käyttöoikeuksista.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: numéro de téléphone
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Le numéro de télépone d'une personne ou d'une organisation impliquée dans la création, la gestion ou la mise à disposition d'une ressource, d'un outil ou d'un service.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Telefonnummer
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Die Telefonnummer einer Person oder Organisation, die in die Entwicklung, die Verwaltung der Ressource oder den Zugriff auf die Ressource involviert ist.
Annak a személynek vagy szervezetnek a telefonszáma, amely részt vesz az erőforrás létrehozásában, fenntartásában, elérhetővé tételében.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: numero di telefono
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Il numero di telefono di una persona o un'organizzazione coinvolta nella creazione, gestione e accesso della risorsa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tālruņa numurs
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Resursa izveidē, uzturēšanai vai piekļuves nodrošināšanā iesaistītās personas vai organizācijas tālruņa numurs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: numer telefonu
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Numer telefonu osoby lub organizacji, która była zaangażowana w tworzenie zasobu, zarządzanie nim lub udostępnianie dostępu do niego.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: número de telefone
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Número de telefone da pessoa ou organização envolvida na criação, gestão e disponibilização do recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: número de teléfono
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El número de teléfono de una persona u organización involucrada en la creación, mantenimiento o acceso al recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: telefonnummer
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Telefonnumret till en person eller en organisation som är involverad i att skapa, handha eller komma åt resursen.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: temporal classification
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Classification of the time period of the language use within a resource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: zeitliche Klassifizierung
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Klassifikation der zeitlichen Periode des Sprachgebrauchs in einer Ressource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: term bank
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A data bank containing terminological data.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: term extraction
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment:
The identification and compilation of translation-relevant single or multiword terms from monolingual or aligned bilingual texts.
ISO 1087-1, 3.6.7 term excerption part of terminology work (3.6.1) which involves extracting terminological data (3.8.1) by searching through a corpus (3.6.9) NOTE Term excerption involves identifying concepts (3.2.1) and their designations (3.4.1) and noting any relevant information about a concept such as definitions (3.3.1), contexts (3.6.10) and usage labels.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: term harmonization
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Activity leading to the designation of one concept in different languages by terms which reflect the same or similar characteristics or have the same or slightly different forms.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: term identification
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The part of term excerption involving recognition and selection of designations.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: termbase
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A database containing data related to concepts or their designations or both.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: terminography
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: That part of terminology work concerned with the recording and presentation of terminological data.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: terminological concordance
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An ordered list of terms extracted from a corpus together with a context and a source reference.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: terminological data collection
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Collection of data containing information on concepts of specific subject fields.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: terminological dictionary
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A collection of terminological entries presenting information related to concepts or designations from one or more specific subject fields.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: terminological markup language
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: XML application for describing a terminological data collection conforming to the constraints expressed in ISO 16642.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: terminology
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The set of designations belonging to the language of a given subject field.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: terminology management
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Any deliberate manipulation of terminological information.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: terminology planning
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Activities aimed at developing, improving, implementing and disseminating the terminology of a subject field.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: terminology processing
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: That part of terminography concerned with computer aspects of database creation, maintenance and extraction of terminology from texts.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: terminology work
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Work concerned with the systematic collection, description, processing and presentation of concepts and their designations.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: test type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indication of the type of elicitation used for experimental test data within a research study, especially in the field of psychology.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Testtyp
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Angabe des Typs der Datenerhebung, der für experimentelle Testdaten innerhalb einer Forschungsstudie verwendet wurde, insbesondere im Bereich der Psychologie.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: text
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: any text-based information that is available in a digitally encoded human-readable format
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: text
tekst
tekst
tekst
teksti
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: mikä tahansa tekstipohjainen tieto, joka on saatavilla digitaalisesti koodattuna ihmisen luettavassa muodossa
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: texte
Text
szöveg
testo
teksts
tekst
texto
texto
text
text alignment
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The process of creating aligned text.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: text and corpus linguistics
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The study of the linguistic properties of an extended passage, text, or corpus of texts.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingüística textual i de corpus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: L'estudi de les propietats lingüístiques d'un passatge llarg, un text o un corpus de textos.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tekstna i korpusna lingvistika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Izučavanje lingvističkih svojstava opsežnijega odlomka, teksta ili korpusa tekstova.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tekst- og korpuslingvistik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Studiet af lingvistiske egenskaber af en længere passage, tekst eller tekstkorpus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: teksti- ja korpuslingvistika
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Teadus, mis uurib tekstilõigu, teksti või tekstikorpuse keelelisi omadusi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: teksti- ja korpuslingvistiikka
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Tutkimus tekstijaksojen, tekstien tai korpusten ominaisuuksista.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: linguistique de texte, de corpus.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Etude des propriétés linguistiques d'un texte long ou d'un corpus formé d'un ensemble de textes.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Text- und Korpuslinguistik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Die Untersuchung der linguistischen Eigenschaften von umfangreichen Passagen, Texten oder Textkorpora.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: szöveg- és korpusznyelvészet
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Egy kiterjedtebb nyelvi egység vizsgálata, például szövegeké vagy szövegkorpuszoké
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: testo e corpus linguistico
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Lo studio delle proprietà linguistiche di un passaggio esteso, testo o corpus di testi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: teksta un korpusa lingvistika.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nozare, kas pēta garākas teikumkopas, teksts vai tekstu korpusa lingvistiskās īpašības.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: językoznawstwo korpusowe i tekstu
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Badanie lingwistycznych właściwości rozszerzonego urywka tekstu, tekstu lub korpusu tekstów.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: linguística textual e de corpus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Estudo das propriedades linguísticas de um excerto, texto ou de corpora.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lingüística textual y de corpus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El estudio de las propiedades lingüísticas de un pasaje prolongado, un texto o un corpus de textos.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: text- och korpuslingvistik
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Studier av lingvistiska egenskaper i ett textstycke eller i en korpus.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: text corpus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A systematic collection of machine-readable texts (see also 6.4) or parts of text prepared, coded and stored according to predefined rules.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: text transcription
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The conversion of a text document such as a passport or handwritten letter to a different text format such as Microsoft Word (in the same language).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: theoretic model
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Name of the theoretic model underlying the annotation task and/or reference (URL or bibliographic reference) to informative material about the theoretic model used.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: model teòric
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nom del model teòric subjacent en l'anotació i/o la referència (URL o referència bibliogràfica) a material amb informació sobre el model teòric emprat.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: teorijski model
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Naziv teorijskoga modela koji je podloga za zadatak obilježavanja i/ili referenca (URL ili bibliografska referenca) na informativni materijal o korištenom teorijskome modelu.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: teoretisk model
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Navnet på den underliggende teoretiske model for annoteringen og/eller referencer (URL eller bibliografisk) til materiale om den brugte teoretiske model.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: teoreetiline mudel
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Märgenduse taga oleva teoreetilise mudeli nimi ja/või viide (kas veebilehele või kirjandusallikale), materjalidele kasutatud teoreetilise mudeli kohta.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: teoreettinen malli
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Annotaatiotehtävän taustalla olevan teoreettisen mallin nimi ja/tai viittaus käytetyn teoreettisen mallin tietoihin ( URL tai kirjallinen viittaus).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: modèle théorique
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nom du modèle théorique qui sous-tend une tâche d'annotation et/ou URL ou référence bibliographique vers de l'information quand à ce modèle théorique.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Theoretisches Modell
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Name des theoretischen Modells, das der Annotationstätigkeit zu Grunde liegt und/oder Verweis (URL oder bibliographische Referenz) auf Informationsmaterial zu dem verwendeten theoretischen Modell.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: elméleti modell
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Az annotációs feladathoz kapcsolódó elméleti model és/vagy (URL vagy bibliográfiai) hivatkozások a használt elméleti model valamely leírására.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: modello teorico
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nome del modello teorico alla base del compito di annotazione e/o del riferimento (URL o riferimento bibliografico) al materiale informativo sul modello teorico usato.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: teorētiskais modelis
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Marķēšanas pamatā esošā teorētiskā modeļa nosaukums un/vai norāde uz informatīvo materiālu par izmantoto teorētisko modeli (tīmekļa vietnes adrese vai bibliogrāfiska norāde).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: model teoretyczny
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nazwa modelu teoretycznego, który stanowił podstawę do zadania oznaczania (anotacji) i/lub odnośnik (adres URL or lub odnośnik bibliograficzny) do materiału opisującego zastosowany model teoretyczny.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: modelo teórico
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nome do modelo teórico subjacente à tarefa de anotação ou referência a informação sobre o modelo teórico usado.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: modelo teórico
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nombre del modelo teórico subyacente en la anotación y/o la referencia (URL o referencia bibliográfica) a material con información sobre el modelo teórico empleado.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: teoretisk modell
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Namnet på den teoretiska modell som ligger till grund för annoteringsuppgiften och/eller en referens (i form av en webbadress eller en bibliografisk referens) till informativt material om den teoretiska modell som använts.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: thesaurus
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A controlled vocabulary arranged in a known order and structured so that the various relationships among terms are displayed clearly and identified by standardized relationship indicators.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: time coverage
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The time period that the content of a resource is about. DC-Definition: The temporal topic of the resource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: cobertura temporal
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: El període de temps sobre el qual tracta el contingut del recurs. Definició DC: El tema temporal del recurs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: vremenska pokrivenost
